1.verse: EKITABO I - Zabbuli 1–41 Alina omukisa omuntu atatambulira mu kuteesa kw’ababi, era atayimirira mu kibiina ky’ababi, newaakubadde okutuula n’abo abanyooma ebya Katonda.

2.verse: Naye asanyukira okugondera amateeka ga MUKAMA, era mu mateeka ago mw’alowooleza emisana n’ekiro.

3.verse: Afaanana ng’omuti ogwasimbibwa ku mabbali g’omugga, ogubala ebibala byagwo mu ntuuko zaabyo, n’ebikoola byagwo tebiwotoka. Na buli ky’akola kivaamu birungi byereere.

4.verse: Naye abakola ebibi tebakola bwe batyo. Bali ng’ebisusunku ebifuumuuliddwa.

5.verse: Noolwekyo abakola ebibi tebaligumira lunaku lwa kusalirako musango; newaakubadde aboonoonyi okuyimirira mu kibiina ky’abatuukirivu.

6.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA alabirira ekkubo ly’abatuukirivu, naye ekkubo ly’abakola ebibi liribula.

1.verse: Lwaki amawanga geegugunga n’abantu ne bateganira obwereere okusala enkwe?

2.verse: Bakabaka ab’ensi bakuŋŋaanye, n’abafuzi ne bateeseza wamu ku MUKAMA ne ku Kristo we, nga bagamba nti,

3.verse: “Ka tukutule enjegere zaabwe, era tweyambulemu ekikoligo kyabwe.”

4.verse: Naye Katonda oyo atuula mu ggulu, abasekerera busekerezi, n’enkwe zaabwe ezitaliimu zimusesa.

5.verse: N’alyoka abanenya ng’ajjudde obusungu, n’abatiisa nnyo ng’aswakidde.

6.verse: N’abagamba nti, “Ddala ddala nateekawo kabaka owange ku lusozi lwange Sayuuni olutukuvu.”

7.verse: Nzija kulangirira ekiragiro kya MUKAMA: kubanga yaŋŋamba nti, “Ggwe oli Mwana wange, olwa leero nfuuse kitaawo.

8.verse: Nsaba, nange ndikuwa amawanga gonna okuba obusika bwo, era n’ensi yonna gy’ekoma okuba amatwale go.

9.verse: Olibafugisa omuggo ogw’ekyuma, era olibabetenta ng’entamu y’omubumbi.”

10.verse: Kale nno mubeere n’amagezi mmwe bakabaka; muyige okulabulwa mmwe abafuzi b’ensi.

11.verse: Muweereze MUKAMA nga mumutya, era musanyuke n’okukankana.

12.verse: Mwanirize Omwana, mumusembeze MUKAMA aleme okubasunguwalira n’okubazikiriza nga muli mu kkubo lyammwe; kubanga obusungu bwe bubuubuuka mangu. Kyokka bonna abaddukira gy’ali balina omukisa.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi bwe yadduka mutabani we Abusaalomu. Ayi MUKAMA, abalabe bange nga beeyongedde obungi! Abanfubutukiddeko okunnumba nga bangi!

2.verse: Bangi abanjogerako nti, “Katonda tagenda kumununula.”

3.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, ggwe ngabo yange enkuuma; ggwe kitiibwa kyange, era gw’onzizaamu amaanyi.

4.verse: Nkoowoola MUKAMA n’eddoboozi ery’omwanguka, n’annyanukula ng’asinziira ku lusozi lwe olutukuvu.

5.verse: Ngalamira ne neebaka, era ne nzuukuka bulungi, kubanga MUKAMA ye ampanirira.

6.verse: Siityenga enkumi n’enkumi z’abalabe bange abanneetoolodde, okunnumba.

7.verse: Golokoka, Ayi MUKAMA, ondokole Ayi Katonda wange okube abalabe bange bonna omenye oluba lw’abakola ebibi.

8.verse: Obulokozi buva gy’oli, Ayi MUKAMA. Emikisa gyo gibeerenga ku bantu bo.

1.verse: Ya mukulu wa Bayimbi. Eyimbibwa n’ebivuga eby’enkoba. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Bwe nkukoowoola onnyanukule, Ayi Katonda wange omutuukirivu. Bwe mba mu nnaku, onnyambe. Onkwatirwe ekisa owulire okusaba kwange.

2.verse: Mmwe abaana b’abantu, mulituusa wa okuswazanga ekitiibwa kyange? Mulituusa ddi okugoberera okwagala ebitaliimu, n’okunoonya eby’obulimba?

3.verse: Naye mutegeere nga MUKAMA yeerondeddemu abo abamugondera. Bwe nnaamukoowoolanga anampuliranga era anannyanukulanga.

4.verse: Ne bwe munyiiga ennyo, temusaana kwonoona; musiriikirire, mwekebere era mufumiitirize mu mitima gyammwe nga mugalamidde ku bitanda byammwe.

5.verse: Muweeyo ebiweebwayo ebisaanidde; era mwesigenga MUKAMA.

6.verse: Waliwo bangi abasaba nti, “Oyongere okutulaga ebirungi, Ayi MUKAMA, otumulisize omusana gw’amaaso go.”

7.verse: Ondeetedde essanyu lingi mu mutima gwange erisinga ne lye bafuna mu makungula nga batunuulira ku bibala byabwe ebingi.

8.verse: Nnaagalamira ne nneebaka mirembe; kubanga ggwe wekka, Ayi MUKAMA, ggwe ondabirira akabi ne katantuukako.

1.verse: Ya mukulu wa Bayimbi. Ya ndere. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Otege okutu eri ebigambo byange, Ayi MUKAMA; olowooze ku kunyolwa kwange.

2.verse: Wuliriza eddoboozi ly’omulanga gwange, Ayi Kabaka wange era Katonda wange: kubanga ggwe gwe nsaba.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, buli nkya owulira eddoboozi lyange; buli nkya ndeeta gy’oli okusaba kwange, ne nnindirira onziremu.

4.verse: Kubanga ggwe Ayi Katonda, tosanyukira bibi: n’ebitasaana tobigumiikiriza.

5.verse: Ab’amalala era abakola ebibi tobeetaaga mu maaso go: kubanga okyawa abakola ebibi bonna.

6.verse: Abalimba bonna obazikiriza; MUKAMA akyawa abatemu era n’abalimba.

7.verse: Naye olw’ekisa kyo ekingi, nze nnaayingiranga mu nnyumba yo: ne nkusinziza mu Yeekaalu yo Entukuvu n’okutya okungi.

8.verse: Onkulembere, Ayi MUKAMA, mu butuukirivu bwo, olw’abalabe bange, ondage ekkubo eggolokofu ery’okutambulirangamu.

9.verse: Abalabe bange bye boogera tebyesigibwa; emitima gyabwe gijjudde bussi bwereere. Emimiro gyabwe ntaana eyasaamiridde: akamwa kaabwe koogera bya bulimba.

10.verse: Basalire omusango gubasinge, Ayi Katonda; baleke bagwe mu mitego gyabwe. Bagobe kubanga baakujeemera.

11.verse: Naye leka abo bonna abakwesiga basanyukenga; ennaku zonna bayimbenga n’essanyu, obakuumenga, abo abaagala erinnya lyo basanyukirenga mu ggwe.

12.verse: Kubanga, Ayi MUKAMA, omutuukirivu omuwa omukisa; era omukuuma, n’omwetoolooza okwagala ng’engabo.

1.verse: Eri Omukulu wa Bayimbi. Eyimbibwa n’ebivuga eby’enkoba. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, tonnenya ng’ojjudde obusungu; so tombonereza mu kiruyi kyo.

2.verse: Onsaasire, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga ndi munafu. Omponye, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga amagumba gange gali mu bulumi.

3.verse: Emmeeme yange ejjudde ennaku. Olirindirira kutuusa ddi olyoke onnyambe?

4.verse: Onkyukire, Ayi MUKAMA, olokole omwoyo gwange; omponye okufa olw’okwagala kwo okungi.

5.verse: Kubanga tewali ayinza kukujjukira ng’amaze okufa. Ani alikutendereza ng’asinziira emagombe?

6.verse: Mpweddemu amaanyi olw’okusinda. Buli kiro obuliri bwange bujjula amaziga gange n’omutto ne gutoba.

7.verse: Amaaso gange ganafuye olw’okunyolwa, tegakyalaba bulungi olw’abalabe bange.

8.verse: Muve we ndi mmwe mwenna abakola ebibi; kubanga MUKAMA awulidde okukaaba kwange.

9.verse: MUKAMA awulidde okwegayirira kwange, n’okusaba kwange akukkirizza.

10.verse: Abalabe bange bonna baliswazibwa era balitya nnyo; bazzibwe emabega nga bajjudde obuswavu mangu ago.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi gye yayimbira MUKAMA ng’efa ku Kuusi Omubenyamini. Ayi MUKAMA, Katonda wange, neesiga ggwe: ngobaako bonna abangigganya era omponye,

2.verse: si kulwa nga bantagulataagula ng’empologoma ne bankutulakutula obufiififi ne watabaawo amponya.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, Katonda wange, obanga nkoze kino, era ng’engalo zange ziriko omusango,

4.verse: obanga waliwo andaze ebirungi nze ne si muyisa bulungi, oba nzibye omulabe wange awatali nsonga:

5.verse: Kale, abalabe bange baleke bangoberere bankwate, bankube wansi banninnyirire, banzitire mu nfuufu.

6.verse: Golokoka, Ayi MUKAMA, mu busungu bwo oziyize abalabe bange abajjudde obukambwe. Golokoka, Ayi Katonda wange, onnyambe ggwe asala omusango mu bwenkanya.

7.verse: Kuŋŋaanya bannaggwanga bonna okukwetooloola; obafuge ng’oli waggulu ennyo.

8.verse: Ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, Ali Waggulu Ennyo, asalira amawanga gonna emisango, osale omusango gwange Ayi MUKAMA Ali Waggulu Ennyo ng’obutuukirivu bwange bwe buli, era n’amazima agali mu nze bwe gali.

9.verse: Ayi Katonda omutukuvu, akebera emitima n’emmeeme; okomye ebikolwa by’abakola ebibi: era onyweze abatuukirivu.

10.verse: Katonda Ali Waggulu Ennyo ye ngabo yange; alokola abo abalina omutima omulongoofu.

11.verse: Katonda mulamuzi wa mazima; era alaga ekiruyi kye buli lunaku.

12.verse: MUKAMA awagala ekitala kye n’aleega omutego gwe ogw’obusaale.

13.verse: Era ategese ebyokulwanyisa ebissi; era akozesa obusaale obw’omuliro.

14.verse: Omuntu ajjudde ebibi afuna emitawaana, n’azaala obulimba.

15.verse: Asima ekinnya, n’akiwanvuya nnyo; ate n’akigwamu ye kye yasimye.

16.verse: Emitawaana gye gimwebunguludde; n’obukambwe bwe bumuddire.

17.verse: Nneebazanga MUKAMA olw’obutuukirivu bwe; nnaayimbanga nga ntendereza erinnya lya MUKAMA Ali Waggulu Ennyo.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, Mukama waffe, erinnya lyo nga ddungi era kkulu nnyo mu nsi yonna! Ekitiibwa kyo kitenderezebwa okutuuka waggulu mu ggulu.

2.verse: Abaana abato n’abawere wabawa amaanyi okukutendereza; ne basirisa omulabe wo n’oyo ayagala okwesasuza.

3.verse: Bwe ntunuulira eggulu lyo, omulimu gw’engalo zo, omwezi n’emmunyeenye bye watonda;

4.verse: omuntu kye ki ggwe okumujjukira, omuntu obuntu ggwe okumussaako omwoyo?

5.verse: Kubanga wamukola n’abulako katono okuba nga Katonda; n’omussaako engule ey’obukulu n’ekitiibwa.

6.verse: Wamukwasa okufuga ebintu byonna bye wakola n’emikono gyo: byonna wabissa wansi w’ebigere bye,

7.verse: ebisibo n’amagana ag’ebisolo byonna eby’omu nsiko,

8.verse: n’ennyonyi ez’omu bbanga, n’ebyennyanja eby’omu nnyanja; era na buli kiramu kyonna ekiyita mu nnyanja.

9.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, Mukama waffe, erinnya lyo nga ddungi era kkulu nnyo mu nsi yonna!

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Eyimbibwa okujjukira Okufa kw’Omwana. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nnaakutenderezanga, Ayi MUKAMA n’omutima gwange gwonna; nnaayolesanga ebikolwa byo eby’ekitalo byonna.

2.verse: Nnaasanyukanga era nnaajagulizanga mu ggwe. Nnaayimbanga nga ntendereza erinnya lyo, Ayi MUKAMA Ali Waggulu Ennyo.

3.verse: Abalabe bange bazzeeyo emabega, beesittadde ne bazikiririra mu maaso go.

4.verse: Kubanga owagidde ebiŋŋwanira, n’ensonga zange; era otudde ku ntebe yo ey’obwakabaka n’osala omusango mu bwenkanya.

5.verse: Waboggolera amawanga, n’ozikiriza ababi; erinnya lyabwe n’olisangulirawo ddala emirembe n’emirembe.

6.verse: Abalabe obamaliddewo ddala, n’ebibuga byabwe obizikirizza, era tewali aliddayo kubijjukira.

7.verse: Naye MUKAMA afuga emirembe gyonna; era ataddewo entebe ye ey’okusalirako emisango.

8.verse: Aliramula ensi mu butuukirivu, era alisalira abantu bonna emisango mu bwenkanya.

9.verse: MUKAMA kye kiddukiro ky’abo abanyigirizibwa; era kye kigo kyabwe mu biseera eby’akabi.

10.verse: Abo abamanyi erinnya lyo, Ayi MUKAMA, banaakwesiganga; kubanga abakunoonya tobaleka bokka.

11.verse: Muyimbe okutendereza MUKAMA, atudde ku ntebe ey’obwakabaka mu Sayuuni; mutegeeze amawanga gonna by’akoze.

12.verse: Ajjukira n’awoolera eggwanga era assaayo omwoyo eri abo abanyigirizibwa.

13.verse: Onsaasire, Ayi MUKAMA; otunuulire abalabe bange abangigganya, onzigye ku miryango gy’okufa.

14.verse: Ndyoke nkutenderezenga mu lwatu mu miryango gy’omuwala wa Sayuuni: era njagulizenga mu bulokozi bwo.

15.verse: Abantu mu mawanga bagudde mu binnya bye baasima; era n’emitego gyabwe gimasuse ne gibakwasa.

16.verse: MUKAMA yeeraze nga bw’asala emisango egy’ensonga. Omubi akwatiddwa mu mutego gw’emikono gye.

17.verse: Ababi balisuulibwa emagombe; ebyo bye bituuka ku mawanga gonna ageerabira Katonda.

18.verse: Kubanga abali mu kwetaaga tebalyerabirwa ennaku zonna, era n’ababonyaabonyezebwa tebaliggwaamu ssuubi emirembe gyonna.

19.verse: Ogolokoke, Ayi MUKAMA, tokkiriza muntu kuwangula; leka amawanga gasalirwe omusango mu maaso go.

20.verse: Bakankanye n’okutya, Ayi MUKAMA; amawanga gonna galyoke gategeere nti bantu buntu.

1.verse: Lwaki otwekwese, Ayi MUKAMA? Lwaki otwekwese mu biseera eby’emitawaana?

2.verse: Omubi, mu malala ge, ayigganya abanafu; muleke agwe mu nkwe ezo z’asaze.

3.verse: Kubanga omubi yeewaana ng’anyumya ku bibi ebiri mu mutima gwe, agabula aboomululu n’avuma MUKAMA.

4.verse: Omubi mu malala ge tanoonya Katonda.

5.verse: Buli ky’akola kimugendera bulungi. Amateeka go tagafaako, era n’abalabe be abanyooma.

6.verse: Ayogera mu mutima gwe nti, “Sikangibwa, nzija kusanyuka emirembe gyonna.”

7.verse: Mu kamwa ke mujjudde okukolima n’obulimba awamu n’okutiisatiisa; ebigambo bye bya mutawaana era bibi.

8.verse: Yeekukuma mu byalo okutemula abantu abataliiko musango. Yeekweka ng’aliimisa b’anatta.

9.verse: Asooba mu kyama ng’empologoma, ng’alindirira okuzinduukiriza abateesobola. Abakwasa n’abatwalira mu kitimba kye.

10.verse: B’abonyaabonya bagwa wansi ne babetentebwa ng’amaanyi g’omubi gabasukkiridde.

11.verse: Ayogera mu mutima gwe nti, “Katonda yeerabidde, amaaso ge agakwese, era takyaddayo kubiraba.”

12.verse: Golokoka, Ayi MUKAMA, ozikirize omubi, Ayi Katonda; abanaku tobeerabiranga.

13.verse: Omuntu omubi ayinza atya okukunyooma, Ayi Katonda, n’agamba mu mutima gwe nti “Sigenda kwennyonnyolako?”

14.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi Katonda, ennaku zaabwe n’okubonaabona kwabwe obiraba era ojja kubikolako. Ateesobola yeewaayo mu mikono gyo, kubanga gwe mubeezi w’abatalina bakitaabwe.

15.verse: Malawo amaanyi g’omwonoonyi, muyite abyogere ebyo ebibadde bitajja kuzuulwa.

16.verse: MUKAMA ye Kabaka emirembe n’emirembe. Amawanga galizikirizibwa mu nsi ye.

17.verse: MUKAMA awulira okwetaaga kw’ababonyaabonyezebwa, ogumye emitima gyabwe; otege okutu kwo obaanukule.

18.verse: Olwanirira abataliiko bakitaabwe n’abajoogebwa; omuntu obuntu ow’oku nsi n’ataddayo kubatiisa.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Mu MUKAMA mwe neekweka; ate muyinza mutya okuŋŋamba nti, “Ddukira ku nsozi ng’ebinyonyi?

2.verse: Kubanga laba ababi baleega emitego gyabwe egy’obusaale, balase abalina omutima omulongoofu.

3.verse: Emisingi nga gizikirizibwa, omutuukirivu ayinza kukola ki?”

4.verse: MUKAMA ali mu Yeekaalu ye entukuvu; MUKAMA atudde ku ntebe ye ey’obwakabaka eri mu ggulu. Amaaso ge gatunuulira era geetegereza abaana b’abantu.

5.verse: MUKAMA akebera abatuukirivu naye omutima gwe gukyawa ababi, n’abakola eby’obukambwe.

6.verse: Ababi alibayiwako amanda ag’omuliro; n’empewo ezibambula gwe guliba omugabo gwabwe.

7.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA mutuukirivu era ayagala eby’obutuukirivu; abo abalongoofu be balimulaba.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Tuyambe, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga tewakyali n’omu amanyi Katonda; abantu abeesigwa bonna baweddewo.

2.verse: Buli muntu alimba munne; akamwa kaabwe akawaana koogera bya bulimba.

3.verse: MUKAMA, osirise akamwa k’abo bonna abeewaanawaana, na buli lulimi olwenyumiriza;

4.verse: nga boogera nti, “Tujja kuwangula n’olulimi lwaffe, era tufune byonna bye twetaaga n’akamwa kaffe, kubanga ani alitukuba ku mukono.”

5.verse: MUKAMA ayogera nti, “Olw’okujoogebwa kw’abanafu, n’olw’okusinda kw’abali mu bwetaavu, nnaasituka kaakano ne nnwanirira abo abalumbibwa.”

6.verse: Ebigambo bya MUKAMA bya bwesigwa era bya mazima. Bigeraageranyizibwa n’effeeza erongoosebbwa obulungi emirundi musanvu mu kyoto eky’ebbumba.

7.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, tukwesiga ng’onootukuumanga, n’otuwonya abantu abali ng’abo emirembe gyonna.

8.verse: Ababi beeyisaayisa nga bagulumiza ebitaliimu nsa.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Olinneerabira kutuusa ddi, Ayi MUKAMA? Okutuusa emirembe gyonna? Olikomya ddi okunkweka amaaso go?

2.verse: Okulumwa mu mmeeme yange kulikoma ddi, n’okunyolwa okwa buli lunaku mu mutima gwange kuliggwaamu ddi? Abalabe bange balikomya ddi okumpangulanga nga beegulumiza?

3.verse: Onnyanukule, Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange; onzizeemu amaanyi nneme okufa.

4.verse: Si kulwa ng’omulabe wange yeewaana nti, “Mmuwangudde;” abalabe bange ne bajaguza nga ngudde.

5.verse: Naye nze neesiga okwagala kwo okutajjulukuka; era omutima gwange gunaasanyukiranga mu bulokozi bwo.

6.verse: Nnaayimbiranga MUKAMA, kubanga ankoledde ebirungi.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Omusirusiru ayogera mu mutima gwe nti, “Tewali Katonda.” Aboogera bwe batyo boonoonefu, bakola ebitasaana tekuli n’omu ku bo akola kirungi.

2.verse: MUKAMA atunuulira abantu bonna mu nsi ng’asinziira mu ggulu, okulaba obanga mulimu mu bo ategeera, era abanoonya Katonda.

3.verse: Naye bonna bakyamye boonoonese; teri akola kirungi, era teri n’omu.

4.verse: Abo bonna abakola ebibi tebaliyiga? Kubanga basaanyaawo abantu bange ng’abalya emmere; so tebakoowoola MUKAMA.

5.verse: Balitya nnyo! Kubanga Katonda abeera wamu n’abatuukirivu.

6.verse: Mulemesa entegeka z’omwavu, songa MUKAMA kye kiddukiro kye.

7.verse: Singa obulokozi bwa Isirayiri butuuse mu kiseera kino nga buva mu Sayuuni! MUKAMA bw’alirokola abantu be, Yakobo alijaguza ne Isirayiri alisanyuka.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, ani anaabeeranga mu nnyumba yo? Ani anaatuulanga ku lusozi lwo olutukuvu?

2.verse: Oyo ataliiko kya kunenyezebwa, akola eby’obutuukirivu, era ayogera eby’amazima nga biviira ddala mu mutima gwe.

3.verse: Olulimi lwe talwogeza bya bulimba, era mikwano gye tagiyisa bubi, so tasaasaanya ŋŋambo ku baliraanwa be.

4.verse: Anyooma ababi, naye abatya MUKAMA abassaamu ekitiibwa. Atuukiriza ky’asuubiza ne bwe kiba nga kimulumya.

5.verse: Bw’awola tasaba magoba; so takkiriza kulya nguzi ku muntu yenna. Oyo akola ebyo aliba munywevu emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Ya Dawudi. Onkuume, Ayi Katonda, kubanga ggwe buddukiro bwange.

2.verse: Nagamba MUKAMA nti, “Ggwe Mukama wange, ebirungi byonna bye nnina biva gy’oli.”

3.verse: Abatukuvu abali mu nsi be njagala era mu bo mwe nsanyukira.

4.verse: Ennaku y’abo abagoberera bakatonda abalala yeeyongera. Siriwaayo ssaddaaka zaabwe ez’omusaayi, wadde okusinza bakatonda baabwe.

5.verse: MUKAMA, ggwe mugabo gwange, era ggw’oliisa obulamu bwange; era ggw’olabirira ebyange.

6.verse: Ensalo zange ziri mu bifo ebisanyusa, ddala ddala omugabo omulungi.

7.verse: Nnaatenderezanga MUKAMA kubanga annuŋŋamya ne mu kiro ayigiriza omutima gwange.

8.verse: Nkulembeza MUKAMA buli kiseera, era ali ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, siinyeenyezebwenga.

9.verse: Noolwekyo omutima gwange gusanyuka, n’akamwa kange ne kajaguza; era n’omubiri gwange gunaabeeranga mu mirembe.

10.verse: Kubanga omwoyo gwange toliguleka magombe, wadde okukkiriza Omutukuvu wo okuvunda.

11.verse: Olindaga ekkubo ery’obulamu; w’oli we wanaabanga essanyu erijjuvu, era mu mukono gwo ogwa ddyo nga mwe muli ebisanyusa emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Okusaba kwa Dawudi. Wulira, Ayi MUKAMA, okukoowoola kwange nga nneegayirira, wuliriza okukaaba kwange. Tega okutu owulirize okukoowoola kwange, kubanga tekuva ku mimwa gya bulimba.

2.verse: Nzigyako omusango; kubanga olaba ekituufu.

3.verse: Weekenneenyezza omutima gwange era n’onkebera n’ekiro. Ne bw’onongezesa toobeeko kibi ky’onsangamu; kubanga mmaliridde obutayogeranga bya bulimba.

4.verse: Ggwe, gwe nkoowoola, ngoberedde ebigambo by’akamwa ko, ne neewala ebikolwa by’abantu abakambwe.

5.verse: Nnyweredde mu makubo go, era ebigere byange tebiigalekenga.

6.verse: Nkukoowoola, Ayi Katonda, kubanga mmanyi ng’onnyanukula; ontegere okutu kwo owulire okusaba kwange.

7.verse: Ndaga okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo, okwewuunyisa, ggwe alokola n’omukono gwo ogwa ddyo abo bonna abakweyuna nga badduka abalabe baabwe.

8.verse: Onkuume ng’emmunye ey’eriiso lyo; onkweke mu kisiikirize ky’ebiwaawaatiro byo.

9.verse: Omponye ababi abannumba, n’abalabe bange abanneetoolodde.

10.verse: Omutima gwabwe mukakanyavu, n’akamwa kaabwe koogera by’amalala.

11.verse: Banzingizza era banneetoolodde; bansimbye amaaso nga beeteeseteese okunsuula wansi.

12.verse: Bali ng’empologoma enjala gy’eruma eyeeteeseteese okutaagula omuyiggo gwayo era ng’empologoma enkulu eteeze.

13.verse: Golokoka n’ekitala kyo, Ayi MUKAMA, oyolekere abalabe bange obawangule, omponye ababi abo.

14.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, mponya abantu, abantu ab’ensi n’omukono gwo, kubanga balowooleza mu bya bulamu buno byokka, n’emigabo gyabwe giri mu nsi. Embuto zaabwe zigezze, obagaggawazizza ne baterekera n’abaana baabwe ne bazzukulu baabwe.

15.verse: Nze ndikulaba n’amaaso mu butuukirivu era ndimatira, bwe ndiraba obwenyi bwo nga nzuukuse.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi gye yayimbira MUKAMA bwe yamuwonya abalabe be ne Sawulo. Nkwagala Ayi MUKAMA kubanga ggwe maanyi gange.

2.verse: MUKAMA lwe lwazi lwange, ky’ekigo kyange ekigumu era ye mununuzi wange, ye Katonda wange era lwe lwazi lwange mwe neekweka; ye ngabo yange era ye mulokozi wange ow’amaanyi, era kye kigo kyange ekinywevu.

3.verse: Nkoowoola MUKAMA asaana okutenderezebwa, era amponya eri abalabe bange.

4.verse: Emiguwa gy’okufa gyanneetooloola; embuyaga ez’okusaanawo zansaanikira.

5.verse: Ebisiba eby’amagombe byanneetooloola; n’emitego gy’okufa ne ginjolekera.

6.verse: Mu nnaku yange nakoowoola MUKAMA; ne nkaabirira Katonda wange annyambe. Yawulira eddoboozi lyange ng’ali mu yeekaalu ye; omulanga gwange ne gutuuka mu matu ge.

7.verse: Emisingi gy’ensi ne gikankana ne giyuuguuma; ensozi ne zinyeenyezebwa ne ziseeseetuka, kubanga yali asunguwadde.

8.verse: Omukka ne gunyooka nga guva mu nnyindo ze. Omuliro ne guva mu kamwa ke, ne gukoleeza amanda ne gabuubuuka.

9.verse: Yayabuluza eggulu n’akka wansi; ebire ebikutte nga biri wansi w’ebigere bye.

10.verse: Yeebagala kerubi n’abuuka, n’aseeyeeyeza ku biwaawaatiro by’empewo.

11.verse: Yafuula ekizikiza ekyamwetooloolanga okuba enkuufiira ey’ebire ebijjudde amazzi.

12.verse: Okumasamasa okwali mu maaso ge ne kuva mu bire bye, n’okumyansa kw’eggulu n’omuzira.

13.verse: MUKAMA yabwatuka ng’asinziira mu ggulu; oyo Ali Waggulu Ennyo yayogera; mu kamwa ke ne muvaamu omuzira n’okumyansa kw’eggulu.

14.verse: Yalasa obusaale bwe n’asaasaanya abalabe; n’okumyansa okw’eggulu n’abawangula.

15.verse: Ebiwonvu eby’omu nnyanja ne bibikkulwa n’emisingi gy’ensi ne gyeyerula olw’okunenya kwo Ayi MUKAMA n’olw’okubwatuka kw’omukka ogw’omu nnyindo zo.

16.verse: MUKAMA yagolola omukono gwe ng’ali waggulu, n’ankwata n’annyinyulula mu mazzi amangi.

17.verse: Yamponya abalabe bange ab’amaanyi, abankyawa, abo abaali bansinza amaanyi.

18.verse: Bannumba nga ndi mu buzibu, naye MUKAMA n’annyamba.

19.verse: N’antwala mu kifo ekigazi n’amponya, kubanga yansanyukira nnyo.

20.verse: MUKAMA ankoledde ng’obutuukirivu bwange bwe buli, ansasudde ng’ebikolwa byange ebirungi bwe biri.

21.verse: Kubanga ntambulidde mu makubo ga MUKAMA, ne sikola kibi eri Katonda wange.

22.verse: Ddala ddala amateeka ga MUKAMA gonna ngagondedde, era ne siva ku biragiro bye.

23.verse: Sisobyanga mu maaso ge era nneekuuma obutayonoona.

24.verse: Noolwekyo, MUKAMA ansasudde ng’obutuukirivu bwange bwe buli, era ng’ebikolwa byange ebirungi bwe biri by’alaba.

25.verse: Eri omwesigwa weeraga ng’oli mwesigwa, n’eri atalina musango weeraga nga tolina musango.

26.verse: Eri abalongoofu weeraga ng’oli mulongoofu, n’eri abakyamu weeraga ng’obasinza amagezi.

28.verse: Okoleezezza ettaala yange; Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange, ekizikiza kyange okimulisizza.

29.verse: Bwe mbeera naawe nsobola okulumba abalabe bange; nga ndi ne Katonda wange nsobola okuwalampa bbugwe.

30.verse: Katonda byonna by’akola bigolokofu; MUKAMA ky’asuubiza akituukiriza; era bwe buddukiro bw’abo bonna abamwekwekamu.

31.verse: Kale, ani Katonda, wabula MUKAMA? Era ani Lwazi, wabula Katonda waffe?

32.verse: Oyo ye Katonda ampa amaanyi era aluŋŋamya ekkubo lyange.

33.verse: Ebigere byange abinyweza ng’eby’empeewo, n’ansobozesa okuyimirira ku ntikko z’ensozi.

34.verse: Anjigiriza okulwana entalo, ne nsobola n’okuleega omutego ogw’obusaale ogw’ekikomo.

35.verse: Ompadde obulokozi bwo okuba engabo yange; era ompaniridde n’omukono gwo ogwa ddyo; weetoowazizza n’ongulumiza.

36.verse: Ongaziyirizza ekkubo ebigere byange we biyita, obukongovvule bwange ne butanuuka.

37.verse: Nagoba abalabe bange embiro, ne mbakwata ne sidda mabega okutuusa nga mbazikirizza.

38.verse: Nababetenta ne batasobola na kugolokoka, ne mbalinnyako ebigere byange.

39.verse: Ompadde amaanyi ag’okulwana; abalabe bange ne banvuunamira.

40.verse: Okyusizza abalabe bange ne bankuba amabega ne badduka, ne ndyoka nsanyaawo abo bonna abankyawa.

41.verse: Baalaajana naye tewaali yabawonya; ne bakaabirira MUKAMA, naye n’atabaddamu.

42.verse: Ne mbamerengula ng’enfuufu empewo gy’efuumuula; ne mbasammula eri ng’ebisooto by’omu luguudo.

43.verse: Omponyezza obulumbaganyi bw’abantu; n’onfuula omufuzi w’amawanga. Abantu be nnali simanyi ne bafuuka abaweereza bange.

44.verse: Olumpulira ne baŋŋondera, bannamawanga ne bajugumira mu maaso gange.

45.verse: Bannamawanga baggwaamu omutima ne bava mu bigo byabwe nga bakankana.

46.verse: MUKAMA mulamu! Atenderezebwe, Olwazi lwange; era agulumizibwe Katonda w’obulokozi bwange.

47.verse: Ye Katonda, asasula ku lwange abankola obubi era akakkanya amawanga ne ngafuga. Amponyeza abalabe bange.

48.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, ongulumizizza okusinga abalabe bange, n’onkuuma abakambwe ne batankwatako.

49.verse: Noolwekyo, Ayi MUKAMA, nnaakutenderezanga mu mawanga, era nnaayimbanga nga ntendereza erinnya lyo.

50.verse: Awa kabaka obuwanguzi obw’amaanyi, amulaga ebyekisa emirembe gyonna oyo gwe yafukako amafuta, eri Dawudi n’eri ezzadde lye.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Eggulu litegeeza ekitiibwa kya Katonda, ebbanga ne litegeeza emirimu gy’emikono gye.

2.verse: Buli lunaku litegeeza ekitiibwa kye, era liraga amagezi ge buli kiro.

3.verse: Tewali bigambo oba olulimi olwogerwa, era n’eddoboozi lyabyo teriwulikika.

4.verse: Naye obubaka bwabyo bubunye mu nsi yonna. Mu ggulu omwo Katonda mwe yasimbira enjuba eweema.

5.verse: Evaayo ng’awasa omugole bw’ava mu nju ye, era ng’omuddusi asinga bonna bw’ajjula essanyu ng’agenda mu mpaka.

6.verse: Evaayo ku ludda olumu olw’eggulu, ne yeetooloola okutuuka ku nkomerero yaalyo, era tewali kyekweka bbugumu lyayo.

7.verse: Ekiragiro kya MUKAMA kirimu byonna, era kizzaamu amaanyi mu mwoyo. Etteeka lya MUKAMA lyesigika, ligeziwaza abatalina magezi.

8.verse: Okuyigiriza kwa MUKAMA kutuufu, kusanyusa omutima gw’oyo akugondera. Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA bimulisiza amaaso, bye galaba.

9.verse: Okutya MUKAMA kirungi, era kya mirembe gyonna. Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA bya bwenkanya, era bya butuukirivu ddala.

10.verse: Ebyo byonna bisaana okuyaayaanirwa okusinga zaabu, okusingira ddala zaabu ennungi ennyo. Biwoomerera okusinga omubisi gw’enjuki, okusukkirira omubisi gw’enjuki ogutonnya nga guva mu bisenge byagwo.

11.verse: Ebyo bye birabula omuddu wo, era mu kubigondera muvaamu empeera ennene.

12.verse: Ani asobola okulaba ebyonoono bye? Onsonyiwe, Ayi MUKAMA, ebibi ebinkisiddwa.

13.verse: Era omuddu wo omuwonye okukola ebibi ebigenderere, bireme kunfuga. Bwe ntyo mbeere ng’ataliiko kyakunenyezebwa nneme okuzza omusango omunene ogw’ekibi.

14.verse: Nsaba ebigambo by’omu kamwa kange, n’okulowooza okw’omu mutima gwange, bisiimibwe mu maaso go, Ayi MUKAMA, Olwazi lwange, era Omununuzi wange.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. MUKAMA akwanukulenga ng’oli mu buzibu. Erinnya lya Katonda wa Yakobo likukuumenga.

2.verse: Akuweerezenga obuyambi obuva mu kifo kye ekitukuvu; akudduukirirenga okuva ku lusozi Sayuuni.

3.verse: Ajjukirenga ssaddaaka zo zonna z’omuwa, era asiimenga ebiweebwayo byo ebyokebwa.

4.verse: Akuwenga omutima gwo bye gwetaaga, era atuukirizenga by’oteekateeka byonna.

5.verse: Tulijaganya olw’obuwanguzi bwo, ne tuwuuba ebendera zaffe mu linnya lya Katonda waffe. MUKAMA akuwenga byonna by’omusaba.

6.verse: Kaakano ntegedde nga MUKAMA awanguza oyo gwe yafukako amafuta, amwanukula ng’amuwa obuwanguzi n’omukono gwe ogwa ddyo, ng’asinziira mu ggulu lye ettukuvu.

7.verse: Abamu beesiga amagaali, n’abalala beesiga embalaasi, naye ffe twesiga erinnya lya MUKAMA Katonda waffe.

8.verse: Batalantuka ne bagwa wansi ne balemerawo, naye ffe tugolokoka ne tuyimirira nga tuli banywevu.

9.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, lokola kabaka, otwanukule bwe tukukoowoola.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, kabaka ajaguliza mu maanyi go. Obuwanguzi bw’omuwadde nga bumuleetedde essanyu lingi!

2.verse: Omuwadde omutima gwe bye gwetaaga, era buli ky’asabye n’akamwa ke tokimummye.

3.verse: Ddala ddala wamwaniriza n’emikisa gyo egijjudde ebirungi, n’omutikkira engule eya zaabu omuka ennyo ku mutwe gwe.

4.verse: Yakusaba obulamu, era n’obumuwa, ennaku ennyingi ez’emirembe n’emirembe.

5.verse: Obuwanguzi bwe wamuwa bumuleetedde ekitiibwa kinene. Omuwadde ekitiibwa n’oyatiikirira.

6.verse: Ddala omuwadde emikisa gyo egy’olubeerera, n’omujjuza essanyu ng’oli naye buli kiseera.

7.verse: Kubanga kabaka yeesiga MUKAMA, era olw’okwagala okutaggwaawo okw’oyo Ali Waggulu Ennyo, kabaka tagenda kunyeenyezebwa.

8.verse: Omukono gwo guliwamba abalabe bo bonna; omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gulikwata abo abakukyawa.

9.verse: Bw’olirabika, Ayi MUKAMA, olibasiriiza n’omuliro ng’ogw’omu kyoto ekyengeredde. MUKAMA, ng’ajjudde obusungu, alibamira bonna, era alibamalirawo ddala.

10.verse: Olizikiriza ezzadde lyabwe ku nsi, n’abaana baabwe bonna n’obamalawo mu baana b’abantu.

11.verse: Newaakubadde nga bakusalira enkwe, ne bateekateeka ebikolwa ebibi, kyokka tewali kye basobola kutuukiriza.

12.verse: Balikyuka ne bakudduka bwe baliraba ng’obaleezeemu omutego gwo ogw’obusaale.

13.verse: Ogulumizibwenga, Ayi MUKAMA, mu maanyi go. Tunaayimbanga nga tutendereza obuyinza bwo.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Katonda wange, Katonda wange, lwaki onjabulidde? Lwaki ogaana okunnyamba wadde okuwuliriza okwaziirana kwange?

2.verse: Ayi Katonda wange, emisana nkukoowoola, naye tonnyanukula; n’ekiro bwe ntyo, naye siweerako.

3.verse: Songa ggwe Mutukuvu atudde ku Ntebe, era ettendo lya Isirayiri yonna.

4.verse: Bajjajjaffe baakwesiganga; baakwesiga naawe n’obawonya.

5.verse: Baakukoowoolanga n’obalokola; era baakwesiganga ne batajulirira.

6.verse: Naye nze ndi lusiriŋŋanyi, siri muntu; abantu bampisaamu amaaso, n’abalala bannyooma.

7.verse: Bonna abandaba banduulira, era banvuma nga bwe banyeenyeza omutwe nga bagamba nti,

8.verse: “Yeesiga MUKAMA; kale amuwonye. Obanga MUKAMA amwagala, kale nno amulokole!”

9.verse: Naye ggwe wanziggya mu lubuto lwa mmange, era wampa okukwesiga ne mu buto bwange bwonna nga nkyayonka.

10.verse: Olwazaalibwa ne nteekebwa mu mikono gyo; olwava mu lubuto lwa mmange n’obeera Katonda wange.

11.verse: Tobeera wala nange, kubanga emitawaana ginsemberedde, ate nga tewali mulala n’omu asobola kunnyamba.

12.verse: Zisseddume nnyingi zinneetoolodde, zisseddume enkambwe ez’e Basani zinzingizizza.

13.verse: Banjasamiza akamwa kaabwe ng’empologoma bw’ewuluguma ng’etaagulataagula omuyiggo gwayo.

14.verse: Ngiyiddwa ng’amazzi, n’amagumba gange gasowose mu nnyingo zaago. Omutima gwange guli ng’obubaane, era gusaanuukidde mu mubiri gwange.

15.verse: Amaanyi gampweddemu, gakaze ng’oluggyo; n’olulimi lwange lukutte waggulu mu kibuno kyange. Ondese awo mu nfuufu ng’omufu.

16.verse: Abantu ababi banneetoolodde; banneebunguludde ng’embwa ennyingi; banfumise ne bawummula ebibatu byange n’ebigere byange.

17.verse: Amagumba gansowose nnyinza n’okugabala. Abalabe bange bantunuulira nga bannyoomoola.

18.verse: Bagabana engoye zange; era ekyambalo kyange bakikubira akalulu.

19.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, tobeera wala nange. Ggwe, Amaanyi gange, yanguwa okunnyamba!

20.verse: Omponye okuttibwa n’ekitala; obulamu bwange obw’omuwendo butaase mu maanyi g’embwa!

21.verse: Nzigya mu kamwa k’empologoma, omponye amayembe g’embogo enkambwe.

22.verse: Nnaategezanga ku linnya lyo mu booluganda; nnaakutenderezanga mu kibiina ky’abantu.

23.verse: Mmwe abatya MUKAMA, mumutenderezenga. Abaana ba Yakobo mwenna mumugulumizenga; era mumussengamu ekitiibwa nga mumutya, mmwe abaana ba Isirayiri mwenna.

24.verse: Kubanga tanyooma kwaziirana kw’abo abali mu nnaku, era tabeekweka, wabula abaanukula bwe bamukoowoola.

25.verse: Mu ggwe mwe muva ettendo lyange mu kibiina ekinene, ne nkutendereza olw’ebyo by’onkoledde. Obweyamo bwange nnaabutuukirizanga mu maaso gaabo abakutya.

26.verse: Abaavu banaalyanga ne bakkuta, abo abanoonya MUKAMA banaamutenderezanga. Emitima gyabwe ginaajaguzanga emirembe gyonna.

27.verse: Ensi zonna zirijjukira ne zikyukira MUKAMA, ebika byonna eby’amawanga gonna birimuvuunamira.

28.verse: Kubanga obwakabaka bwonna bwa MUKAMA, era y’afuga amawanga gonna.

29.verse: Abagagga bonna ab’omu nsi balirya embaga, ne bamusinza. Bonna abagenda mu nfuufu, balimufukaamirira, abatakyali balamu.

30.verse: Ezadde lyabwe lirimuweereza; abaliddawo balibuulirwa ekigambo kya Mukama.

31.verse: N’abo abatannazaalibwa balibuulirwa obutuukirivu bwe nti, “Ekyo yakikoze.”

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. MUKAMA ye Musumba wange, seetaagenga.

2.verse: Angalamiza ne mpummulira mu ddundiro ly’omuddo omuto. Antwala awali amazzi amateefu.

3.verse: Akomyawo emmeeme yange. Annuŋŋamya okukola eby’obutuukirivu olw’erinnya lye.

4.verse: Newaakubadde nga ntambulira mu kiwonvu eky’ekisiikirize eky’olumbe, siritya kabi konna; kubanga ggwe oli nange. Oluga lwo n’omuggo gwo bye binsanyusa.

5.verse: Onsosootolera emmere abalabe bange nga balaba; onsiize amafuta ku mutwe, ekikompe kyange kiyiwa.

6.verse: Ddala ddala obulungi n’okwagala okutaggwaawo binaagendanga nange ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwange; nange nnaabeeranga mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA, ennaku zonna.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ensi ya MUKAMA n’ebigirimu byonna, n’ensi zonna n’abo abazibeeramu.

2.verse: Kubanga yasimba emisingi gyayo mu nnyanja, n’agizimba ku mazzi amangi.

3.verse: Alyambuka ku lusozi lwa MUKAMA ye afaanana atya? Era wa ngeri ki aliyingira n’ayimirira mu nnyumba ye entukuvu?

4.verse: Oyo alina omutima omulongoofu, nga n’emikono gye mirongoofu; atasinza bakatonda abalala, era atalayirira bwereere.

5.verse: Oyo MUKAMA anaamuwanga omukisa, n’obutuukirivu okuva eri Katonda ow’obulokozi bwe.

6.verse: Ogwo gwe mulembe gw’abo abakunoonya, Ayi Katonda wa Yakobo.

7.verse: Mweggulewo, mmwe bawankaaki! Muggulwewo, mmwe enzigi ez’edda, Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa ayingire.

8.verse: Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa ye ani? Ye MUKAMA ow’amaanyi era ow’obuyinza, omuwanguzi mu ntalo.

9.verse: Mweggulewo, mmwe bawankaaki, muggulwewo mmwe enzigi ez’edda! Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa ayingire.

10.verse: Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa oyo ye ani? MUKAMA Ayinzabyonna; oyo ye Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Eri ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, gye ndeeta okusaba kwange.

2.verse: Neesiga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, tondeka kuswala mu maaso g’abalabe bange. Tobaganya kumpangula.

3.verse: Ddala ddala abakwesiga tebaajulirirenga, naye ab’enkwe baliswazibwa.

4.verse: Njigiriza nga bwe nnaakolanga, Ayi MUKAMA, ondage amakubo go mwe nnaatambuliranga.

5.verse: Onjigirizenga okunywerera ku mazima go, era onkulemberenga mu byonna; kubanga ggwe Katonda, ow’obulokozi bwange era essuubi lyange liri mu ggwe olunaku lwonna.

6.verse: Jjukira, Ayi MUKAMA, okusaasira kwo okunene, n’okwagala kwo okungi, kubanga byava dda.

7.verse: Tojjukira bibi byange n’obujeemu bwange eby’omu buvubuka bwange. Onzijukire, Ayi MUKAMA, ng’okwagala kwo gye ndi bwe kuli, kubanga oli mulungi.

8.verse: MUKAMA mulungi, era wa mazima, noolwekyo ayigiriza aboonoonyi ekkubo lye.

9.verse: Abawombeefu abaluŋŋamya mu kkubo ettuufu n’abayigiriza ekkubo lye.

10.verse: Amakubo ga MUKAMA gonna gajjudde okwagala n’amazima eri abo abagondera endagaano ye n’ebiragiro bye.

11.verse: Olw’erinnya lyo, Ayi MUKAMA, onsonyiwe ebibi byange, kubanga bingi.

12.verse: Omuntu wa ngeri ki atya Katonda? Oyo gw’anaayigirizanga okukwata ekkubo lye yamulondera.

13.verse: Obulamu bwe bunajjuzibwanga emikisa gya Katonda, era bazzukulu be ensi eriba yaabwe.

14.verse: Mikwano gya MUKAMA be bo abamugondera; anaababikkuliranga ekyama eky’endagaano ye.

15.verse: Ntunuulira MUKAMA buli kiseera, kubanga yekka y’anzigya mu kabi.

16.verse: Nkyukira, Ayi MUKAMA, onkwatirwe ekisa, kubanga nsigadde bw’omu, era ndi munafu.

17.verse: Obuyinike bweyongedde mu mutima gwange; mponya okweraliikirira kwange.

18.verse: Tunuulira ennaku endiko, weetegereze obulumi bwange; onzigyeko ebibi byange byonna.

19.verse: Laba abalabe bange nga bwe beeyongedde obungi n’okunkyawa kwe bankyawamu!

20.verse: Labiriranga obulamu bwange, obamponye; tondekanga mu buswavu, kubanga ggwe kiddukiro kyange.

21.verse: Amazima n’obulongoofu bindabirirenga, essubi lyange liri mu ggwe.

22.verse: Nunula Isirayiri, Ayi Katonda, omuwonye emitawaana gye gyonna.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Onnejjeereze, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga obulamu bwange tebuliiko kya kunenyezebwa; nneesiga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, nga sibuusabuusa.

2.verse: Neetegereza, Ayi MUKAMA, ongezese; weekalirize ebiri mu mutima gwange ne mu mmeeme yange.

3.verse: Kubanga okwagala kwo kwe kunkulembera, era mu mazima go mwe ntambulira.

4.verse: Situula na bantu balimba, so siteesaganya na bakuusa.

5.verse: Nkyawa ekibiina ky’aboonoonyi; so situula na bakozi ba bibi.

6.verse: Naaba mu ngalo zange okulaga nga bwe sirina misango; ne ndyoka nzija ku Kyoto kyo, Ayi MUKAMA;

7.verse: ne nnyimba oluyimba olw’okwebaza, olwogera ku bikolwa byo ebyewuunyisa.

8.verse: Ennyumba yo mw’obeera njagala, Ayi MUKAMA, kye kifo ekijjudde ekitiibwa kyo.

9.verse: Tombalira mu boonoonyi, wadde mu batemu,

10.verse: abakozesa emikono gyabwe okutegeka ebikolwa ebibi, era abali b’enguzi.

11.verse: Naye nze ntambula nga siriiko kye nnenyezebwa; nkwatirwa ekisa, Ayi MUKAMA, ondokole.

12.verse: Nnyimiridde watereevu. Nnaatenderezanga MUKAMA mu kibiina ky’abantu ekinene.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. MUKAMA gwe musana gwange n’obulokozi bwange; ani gwe nnaatyanga? MUKAMA ge maanyi ag’obulamu bwange; ani asobola okuntiisa?

2.verse: Abalabe bange n’abantu ababi bonna bwe banannumba nga baagala okunzita, baneesittala ne bagwa.

3.verse: Newaakubadde ng’eggye linaasiisira okunneebungulula, omutima gwange teguutyenga; olutalo ne bwe lunansitukirangako, nnaabanga mugumu.

4.verse: Ekintu kimu kye nsaba MUKAMA, era ekyo kye nnoonya: okubeeranga mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwange, ne ndabanga obulungi bwa MUKAMA, era ne nsinzizanga mu Yeekaalu ye.

5.verse: Kubanga mu biseera eby’obuzibu anansuzanga mu nju ye; anankwekanga mu weema ye, n’ankuumira ku lwazi olugulumivu.

6.verse: Olwo ononnyimusanga waggulu w’abalabe bange abanneetoolodde. Nnaaweerangayo ssaddaaka mu weema ye nga bwe ntendereza n’eddoboozi ery’omwanguka olw’essanyu; nnaayimbiranga MUKAMA ennyimba ez’okumutenderezanga.

7.verse: Wulira eddoboozi lyange, Ayi MUKAMA, nga nkukoowoola; onkwatirwe ekisa onnyanukule!

8.verse: Omutima gwange guwulidde eddoboozi lyo nga lyogera nti, “Munnoonye, munsinze.” Omutima gwange ne guddamu nti, “Nnaakunoonyanga, Ayi MUKAMA.”

9.verse: Tonneekweka, so tonyiigira muweereza wo, kubanga ggw’obadde omubeezi wange bulijjo. Tonneggyaako, so tonsuula, Ayi Katonda, Omulokozi wange.

10.verse: Kitange ne mmange bwe balindeka, MUKAMA anandabiriranga.

11.verse: Njigiriza, Ayi MUKAMA, by’oyagala nkole, era onkulembere mu kkubo lyo, kubanga abalabe bange banneetoolodde.

12.verse: Tompaayo mu balabe bange, kubanga abajulizi ab’obulimba bansitukiddeko n’enkwe zaabwe, okunkambuwalira.

13.verse: Nkyakakasiza ddala nga ndiraba obulungi bwa MUKAMA mu nsi ey’abalamu.

14.verse: Lindirira MUKAMA. Ddamu amaanyi, ogume omwoyo. Weewaawo, lindirira MUKAMA.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nkukoowoola ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, Olwazi lwange, tolema kumpuliriza; kubanga bw’onoonsiriikirira nzija kuba nga bali abakkirira mu kinnya.

2.verse: Owulire eddoboozi ery’okwegayirira kwange, nga mpanise emikono gyange okwolekera ekifo kyo ekisinga byonna obutukuvu, nga nkukaabirira okunnyamba.

3.verse: Tontwalira mu boonoonyi, abakola ebibi; abanyumya obulungi ne bannaabwe, so ng’emitima gyabwe gijjudde bukyayi bwerere.

4.verse: Basasule ng’ebikolwa byabwe bwe biri, n’olw’ebyambyone bye bakoze. Basasule olwa byonna emikono gyabwe gye bisobezza, obabonereze nga bwe basaanidde.

5.verse: Olwokubanga tebafaayo ku mirimu gya MUKAMA, oba ku ebyo bye yakola n’emikono gye, alibazikiririza ddala, era talibaddiramu.

6.verse: Atenderezebwe MUKAMA, kubanga awulidde eddoboozi ly’okwegayirira kwange.

7.verse: MUKAMA ge maanyi gange, era ye ngabo yange, ye gwe neesiga. Bwe ntyo ne nyambibwa. Omutima gwange gunaajaguzanga, ne mmuyimbira ennyimba ez’okumwebazanga.

8.verse: MUKAMA y’awa abantu be amaanyi, era kye kiddukiro eky’obulokozi bw’oyo gwe yafukako amafuta.

9.verse: Olokole abantu bo, obawe omukisa abalonde bo. Obakulemberenga ng’omusumba, era obawanirirenga emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Mutendereze MUKAMA, mmwe abaana b’ab’amaanyi. Mutendereze MUKAMA n’ekitiibwa n’amaanyi.

2.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA n’ekitiibwa ekisaanira erinnya lye; musinze MUKAMA mu kitiibwa eky’obutukuvu bwe.

3.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA liwulirwa ku mazzi; Katonda ow’ekitiibwa abwatuka, n’eddoboozi lye ne liwulirwa ku mazzi amangi.

4.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA ly’amaanyi; eddoboozi lya MUKAMA lijjudde ekitiibwa.

5.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA limenya emivule; MUKAMA amenyaamenya emivule gya Lebanooni.

6.verse: Aleetera Lebanooni okubuukabuuka ng’akayana, ne Siriyooni ng’ennyana y’embogo.

7.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA libwatukira mu kumyansa.

8.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA likankanya eddungu; MUKAMA akankanya eddungu lya Kadesi.

9.verse: Eddoboozi lya MUKAMA linyoolanyoola emivule, n’emiti mu bibira ne gitasigalako makoola. Mu Yeekaalu ye, abantu bonna boogerera waggulu nti, “Ekitiibwa kibe eri MUKAMA!”

10.verse: MUKAMA atuula waggulu w’amataba ku ntebe ye ey’obwakabaka. MUKAMA ye Kabaka afuga emirembe gyonna.

11.verse: MUKAMA awa abantu be amaanyi; MUKAMA awa abantu be emirembe.

1.verse: Zabbuli n’Oluyimba. Okuwaayo Yeekaalu. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nnaakugulumizanga, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga wannyimusa; n’otoganya balabe bange kunneeyagalirako.

2.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, nakukaabirira onnyambe, n’omponya.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, omwoyo gwange waguggya emagombe, n’omponya ekinnya.

4.verse: Muyimbire MUKAMA nga mumutendereza, mmwe abatukuvu be; mutendereze erinnya lye ettukuvu.

5.verse: Kubanga obusungu bwe bwa kiseera buseera, naye obulungi bwe bwa mirembe gyonna. Amaziga gayinza okubaawo ekiro kyokka essanyu ne lijja nga bukedde.

6.verse: Bwe namala okunywera ne njogera nti, “Sigenda kusiguukululwa.”

7.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, bwe wanjagala, wanyweza olusozi lwange; naye bwe wankweka amaaso go ne neeraliikirira.

8.verse: Ggwe gwe nakoowoola, Ayi MUKAMA; ne nkukaabirira Mukama, onsaasire.

9.verse: “Kingasa ki bwe nzika mu kinnya ne nzikirira? Enfuufu eneekutenderezanga n’etegeeza abantu obwesigwa bwo?

10.verse: Mpuliriza, Ayi MUKAMA, onsaasire; Ayi MUKAMA, onnyambe.”

11.verse: Ofudde okwaziirana kwange amazina; onnyambuddemu ebibukutu, n’onnyambaza essanyu.

12.verse: Omutima gwange gulemenga kusirika busirisi, wabula gukuyimbirenga ennyimba ez’okukutenderezanga. Ayi MUKAMA, Katonda wange, nnaakwebazanga emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, ggwe kiddukiro kyange, leka nneme kuswazibwa. Ndokola mu butuukirivu bwo.

2.verse: Ontegere okutu kwo oyanguwe okunziruukirira. Beera ekiddukiro kyange eky’olwazi era ekigo eky’amaanyi eky’okumponya.

3.verse: Nga bw’oli olwazi lwange era ekigo kyange; olw’erinnya lyo onkulembebere era onnuŋŋamye.

4.verse: Omponye mu mutego gwe banteze; kubanga ggwe kiddukiro kyange.

5.verse: Nteeka omwoyo gwange mu mikono gyo; ondokole, Ayi MUKAMA, Katonda ow’amazima.

6.verse: Nkyawa abo abeesiga bakatonda abalala; nze nneesiga MUKAMA.

7.verse: Nnaajaguzanga ne nsanyukira mu kwagala kwo, kubanga olabye okubonaabona kwange era omanyi ennaku endi ku mwoyo.

8.verse: Tompaddeeyo mu balabe bange, naye otadde ebigere byange mu kifo ekigazi.

9.verse: Onsaasire, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga ndi mu nnaku nnyingi; amaaso gange gakooye olw’ennaku; omwoyo gwange n’omubiri gwange nabyo binafuye olw’obuyinike.

10.verse: Obulamu bwange buweddewo olw’obunaku n’emyaka gyange ne giggwaawo olw’okusinda. Amaanyi gampweddemu olw’okwonoona kwange, n’amagumba ganafuye.

11.verse: Abalabe bange bonna bansekerera, banneetamiddwa. Nfuuse ekyenyinyalwa mu mikwano gyange, n’abandaba mu kkubo banziruka.

12.verse: Nneerabiddwa ng’eyafa edda; nfuuse ng’ekibumbe ekyatifu.

13.verse: Buli ludda mpulirayo obwama nga bangeya; bye banteesaako nga basala olukwe okunzita.

14.verse: Naye nneesiga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA; nga njogera nti, “Oli Katonda wange.”

15.verse: Entuuko zange ziri mu mikono gyo; ondokole mu mikono gy’abalabe bange n’abangigganya.

16.verse: Amaaso go ogatunuulize omuweereza wo; ondokole n’okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo.

17.verse: Ayi MUKAMA tondeka kuswazibwa, kubanga nkukoowoola; leka abo ababi baswale, era bagalamire emagombe nga basirise.

18.verse: Akamwa kaabwe akayogera eby’obulimba kasirisibwe, kubanga boogera ebitaliimu ku batuukirivu bo, nga babyogeza amalala n’okunyooma.

19.verse: Obulungi bwo, bwe waterekera abo abakutya nga buyitirivu, n’obuwa mu lwatu abo abaddukira gy’oli.

20.verse: Obalabirira n’obawonya enkwe z’abalabe baabwe, n’obakuuma bulungi mu nnyumba yo, n’ennyombo z’abantu ne zitabatuukako.

21.verse: MUKAMA atenderezebwenga kubanga yandaga okwagala kwe okungi, bwe nnali mu kibuga kye baali bazingizza.

22.verse: Bwe natya ennyo ne njogera nti, “Ngobeddwa mu maaso go.” Kyokka wampulira nga nkukaabirira n’onsaasira.

23.verse: Mwagalenga MUKAMA abatukuvu be mwenna! MUKAMA akuuma abo abamwesiga, naye ab’amalala ababonereza mu bujjuvu.

24.verse: Muddeemu amaanyi mugume omwoyo mmwe mwenna abalina essuubi mu MUKAMA.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Alina omukisa oyo asonyiyiddwa ebyonoono bye ekibi ne kiggyibwawo.

2.verse: Alina omukisa omuntu oyo MUKAMA gw’atakyabalira kibi kye, ne mu mutima gwe nga temuli bukuusa.

3.verse: Bwe nasirikiranga ekibi kyange, ne nkogga, kubanga nasindanga olunaku lwonna.

4.verse: Wambonerezanga emisana n’ekiro, amaanyi ne ganzigwamu ng’amazzi bwe gakalira mu kyeya.

5.verse: Awo ne nkwatulira ekibi kyange, ne sibikkirira kwonoona kwange. Ne njogera nti, “Leka neenenyeze MUKAMA ebibi byange.” Bw’otyo n’onsonyiwa, n’onziggyako omusango gw’ebibi byange.

6.verse: Noolwekyo abaweereza bo bonna abeesigwa bakwegayirire ng’okyalabika; oluvannyuma ebizibu bwe birijja, ng’amazzi ag’amaanyi amangi tebiribatuukako.

7.verse: Oli kifo kyange mwe nneekweka, ononkuumanga ne situukwako kabi era ononneetooloozanga ennyimba ez’obulokozi.

8.verse: Nnaakulagiranga era ne nkuyigiriza ekkubo mw’onootambuliranga; nnaakuwanga amagezi nga bwe nkulabirira.

9.verse: Temubeeranga ng’embalaasi oba ennyumbu ezitategeera, ze bateekwa okussa ekyuma mu kamwa ekisibwa ku lukoba, ziryoke zifugibwe zijje gy’oli.

10.verse: Ababi balaba ennaku nnyingi; naye abeesiga MUKAMA bakuumirwa mu kwagala kwe okutaggwaawo.

11.verse: Musanyukire mu MUKAMA era mujaguze mmwe abatuukirivu, era muyimbire waggulu n’essanyu mmwe abalina omutima omulongoofu.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Muyimbire MUKAMA n’essanyu mmwe abatuukirivu; kisaanira abalongoofu okumutenderezanga.

2.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA n’ennanga, mumukubire ennyimba ku ntongooli ey’enkoba ekkumi.

3.verse: Mumuyimbire oluyimba oluggya; musune enkoba ze ntongooli n’amagezi nga bwe muyimba mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka olw’essanyu.

4.verse: Kubanga ekigambo kya MUKAMA kituufu era kya mazima; mwesigwa mu buli ky’akola.

5.verse: MUKAMA ayagala obutuukirivu n’obwenkanya. Ensi ejjudde okwagala kwa MUKAMA okutaggwaawo.

6.verse: MUKAMA yayogera kigambo, eggulu ne likolebwa; n’assiza omukka mu kamwa ke eggye lyonna ery’omu ggulu ne litondebwa.

7.verse: Yakuŋŋaanya amazzi g’ennyanja mu ntuumu, agayanja n’agasibira mu masitoowa gaago.

8.verse: Ensi yonna esaana etyenga MUKAMA, n’abantu ab’omu mawanga gonna bamussengamu ekitiibwa;

9.verse: kubanga yayogera bwogezi n’etondebwa, n’alagira n’eyimirira nga nywevu.

10.verse: MUKAMA asansulula enteekateeka y’amawanga; alemesa abantu okutuukiriza bye bagenderera.

11.verse: Naye enteekateeka za MUKAMA zibeerawo nga nywevu emirembe gyonna; n’ebigendererwa by’omutima gwe bya lubeerera.

12.verse: Lirina omukisa eggwanga eririna Katonda nga ye MUKAMA waalyo, ng’abantu baalyo yabalonda babeere bantu be.

13.verse: MUKAMA asinziira mu ggulu n’alaba abaana b’abantu bonna;

14.verse: asinziira mu kifo kye mw’abeera n’alaba abantu bonna abali ku nsi.

15.verse: Ye y’ategeka ebirowoozo byabwe bonna ne yeetegereza byonna bye bakola.

16.verse: Tewali kabaka asobola kuwona olw’obunene bw’eggye lye; era tewali mulwanyi ayinza kuwona olw’amaanyi ge amangi.

17.verse: Okusuubira embalaasi yokka okukuwanguza olutalo kuteganira bwerere; newaakubadde erina amaanyi mangi naye tesobola kulokola.

18.verse: Naye amaaso ga MUKAMA galabirira abo abamutya; abalina essuubi mu kwagala kwe okutaggwaawo,

19.verse: abawonya okufa, era abawonya enjala.

20.verse: Tulindirira MUKAMA nga tulina essuubi, kubanga ye mubeezi waffe era ye ngabo yaffe.

21.verse: Mu ye emitima gyaffe mwe gijaguliza, kubanga twesiga erinnya lye ettukuvu.

22.verse: Okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo kubeerenga mu ffe, Ayi MUKAMA, ng’essuubi lyaffe bwe liri mu ggwe.

1.verse: Ya Dawudi. Bwe yeefuula okuba omugu w’eddalu mu maaso ga Abimereki, oluvannyuma eyamugoba, era naye n’amuviira. Nnaagulumizanga MUKAMA buli kiseera, akamwa kange kanaamutenderezanga bulijjo.

2.verse: Omwoyo gwange guneenyumiririzanga mu MUKAMA; ababonyaabonyezebwa bawulire bajaguzenga.

3.verse: Kale tutendereze MUKAMA, ffenna tugulumizenga erinnya lye.

4.verse: Nanoonya MUKAMA, n’annyanukula; n’ammalamu okutya kwonna.

5.verse: Abamwesiga banajjulanga essanyu, era tebaaswalenga.

6.verse: Omunaku ono yakoowoola MUKAMA n’amwanukula, n’amumalako ebyali bimuteganya byonna.

7.verse: Malayika wa MUKAMA yeebungulula abo abatya MUKAMA, n’abawonya.

8.verse: Mulegeeko mulabe nga MUKAMA bw’ali omulungi! Balina omukisa abaddukira gy’ali.

9.verse: Musseemu MUKAMA ekitiibwa mmwe abatukuvu be, kubanga abamutya tebaajulenga.

10.verse: Empologoma zirumwa enjala ne ziggwaamu amaanyi; naye abo abanoonya MUKAMA, ebirungi tebiibaggwengako.

11.verse: Mujje wano baana bange, mumpulirize; mbayigirize okutya MUKAMA.

12.verse: Oyagala okuwangaala mu bulamu obulungi, okuba mu ssanyu emyaka emingi?

13.verse: Olulimi lwo lukuumenga luleme okwogera ebitasaana, n’akamwa ko kaleme okwogera eby’obulimba.

14.verse: Lekeraawo okukola ebibi, okolenga ebirungi; noonya emirembe era ogigobererenga.

15.verse: Amaaso ga MUKAMA gatunuulira abo abatuukirivu, n’amatu ge gawulira okukaaba kwabwe.

16.verse: MUKAMA amaliridde okumalawo abakola ebibi, okubasaanyizaawo ddala n’obutaddayo kujjukirwa ku nsi.

17.verse: Abatuukirivu bakoowoola MUKAMA n’abawulira n’abawonya mu byonna ebiba bibateganya.

18.verse: MUKAMA abeera kumpi n’abalina emitima egimenyese, era alokola abo abalina emyoyo egyennyise.

19.verse: Omuntu omutuukirivu ayinza n’okuba n’ebizibu bingi, naye byonna MUKAMA abimuyisaamu.

20.verse: Amagumba ge gonna MUKAMA agakuuma, ne watabaawo na limu limenyeka.

21.verse: Ekibi kiritta abakola ebibi, n’abalabe b’abatuukirivu balibonerezebwa.

22.verse: MUKAMA anunula abaweereza be; so tewali n’omu ku abo abaddukira gy’ali alibonerezebwa.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, wakanya abo abampakanya, lwanyisa abo abannwanyisa.

2.verse: Golokoka okwate engabo, n’akagabo onziruukirire.

3.verse: Galula effumu, abangigganya obazibire ekkubo; otegeeze omwoyo gwange nti, “Nze bulokozi bwo.”

4.verse: Abo bonna abannoonya okunzita bajolongebwe era baswazibwe; abo abateesa okunsanyaawo bazzibweyo ennyuma babune emiwabo.

5.verse: Babe ng’ebisusunku ebifuumuulibwa empewo, malayika wa MUKAMA ng’abagoba.

6.verse: Ekkubo lyabwe libe lya kizikiza era lijjule obuseerezi, ne malayika wa MUKAMA ng’abagoba.

7.verse: Nga bwe bantega omutego nga siriiko kye mbakoze, ne bansimira n’ekinnya mu kkubo lyange awatali nsonga,

8.verse: bazikirizibwe nga tebategedde, n’omutego gwe banteze be baba bagugwamu, era bagwe ne mu kinnya kiri bazikirire.

9.verse: Omwoyo gwange ne gulyoka gujaguliza mu MUKAMA, ne gusanyukira mu bulokozi bwe.

10.verse: Amagumba gange galyogera nti, “Ani afaanana nga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA? Kubanga abaavu obadduukirira n’obawonya ababasinza amaanyi, n’abali mu kwetaaga n’obawonya abanyazi.”

11.verse: Abajulizi abakambwe bagolokoka ne bambuuza ebintu bye sirinaako kye mmanyi.

12.verse: Bwe mbayisa obulungi bo bampisa bubi, ne banakuwaza omwoyo gwange.

13.verse: So nga bwe baalwala nanakuwala ne nnyambala ebibukutu, ne neerumya nga nsiiba, ne nsaba MUKAMA nga nkotese omutwe, naye okusaba kwange bwe kutaddibwamu,

14.verse: ne mbeera mu nnaku ng’ankungubagira ow’omukwano oba owooluganda nkoteka omutwe gwange mu buyinike ng’akaabira nnyina.

15.verse: Naye bwe nagwa mu kabi ne beekuŋŋaanya nga basanyuse; ne bannumba nga simanyi, ne bampayiriza obutata.

16.verse: Banduulidde n’ettima ng’abatamanyi Katonda bwe bakola, ne bannumira obujiji.

17.verse: Ayi Mukama, olituusa ddi ng’otunula butunuzi? Nziruukirira nga bannumba, obulamu bwange obuwonye okutaagulwataagulwa, obulamu bwange obw’omuwendo eri empologoma zino.

18.verse: Nnaakwebalizanga mu lukuŋŋaana olukulu, ne nkutenderezanga mu kibiina ky’abantu abangi ennyo.

19.verse: Tokkiriza balabe bange kunneeyagalirako, abankyawa awatali nsonga; abankyayira obwereere tobakkiriza kunziimuula.

20.verse: Teboogera bya mirembe, wabula okuwaayiriza abantu abeetuulidde emirembe mu nsi.

21.verse: Banjasamiza akamwa kaabwe ne boogera nti, “Leero luno, ky’okoze tukirabye n’amaaso gaffe.”

22.verse: Bino byonna obirabye, Ayi MUKAMA. Noolwekyo tosirika. Tonsuulirira, Ayi Mukama.

23.verse: Golokoka ojje onnyambe; nnwanirira Ayi Katonda wange era Mukama wange.

24.verse: Mu butuukirivu bwo nnejjeereza, Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange, tobaganya kunneeyagalirako.

25.verse: Tobaleka kulowooza nti, “Leero luno! Kino kye twali twagala!” Oba nti, “Tumusaanyizzaawo!”

26.verse: Abo bonna abanneeyagalirako olw’ennaku yange ne beesanyusa, batabulwetabulwe era baswazibwe; abo bonna abanneegulumirizaako baswazibwe era banyoomebwe.

27.verse: Abo abasanyuka ng’annejjeereza, baleekaanire waggulu olw’essanyu n’okujaganya; era boogerenga nti, “MUKAMA agulumizibwe, asanyuka omuweereza we ng’atebenkedde.”

28.verse: Olulimi lwange lunaayogeranga ku butuukirivu bwo, era nnaakutenderezanga olunaku lwonna.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nnina obubaka mu mutima gwange obukwata ku bwonoonyi bw’omukozi w’ebibi. N’okutya tatya Katonda.

2.verse: Ye nga bw’alaba yeewaanawaana n’atasobola kutegeera oba okukyawa ekibi kye.

3.verse: Ebigambo ebiva mu kamwa ke biba bibi era nga bya bulimba; takyalina magezi era takyakola birungi.

4.verse: Ne ku kitanda kye afumiitiriza ebibi by’anaakola; amalirira okutambuliranga mu kkubo ekyamu, era ebitali bituufu tabyewala.

5.verse: Okwagala kwo, Ayi MUKAMA, kutuuka ne ku ggulu; obwesigwa bwo butuuka ku bire.

6.verse: Obutuukirivu bwo bugulumivu ng’agasozi aganene, n’obwenkanya bwo buwanvu nnyo ng’ennyanja ennene ennyo. Ayi MUKAMA, olabirira abantu n’ebisolo.

7.verse: Okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo nga tekugeraageranyizika. Ab’ebitiibwa n’abatali ba bitiibwa baddukira mu biwaawaatiro byo.

8.verse: Balya ku bingi eby’omu nnyumba yo ne bakkuta; obawa ebyokunywa by’omugga gwo ogwesiimisa.

9.verse: Kubanga gw’olina ensulo ey’obulamu, era gw’otwakiza omusana.

10.verse: Yongeranga okwagala abo abakutegeera, era n’obutuukirivu bwo eri abo abalina emitima emirongoofu.

11.verse: Ab’amalala baleme okunninnyirira, wadde ababi okunsindiikiriza.

12.verse: Laba, ababi nga bwe bagudde! Basuuliddwa wansi era tebasobola na ku golokokawo.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Teweeraliikiriranga olw’abantu ababi, so tokwatirwanga buggya abo abakola ebitasaana.

2.verse: Kubanga bagenda kuwotoka ng’omuddo, bafiire ddala ng’essubi ekkalu.

3.verse: Weesigenga MUKAMA okolenga bulungi, onoobeeranga n’emirembe mu nsi n’ofuna ebirungi.

4.verse: Sanyukiranga mu MUKAMA, anaakuwanga omutima gwo bye gwetaaga.

5.verse: By’okola byonna byesigamyenga ku MUKAMA; mwesigenga, anaakukoleranga ky’oyagala.

6.verse: Anaayolekanga obutuukirivu bwo ng’omusana, n’obwenkanya bw’ebikolwa byo ne bwakaayakana ng’enjuba ey’omu ttuntu.

7.verse: Siriikirira awali MUKAMA, ogumiikirize ng’olindirira ky’anaakola. Tofangayo ng’abalala bafunye ebirungi nga bayita mu kutetenkanya kwabwe okubi.

8.verse: Tonyiiganga era weewale ekiruyi; teweeraliikiriranga kubanga bivaamu bibi byereere.

9.verse: Kubanga ababi balisalibwako, naye abeesiga MUKAMA baligabana ensi.

10.verse: Wanaayitawo akabanga katono ababi baggweerewo ddala; wadde mulibanoonya temulibalabako.

11.verse: Naye abateefu baligabana ensi ne beeyagalira mu ddembe eritatendeka.

12.verse: Ababi basalira abatuukirivu enkwe, ne babalumira obujiji.

13.verse: Naye Mukama asekerera ababi, kubanga amanyi ng’entuuko zaabwe ziri kumpi.

14.verse: Ababi basowoddeyo ebitala byabwe ne baleega emitego gy’obusaale, batte abaavu n’abali mu kwetaaga era basaanyeewo abo abatambulira mu kkubo eggolokofu.

15.verse: Naye ebitala byabwe birifumita mitima gyabwe gyennyini, n’emitego gyabwe egy’obusaale girimenyebwa.

16.verse: Ebitono omutuukirivu by’alina bisinga obugagga bw’ababi abangi;

17.verse: kubanga amaanyi g’abakola ebibi galikoma, naye MUKAMA anaawaniriranga abatuukirivu.

18.verse: Ennaku z’abataliiko kya kunenyezebwa, zimanyibwa MUKAMA, era omugabo gwabwe gunaabanga gwa lubeerera.

19.verse: Mu biseera eby’akabi ebyakatyabaga tebaayongoberenga, ne mu biro eby’enjala banakkusibwanga.

20.verse: Naye ababi balizikirira; abalabe ba MUKAMA balifaanana ng’obulungi bwe ttale, era baliggwaawo, baliggwaawo ng’omukka.

21.verse: Ababi beewola, ne batasasula; naye abatuukirivu basaasira era bagaba bingi.

22.verse: Abo MUKAMA b’awa omukisa baligabana ensi, naye abo b’akolimira balizikirizibwa.

23.verse: MUKAMA bw’asanyukira ekkubo ly’omuntu, aluŋŋamya entambula ye.

24.verse: Ne bw’aneesittalanga, taagwenga wansi, kubanga omukono gwa MUKAMA gumuwanirira.

25.verse: Nnali muto kati nkaddiye, naye sirabanga batuukirivu nga balekeddwa ttayo, wadde abaana baabwe nga basabiriza ekyokulya.

26.verse: Bagaba bingi bulijjo, era baazika ku byabwe n’essanyu. Abaana baabwe banaaweebwanga omukisa.

27.verse: Muve mu bibi, mukolenga ebirungi, munaabanga balamu emirembe gyonna.

28.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA ayagala ab’amazima, n’abeesigwa be taabaabulirenga. Banaalabirirwanga emirembe gyonna; naye ezzadde ly’ababi lirizikirizibwa.

29.verse: Abatuukirivu baligabana ensi ne babeeranga omwo emirembe gyonna.

30.verse: Akamwa k’omutuukirivu koogera bya magezi, n’olulimi lwe lwogera bya mazima.

31.verse: Amateeka ga Katonda we gali mu mutima gwe, era ebigere bye tebiseerera.

33.verse: naye MUKAMA taliganya babi kuwangula, wadde okukkiriza abatuukirivu okusingibwa omusango.

34.verse: Lindirira MUKAMA n’okugumiikiriza, otambulirenga mu makubo ge; naye alikugulumiza n’akuwa ensi; ababi bwe balisalirwako olikitegeera.

35.verse: Nalaba omuntu omubi era omukambwe ennyo, naye nga buli ky’akola kimugendera bulungi, ng’agimuse ng’omuti ogukulidde mu ttaka eggimu,

36.verse: naye teyalwawo n’abula, ne mmumagamaga buli wantu, nga talabikako.

37.verse: Tunuulira omuntu ataliiko kya kunenyezebwa, wekkaanye oyo omulongoofu; obulamu bwe bunajjulanga emirembe.

38.verse: Naye aboonoonyi bonna balizikirizibwa; ezzadde ly’ababi lirisaanyizibwawo.

39.verse: Obulokozi bw’abatuukirivu buva eri MUKAMA; ye ky’ekigo kyabwe ekinywevu gye baddukira mu kiseera eky’emitawaana.

40.verse: MUKAMA abayamba n’abalokola; abaggya mu mikono gy’ababi n’abalokola, kubanga gy’ali gye baddukira.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi, ey’okujjukiza. Ayi MUKAMA tonnenya ng’okyaliko obusungu, oba okunkangavvula ng’oliko ekiruyi.

2.verse: Kubanga obusaale bwo bunfumise, n’omuggo gwo gunkubye nnyo.

3.verse: Obusungu bwo bundwazizza nzenna, n’amagumba gange gonna gansagala olw’ebyonoono byange.

4.verse: Omusango gwe nzizizza guyitiridde, gunzitoowerera ng’omugugu omunene oguteetikkika.

5.verse: Ebiwundu byange bitanye era biwunya, olw’okwonoona kwange okw’obusirusiru.

6.verse: Nkootakoota era mpweddemu ensa, ŋŋenda nsinda obudde okuziba.

7.verse: Omugongo gunnuma nnyo, ne mu mubiri gwange temukyali bulamu.

8.verse: Sikyalimu maanyi era nzenna mmenyesemenyese; nsinda buli bbanga olw’obulumi mu mutima.

9.verse: Mukama, bye neetaaga byonna obimanyi, n’okusinda kwange okuwulira.

10.verse: Omutima gumpejjawejja, amaanyi gampweddemu; n’okulaba sikyalaba.

11.verse: Mikwano gyange ne be nayitanga nabo banneewala olw’amabwa gange; ne bannange tebakyansemberera.

12.verse: Abaagala okunzita bantega emitego, n’abo abangigganya bateesa okummalawo. Buli bbanga baba bateesa kunkola kabi.

13.verse: Ndi ng’omuggavu w’amatu, atawulira; nga kiggala, atayogera.

14.verse: Nfuuse ng’omuntu atalina ky’awulira, atasobola kwanukula.

15.verse: Ddala ddala nnindirira ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, onnyanukule, Ayi Mukama Katonda wange.

16.verse: Tobakkiriza kunneeyagalirako, oba okunneegulumirizaako ng’ekigere kyange kiseeredde.

17.verse: Kubanga nsemberedde okugwa, era nga nnumwa buli kiseera.

18.verse: Ddala ddala njatula ebyonoono byange; nnumirizibwa ekibi kyange.

19.verse: Abalabe bange bangi era ba maanyi; n’abo abankyayira obwereere bangi nnyo.

20.verse: Abalabe bange bankyawa olw’okuba omulongoofu, era bwe nkola ebirungi banjogerako ebitasaana.

21.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, tonjabulira; tobeera wala nange, Ayi Katonda wange.

22.verse: Ayi Mukama Omulokozi wange, yanguwa okumbeera.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi: Ya Yedusuni. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nagamba nti, “Nneekuumanga mu bye nkola, n’olulimi lwange lulemenga okwogera ebitali birongoofu. Abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu bwe banaabanga awamu nange nnaabuniranga bubunizi ne soogera.”

2.verse: Naye bwe nasirika ne sibaako kye njogedde wadde ekirungi, ate obuyinike bwange ne bweyongera.

3.verse: Omutima gwange ne gumbabuukirira munda yange. Bwe nnali nkyakifumiitirizaako, omuliro ne gukoleera munda yange; kyenava njogera nti:

4.verse: “Ayi MUKAMA, ntegeeza entuuko zange nga bwe ziriba, n’ennaku ze nsigazza; ommanyise ebiseera byange mu bulamu buno bwe biri ebimpi ennyo.”

5.verse: Ennaku z’obulamu bwange wazitegeka ziri ng’oluta. Obungi bw’emyaka gyange tobulabamu kantu. Buli muntu, mukka bukka.

6.verse: Ddala ddala omuntu ku nsi ali ng’ekisiikirize. Atawaana mu kino ne mu kiri, naye byonna butaliimu. Akuŋŋaanya obugagga, so nga tamanyi agenda kubutwala.

7.verse: Naye kaakano, Ayi Mukama, nnoonya ki? Essuubi lyange liri mu ggwe.

8.verse: Ondokole mu bibi byange byonna, abasirusiru baleme okunsekerera.

9.verse: Nasirika busirisi, saayasamya kamwa kange; kubanga kino ggwe wakikola.

10.verse: Olekere awo okunkuba, emiggo gy’onkubye giyitiridde!

11.verse: Onenya omuntu ng’omukangavvula olw’ekibi kye ky’akola, omumaliramu ddala ensa, ng’ennyenje bw’ekola olugoye. Ddala omuntu mukka bukka.

12.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, wulira okusaba kwange, owulire okukaaba kwange onnyambe. Tonsiriikirira nga nkukaabirira. Kubanga ndi mugenyi bugenyi, omutambuze, nga bajjajjange bonna bwe baali.

13.verse: Ndeka nsanyukemu, nga sinnava mu nsi muno, ne mbulirawo ddala.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nalindirira MUKAMA n’obugumiikiriza, n’antegera okutu, n’awulira okukoowoola kwange,

2.verse: n’anziggya mu kinnya eky’entiisa, n’annyinyulula mu bitosi, n’anteeka ku lwazi olugumu kwe nyimiridde.

3.verse: Anjigirizza oluyimba oluggya, oluyimba olw’okutenderezanga Katonda waffe. Bangi bino balibiraba ne batandika okutya MUKAMA n’okumwesiganga.

4.verse: Balina omukisa abo abeesiga MUKAMA, abatagoberera ba malala abasinza bakatonda ab’obulimba.

5.verse: Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange, otukoledde eby’ewunyisa bingi. Ebintu by’otuteekeddeteekedde tewali ayinza kubikutegeeza. Singa ngezaako okubittottola, sisobola kubimalayo byonna olw’obungi bwabyo.

6.verse: Ssaddaaka n’ebiweebwayo tewabyagala. Ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa olw’okutangirira ebibi, tobyetaaga. Naye onzigudde amatu.

7.verse: Kyenava njogera nti, “Nzuuno, nzize nga bwe kyampandiikibwako mu muzingo gw’ekitabo.”

8.verse: Nsanyukira okukola ky’oyagala, Ayi Katonda wange, kubanga amateeka go gali mu mutima gwange.

9.verse: Ntegeeza obutuukirivu mu lukuŋŋaana olunene. Sisirika busirisi, nga naawe bw’omanyi, Ayi MUKAMA.

10.verse: Bye mmanyi ku butuukirivu bwo sisirika nabyo mu mutima gwange, naye ntegeeza ku bwesigwa bwo n’obulokozi bwo. Abantu nga bakuŋŋaanye, sirema kubategeeza ku mazima go n’okwagala kwo okungi.

11.verse: Onsasirenga bulijjo, Ayi MUKAMA, amazima n’okwagala kwo byeyongerenga okunkuuma.

12.verse: Kubanga ebizibu bye siyinza na kubala binneetoolodde; ebibi byange binsukiridde, sikyasobola na kulaba; bisinga enviiri ez’oku mutwe gwange obungi, mpweddemu amaanyi.

13.verse: Onsasire ayi MUKAMA ondokole; Ayi MUKAMA, oyanguwe okumbeera.

14.verse: Abo abaagala okunzita batabuketabuke baswale; n’abo bonna abagenderera okummalawo bagobebwe nga baswadde.

15.verse: Abo abankubira akasonso baswazibwe nnyo.

16.verse: Naye abo abakunoonya basanyuke era bajaguze; abo abaagala obulokozi bwo boogerenga bulijjo nti, “MUKAMA agulumizibwenga.”

17.verse: Ndi mwavu, eyeetaaga ennyo. Mukama ondowoozeeko. Tolwawo, Ayi Katonda wange. Ggwe mubeezi wange era Omulokozi wange.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Alina omukisa asaasira omunaku; MUKAMA amulokola ku lunaku olw’akabi.

2.verse: MUKAMA anaamukuumanga anaawonyanga obulamu bwe, era anaamuwanga omukisa mu nsi; n’atamuwaayo eri okwegomba kw’abalabe be.

3.verse: MUKAMA anaamujjanjabanga nga mulwadde; n’amuwonya mu bulumi.

4.verse: Nayogera nti, “Ayi MUKAMA onsaasire omponye; kubanga nnyonoonye mu maaso go.”

5.verse: Abalabe bange boogeza obukyayi nti, “Alifa ddi n’okwerabirwa ne yeerabirwa?”

6.verse: Bwe bajja okundaba beefuula mikwano gyange; naye munda yaabwe bankyawa era basanyuka okulaba nga ngalamidde awo nnumwa. Bwe bansiibula bagenda beesekera nga bwe baduula.

7.verse: Abalabe bange bonna abo bateesa mu kaama; nga banjogerako ebitali birungi.

8.verse: Boogera nti, “Endwadde emukutte mbi nnyo, emukubye wansi tayinza kuwona.”

9.verse: Era ne mukwano gwange gwe neesiganga bwe twalyanga, anneefuukidde.

10.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, onsaasire, onzizeemu amaanyi ndyoke nneesasuze.

11.verse: Mmanyi ng’onsanyukira, kubanga omulabe wange tampangudde.

12.verse: Onnywezezza mu bwesimbu bwange, ne mbeera mu maaso go ennaku zonna.

13.verse: Atenderezebwenga MUKAMA Katonda wa Isirayiri, oyo eyabaawo okuva edda n’edda lyonna n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna. Amiina era Amiina.

1.verse: EKITABO II - Zabbuli 42–72Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi: Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Ng’empeewo bw’ewejjawejja olw’amazzi, n’emmeeme yange bw’etyo bwe wejjawejja ku lulwo, Ayi Katonda.

2.verse: Emmeeme yange eyaayaanira Katonda, Katonda omulamu. Ndigenda ddi ne nsisinkana Katonda?

3.verse: Nkaabirira MUKAMA emisana n’ekiro. Amaziga gange gabadde emmere yange emisana n’ekiro, abantu ne baŋŋamba nti, “Katonda wo ali ludda wa?”

4.verse: Bino mbijjukira nga nfuka emmeeme yange nga bwe nagendanga n’ekibiina ekinene, ne nkulembera ennyiriri z’abantu empanvu, nga tugenda mu nnyumba ya Katonda, nga tuyimba mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka n’okwebaza mu kibiina ekijaguza.

5.verse: Lwaki oweddemu amaanyi ggwe emmeeme yange? Lwaki otabusetabuse mu nda yange? Essuubi lyo liteeke mu Katonda, kubanga natenderezanga omulokozi wange era Katonda wange; ye mubeezi wange.

6.verse: Ayi Katonda wange, emmeeme yange yennyise, yeeraliikiridde; naye nkujjukira olw’ebyo bye wakola mu nsi ya Yoludaani ne ku nsozi engulumivu eza Kalumooni ne ku Lusozi Mizali.

7.verse: Obuziba bukoowoola obuziba, olw’okuwuluguma kw’ebiyiriro amayengo n’amasingisira go bimpiseeko.

8.verse: MUKAMA alaga okwagala kwe emisana n’ekiro ne muyimbira oluyimba lwe; y’essaala eri Katonda w’obulamu bwange.

9.verse: Ŋŋamba Katonda, olwazi lwange nti, “Lwaki onneerabidde? Lwaki ŋŋenda nkungubaga olw’okujoogebwa abalabe bange?”

10.verse: Mbonyaabonyezebwa ng’abalabe bange bancocca, nga bwe bagamba buli kiseera nti, “Katonda wo ali ludda wa?”

11.verse: Lwaki wennyise Ayi ggwe emmeeme yange? Lwaki otabusetabuse mu nda yange? Weesigenga Katonda, kubanga nnaamutenderezanga, Omulokozi wange era ye Katonda wange.

1.verse: Ayi Katonda, onnejjeereze omponye eggwanga eritatya Katonda ondokole mu mikono gy’abantu abalimba, abakola ebibi.

2.verse: Ddala ddala ggwe Katonda, ekigo kyange eky’amaanyi. Lwaki ondese? Lwaki ŋŋenda nkaaba nga nnyigirizibwa omulabe?

3.verse: Kale tuma omusana gwo n’amazima binnuŋŋamye; bindeete ku lusozi lwo olutukuvu, mu kifo mw’obeera.

4.verse: Ne ndyoka ndaga ku kyoto kya Katonda, eri Katonda wange era essanyu lyange eritasingika. Weewaawo nnaakutenderezanga n’ennanga, Ayi Katonda, Katonda wange.

5.verse: Lwaki wennyise ggwe emmeeme yange? Lwaki otabusetabuse munda yange? Weesige Katonda; kubanga nnaamutenderezanga, Omulokozi wange era Katonda wange.

1.verse: Ya mukulu wa bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Ayi Katonda, twawulira n’amatu gaffe, bajjajjaffe baatubuulira, ebyo bye wakola mu biro byabwe, mu nnaku ez’edda ezaayita.

2.verse: Nga bwe wagoba amawanga mu nsi n’ogiwa bajjajjaffe, wasaanyaawo amawanga n’okulaakulanya bajjajjaffe.

3.verse: Ekitala kyabwe si kye kyabaleetera okuwangula ensi, n’omukono gwabwe si gwe gwabalokola; wabula baawangula n’omukono gwo ogwa ddyo awamu n’obulungi bwo, kubanga wabaagala.

4.verse: Ggwe oli Kabaka wange, era Katonda wange; awa Yakobo obuwanguzi.

5.verse: Ku lulwo tunaawangulanga abalabe baffe; ku lw’erinnya lyo tunaalinnyiriranga abalabe baffe.

6.verse: Ddala ddala omutego gwange ogw’obusaale si gwe neesiga, n’ekitala kyange si kye kimpa obuwanguzi.

7.verse: Wabula ggwe otulokola mu balabe baffe, n’oswaza abo abatuyigganya.

8.verse: Twenyumiririza mu Katonda olunaku lwonna. Era tunaatenderezanga erinnya lyo emirembe gyonna.

9.verse: Naye kaakano otusudde ne tuswala; era tokyatabaala na magye gaffe.

10.verse: Watuzza emabega okuva mu bifo mwe twali ng’abalabe baffe balaba, abatuyigganya ne batunyaga.

11.verse: Watuwaayo okuliibwa ng’endiga; n’otusaasaanya mu mawanga.

12.verse: Watunda abantu bo omuwendo mutono nnyo, n’otobaako ky’oganyulwa.

13.verse: Watufuula ekivume eri baliraanwa baffe, ekinyoomebwa era ekisekererwa abo abatwetoolodde.

14.verse: Otufudde ekinyoomebwa mu mawanga gonna; era abantu banyeenya emitwe gyabwe.

15.verse: Nswazibwa obudde okuziba, amaaso gange ne gajjula ensonyi,

16.verse: olw’abo abangigganya, abanvuma nga tebandabamu ka buntu, olw’omulabe amaliridde okuwoolera eggwanga.

17.verse: Ebyo byonna bitutuseeko, newaakubadde nga tetukwerabidde, wadde obutagondera ndagaano yo.

18.verse: Omutima gwaffe tegukuvuddeeko, so tetugaanyi kutambulira mu kkubo lyo.

19.verse: Naye ggwe otubonerezza n’otulekera emisege, n’otuleka mu kizikiza ekikutte.

20.verse: Ddala singa twerabira erinnya lya Katonda waffe, ne tusinza katonda omulala,

21.verse: ekyo Katonda waffe teyandikizudde? Kubanga ye amanyi n’ebikisibwa mu mutima.

22.verse: Katonda waffe, tetukuvuddeeko, kubanga ku lulwo tuttibwa obudde okuziba, era tuli ng’endiga ez’okusalibwa.

23.verse: Golokoka Ayi Mukama, lwaki weebase? Zuukuka! Totusuula Ayi Mukama!

24.verse: Lwaki otwekwese? Lwaki tofaayo ku kulumwa kwaffe n’okujoogebwa?

25.verse: Ddala ddala tusuuliddwa mu nfuufu; tuli ku ttaka.

26.verse: Golokoka otuyambe; tulokole olw’okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Oluyimba “olw’Amalanga.” Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Omutima gwange gujjudde ebigambo ebirungi nga nnyimba oluyimba lwa Kabaka. Olulimi lwange kkalaamu y’omuwandiisi omukugu.

2.verse: Ggw’osinga abaana b’abantu obulungi; n’akamwa ko nga kafukiddwako amafuta ag’ekisa. Kubanga Katonda akuwadde omukisa emirembe gyonna.

3.verse: Weesibe ekitala kyo, Ayi ggwe ow’amaanyi, yambala ekitiibwa kyo n’obukulu bwo!

4.verse: Weebagale embalaasi yo mu kitiibwa kyo eky’obuwanguzi, ng’olwanirira amazima, obuwombeefu, n’obutuukirivu. Omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gukole ebyewuunyisa.

5.verse: Obusaale bwo obwogi bufumite emitima gy’abalabe ba kabaka; afuge amawanga.

6.verse: Entebe yo ey’obwakabaka, Ayi Katonda, ya lubeerera; n’omuggo ogw’obwenkanya gwe guliba ogw’obwakabaka bwo.

7.verse: Oyagala obutuukirivu n’okyawa okukola ebibi; noolwekyo Katonda, Katonda wo, kyavudde akugulumiza n’akufukako amafuta ag’essanyu okusinga bakabaka banno bonna.

8.verse: Ebyambalo byo birina akawoowo ka mmooli ne alowe, ne kasiya. Ebivuga eby’enkoba bikusanyusiza mu mbiri zo ez’amasanga.

9.verse: Mu bakyala bo mulimu abambejja; namasole ali ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo ng’ayambadde ebya zaabu ya Ofiri.

10.verse: Muwala, wuliriza bye nkugamba: “Weerabire ab’ewammwe n’ab’omu nnyumba ya kitaawo.

11.verse: Kabaka akulowoozaako nnyo, kubanga walungiwa n’oyitirira; nga bw’ali mukama wo, muwenga ekitiibwa.”

12.verse: Muwala w’e Ttuulo alijja n’ekirabo, abasajja abagagga balikwegayirira obalage ekisa kyo.

13.verse: Omuwala wa kabaka ajjudde ekitiibwa mu kisenge kye, ng’ayambadde ekyambalo ekyalukibwa ne zaabu.

14.verse: Aleetebwa mu maaso ga kabaka ng’ayambadde ebyambalo eby’emidalizo emingi. Emperekeze ze zimuwerekerako; bonna ne bajja gy’oli.

15.verse: Baleetebwa nga bajjudde essanyu n’okweyagala, ne bayingira mu lubiri lwa kabaka.

16.verse: Batabani bo baliweebwa ebifo bya bajjajjaabwe, olibafuula ng’abalangira mu nsi omwo.

17.verse: Erinnya lyo linajjukirwanga emirembe gyonna. Amawanga kyeganaavanga gakutendereza emirembe n’emirembe.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi: Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Katonda kye kiddukiro kyaffe, era ge maanyi gaffe; omubeezi ddala atabulawo mu kulaba ennaku.

2.verse: Kyetunaavanga tulema okutya, ensi ne bw’eneeyuuguumanga, ensozi ne bwe zinaasiguulukukanga ne zigwa mu buziba bw’ennyanja;

3.verse: amazzi g’ennyanja ne bwe ganaayiranga ne gabimba ejjovu ensozi ne zikankana olw’okwetabula kwago.

4.verse: Waliwo omugga, emyala gyagwo gisanyusa ekibuga kya Katonda, kye kifo ekitukuvu ekya Katonda Ali Waggulu Ennyo.

5.verse: Tekirigwa kubanga Katonda mw’abeera. Katonda anaakirwaniriranga ng’obudde bunaatera okukya.

6.verse: Amawanga geetabula, obwakabaka bugwa; ayimusa eddoboozi lye ensi n’esaanuuka.

7.verse: MUKAMA ow’Eggye ali naffe, Katonda wa Yakobo kye kigo kyaffe.

8.verse: Mujje, mulabe MUKAMA by’akola, mulabe nga bw’afaafaaganya ensi.

9.verse: Y’akomya entalo mu nsi yonna; akutula emitego gy’obusaale, effumu alimenyaamenya; amagaali n’engabo abyokya omuliro.

10.verse: Musiriikirire mutegeere nga nze Katonda. Nnaagulumizibwanga mu mawanga. Nnaagulumizibwanga mu nsi.

11.verse: Katonda ow’Eggye ali naffe; Katonda wa Yakobo kye kigo kyaffe.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Mukube mu ngalo mmwe amawanga gonna; muyimuse amaloboozi muyimbire nnyo Katonda ennyimba ez’essanyu;

2.verse: MUKAMA Ali Waggulu Ennyo wa ntiisa. Ye Kabaka afuga ensi yonna.

3.verse: Yatujeemululira abantu, n’atujeemululira amawanga ne tugafuga.

4.verse: Yatulondera omugabo gwaffe, Yakobo gw’ayagala mwe yeenyumiririza.

5.verse: Katonda alinnye waggulu ng’atenderezebwa mu maloboozi ag’essanyu eringi. MUKAMA alinnye nga n’amakondeere gamuvugira.

6.verse: Mutendereze Katonda, mumutendereze. Mumutendereze Kabaka waffe, mumutendereze.

7.verse: Kubanga Katonda ye Kabaka w’ensi yonna, mumutendereze ne Zabbuli ey’ettendo.

8.verse: Katonda afuga amawanga gonna; afuga amawanga ng’atudde ku ntebe ye entukuvu.

9.verse: Abakungu bannaggwanga bakuŋŋanye ng’abantu ba Katonda wa Ibulayimu; kubanga Katonda y’afuga abakulembeze b’ensi. Katonda agulumizibwenga nnyo.

1.verse: Oluyimba. Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. MUKAMA mukulu, asaanira okutenderezebwa ennyo mu kibuga kya Katonda waffe, ku lusozi lwe olutukuvu.

2.verse: Sayuuni lwe lusozi lwe olulungi olugulumivu, olusanyusa ensi yonna. Ku ntikko Zafoni kwe kuli ekibuga kya Kabaka Omukulu;

3.verse: Katonda mw’abeera; yeeraze okuba ekigo kye.

4.verse: Kale laba, bakabaka b’ensi baakuŋŋaana ne bakyolekera bakirumbe;

5.verse: bwe baakituukako ne bakyewuunya, ne batya nnyo ne badduka;

6.verse: nga bakankana, ne bajjula obulumi ng’omukazi alumwa okuzaala.

7.verse: Wabazikiriza ng’omuyaga ogw’ebuvanjuba bwe guzikiriza ebyombo by’e Talusiisi.

8.verse: Ebyo bye twawuliranga obuwulizi, kaakano tubirabye mu kibuga kya MUKAMA ow’Eggye, mu kibuga kya Katonda waffe, kyalinywereza ddala emirembe gyonna.

9.verse: Ayi Katonda, tufumiitiriza ku kwagala kwo okutaggwaawo nga tuli mu Yeekaalu yo.

10.verse: Erinnya lyo nga bwe liri ekkulu, Ayi Katonda, bw’otyo bw’otenderezebwa mu nsi yonna. Omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gujjudde obuwanguzi.

11.verse: Sanyuka gwe Sayuuni, musanyuke mmwe ebibuga bya Yuda; kubanga Katonda alamula bya nsonga.

12.verse: Mutambule mu Sayuuni, mukibune; mubale n’ebigo byakyo.

13.verse: Mwekalirize nnyo munda wa bbugwe waakyo n’olusiisira lw’amaggye lwamu lwonna; mulyoke mutegeeze ab’emirembe egiriddawo.

14.verse: Kubanga Katonda ono, ye Katonda waffe emirembe gyonna; y’anaatuluŋŋamyanga ennaku zonna okutuusa okufa.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Batabani ba Koola. Muwulire mmwe amawanga gonna, mutege amatu mmwe mwenna abali mu nsi.

2.verse: Ab’ekitiibwa n’abakopi, abagagga n’abaavu, mwenna; muwulirize ebigambo byange.

3.verse: Kubanga ebigambo by’omu kamwa kange bya magezi, ebiva mu mutima gwange bijjudde okutegeera.

4.verse: Nnaakozesanga ebikwata ku ngero, nga nnyinnyonnyola amakulu gaazo n’oluyimba ku nnanga.

5.verse: Siityenga ne bwe nnaabanga mu buzibu; newaakubadde ng’abalabe bange banneetoolodde,

6.verse: abantu abeesiga obugagga bwabwe beenyumiririza mu bintu ebingi bye balina.

7.verse: Ddala ddala, tewali muntu ayinza kununula bulamu bwa munne, wadde okwegula okuva eri Katonda.

8.verse: Kubanga omuwendo ogununula obulamu munene nnyo, tewali n’omu agusobola;

9.verse: alyoke awangaale ennaku zonna nga tatuuse magombe.

10.verse: Kubanga n’abantu abagezi bafa; abasirusiru n’abatalina magezi bonna baaggwaawo, obugagga bwabwe ne babulekera abalala.

11.verse: Entaana zaabwe ge ganaabanga amaka gaabwe ennaku zonna; nga bye bisulo ebya buli mulembe oguliddawo; baafuna ettaka mu mannya gaabwe.

12.verse: Omuntu tabeerera mirembe gyonna, ne bw’aba mugagga atya, alifa ng’ensolo bwe zifa.

13.verse: Ako ke kabi akatuuka ku beesiga ebitaliimu, era ye nkomerero y’abo abeesiga obugagga bwabwe.

14.verse: Okufaanana ng’endiga, bateekwa kufa; olumbe ne lubalya. Bakka butereevu emagombe, obulungi bwabwe ne bubula, amagombe ne gafuuka amaka gaabwe.

15.verse: Naye Katonda alinunula emmeeme yange mu magombe, ddala ddala alintwala gy’ali.

16.verse: Omuntu bw’agaggawalanga n’ekitiibwa ky’ennyumba ye nga kyeyongedde, tomutyanga,

17.verse: kubanga bw’alifa taliiko ky’alitwala, wadde n’ekitiibwa kye tekirigenda naye.

18.verse: Newaakubadde nga mu bulamu yeerowoozaako ng’aweereddwa omukisa kubanga omugagga abantu bamugulumiza,

19.verse: kyokka alikka emagombe eri bajjajjaabe, n’ayingira mu kizikiza ekikutte.

20.verse: Omuntu omugagga naye nga simutegeevu tabeerera mirembe gyonna, alizikirira ng’ensolo ez’omu nsiko.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Asafu. Oyo Owaamaanyi, MUKAMA Katonda, akoowoola ensi okuva enjuba gy’eva okutuuka gy’egwa.

2.verse: Katonda ayakaayakana ng’ava mu Sayuuni n’obulungi bw’ekitiibwa kye ekituukiridde.

3.verse: Katonda waffe ajja, naye tajja kasirise, omuliro ogusaanyaawo buli kintu gwe gumukulembera, n’omuyaga ogw’amaanyi ne gumwetooloola.

4.verse: Akoowoola abali mu ggulu ne ku nsi, azze okusalira abantu be omusango.

5.verse: Agamba nti, “Munkuŋŋaanyize abantu bange abaayawulibwa, abaakola nange endagaano nga bawaayo ssaddaaka.”

6.verse: Eggulu litegeeza obutuukirivu bwa Katonda kubanga Katonda yennyini ye mulamuzi.

7.verse: “Muwulirize, mmwe abantu bange, nange nnaayogera. Ggwe Isirayiri bino bye nkuvunaana: Nze Katonda, Katonda wo.

8.verse: Sikunenya lwa ssaddaaka zo, oba ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa by’ossa mu maaso gange bulijjo.

9.verse: Sikyakkiriza nte nnume n’emu evudde mu kiralo kyo, wadde embuzi ennume ezivudde mu bisibo byo.

10.verse: Kubanga buli nsolo ey’omu kibira yange, awamu n’ente eziri ku nsozi olukumi.

11.verse: Ennyonyi zonna ez’oku nsozi nzimanyi, n’ebiramu byonna eby’omu nsiko byange.

12.verse: Singa nnumwa enjala sandikubuulidde: kubanga ensi n’ebigirimu byonna byange.

13.verse: Ndya ennyama y’ente ennume, wadde okunywa omusaayi gw’embuzi?

14.verse: “Owangayo ssaddaaka ey’okwebaza eri Katonda; era otuukirizanga obweyamo bwo eri oyo Ali Waggulu Ennyo.

15.verse: Bw’obanga mu buzibu, nnaakuwonyanga, naawe onongulumizanga.”

16.verse: Naye omubi Katonda amugamba nti, “Lekeraawo okwatulanga amateeka gange, n’endagaano yange togyogerangako.
