5.verse: Ayi MUKAMA ebiragiro byo binywevu, n’obutukuvu bujjudde ennyumba yo, ennaku zonna.

1.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, ggwe Katonda awalana eggwanga, ggwe Katonda awalana eggwanga, labika omasemase.

2.verse: Golokoka, Ayi ggwe Omulamuzi w’ensi, osasule ab’amalala nga bwe kibagwanidde.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, omukozi w’ebibi alikomya ddi? Omukozi w’ebibi alituusa ddi ng’asanyuka?

4.verse: Bafukumula ebigambo eby’okwewaanawaana; abakola ebibi bonna beepankapanka.

5.verse: Babetenta abantu bo, Ayi MUKAMA, babonyaabonya ezzadde lyo.

6.verse: Batta nnamwandu n’omutambuze; ne batemula ataliiko kitaawe.

7.verse: Ne boogera nti, “Katonda talaba; Katonda wa Yakobo tafaayo.”

8.verse: Mwerinde mmwe abantu abatategeera. Mmwe abasirusiru muligeziwala ddi?

9.verse: Oyo eyatonda okutu tawulira? Oyo eyakola eriiso talaba?

10.verse: Oyo akangavvula amawanga, taakubonereze? Oyo ayigiriza abantu talina ky’amanyi?

11.verse: MUKAMA amanyi ebirowoozo by’abantu; amanyi nga mukka bukka.

12.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, alina omukisa oyo gw’ogunjula, gw’oyigiriza eby’omu mateeka go;

13.verse: omuwummuzaako mu kabi kaalimu, okutuusa abakola ebibi lwe balisimirwa ekinnya.

14.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA talireka bantu be; talyabulira zzadde lye.

15.verse: Aliramula mu butuukirivu, n’abo abalina emitima emigolokofu bwe banaakolanga.

16.verse: Ani alinnwanyisizaako abakola ebibi? Ani alinnwanirira eri abakola ebibi?

17.verse: Singa MUKAMA teyali mubeezi wange, omwoyo gwange gwandiserengese emagombe.

18.verse: Bwe naleekaana nti, “Nseerera!” Okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo, Ayi MUKAMA, ne kumpanirira.

19.verse: Ebyeraliikiriza omutima gwange bwe byayitirira obungi, okusaasira kwo ne kuzzaamu omwoyo gwange amaanyi.

20.verse: Oyinza okukolagana n’obufuzi obukyamu, obukaabya abantu n’amateeka gaabwe?

21.verse: Abakola ebibi beegatta ne balumbagana abatuukirivu; atasobezza ne bamusalira ogw’okufa.

22.verse: Naye MUKAMA afuuse ekiddukiro kyange eky’amaanyi; ye Katonda wange, era Olwazi lwange mwe neekweka.

23.verse: MUKAMA alibabonereza olw’ebibi byabwe, n’abazikiriza olw’ebyonoono byabwe; MUKAMA Katonda waffe alibamalirawo ddala.

1.verse: Mujje tuyimbire MUKAMA; tuyimbire waggulu n’essanyu nga tutendereza MUKAMA Olwazi olw’obulokozi bwaffe.

2.verse: Tujje mu maaso ge n’okwebaza; tumuyimbire ennyimba ez’okumutendereza.

3.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA ye Katonda Omukulu; era Kabaka Omukulu asinga bakatonda bonna.

4.verse: Enkonko ez’ensi ziri mu mukono gwe; n’entikko z’ensozi nazo zize.

5.verse: Ennyanja yiye, kubanga ye yagikola; n’emikono gye, gye gyabumba olukalu.

6.verse: Mujje tusinze tuvuuname mu maaso ge; tufukamire mu maaso ga MUKAMA, Omutonzi waffe.

7.verse: Kubanga ye Katonda waffe, naffe tuli bantu ab’omu ddundiro lye, era tuli ndiga ze z’alabirira. Olwa leero bwe muwulira eddoboozi lye,

8.verse: “Temukakanyaza mitima gyammwe nga bwe kyali e Meriba, ne ku lunaku luli e Maasa mu ddungu;

9.verse: bajjajjammwe gye bangezesa; newaakubadde baali baalaba dda ebyamagero bye nakola.

10.verse: Abantu b’omulembe ogwo ne mbasunguwalira okumala emyaka amakumi ana; ne ŋŋamba nti, ‘Be bantu abakyama mu mutima gwabwe, era tebamanyi makubo gange.’

11.verse: Kyennava ndayira nga nsunguwadde nti, ‘Tebaliyingira mu kiwummulo kyange.’ ”

1.verse: Muyimbire MUKAMA oluyimba oluggya; muyimbire MUKAMA mmwe ensi yonna.

2.verse: Muyimbire MUKAMA; mutendereze erinnya lye, mulangirire obulokozi bwe buli lukya.

3.verse: Mutende ekitiibwa kye mu mawanga gonna, eby’amagero bye mubimanyise abantu bonna.

4.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA mukulu era asaanira nnyo okutenderezebwa; asaana okutiibwa okusinga bakatonda bonna.

5.verse: Kubanga bakatonda bonna abakolebwa abantu bifaananyi bufaananyi; naye MUKAMA ye yakola eggulu.

6.verse: Ekitiibwa n’obukulu bimwetooloola; amaanyi n’obulungi biri mu nnyumba ye entukuvu.

7.verse: Mugulumize MUKAMA mmwe ebika eby’amawanga byonna; mutende ekitiibwa kya MUKAMA awamu n’amaanyi ge.

8.verse: Mugulumize MUKAMA mu ngeri esaanira erinnya lye; muleete ekiweebwayo mujje mu mbuga ze.

9.verse: Musinze MUKAMA mu kitiibwa eky’obutuukirivu bwe. Ensi yonna esinze MUKAMA n’okukankana.

10.verse: Mutegeeze amawanga gonna nti MUKAMA y’afuga. Ensi nnywevu, tewali asobola kuginyeenyaako; MUKAMA aliramula abantu mu bwenkanya.

11.verse: Kale eggulu lisanyuke n’ensi ejaguze; ennyanja eyire ne byonna ebigirimu.

12.verse: Ennimiro n’ebirime ebizirimu bijaguze; n’emiti gyonna egy’omu kibira nagyo gimutendereze n’ennyimba ez’essanyu.

13.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA ajja; ajja okusalira ensi omusango. MUKAMA aliramula ensi mu butuukirivu, n’abantu bonna abalamule mu mazima.

1.verse: MUKAMA afuga; ensi esanyuke, n’embalama eziri ewala zijaguze.

2.verse: Ebire n’ekizikiza bimwetooloola; obutuukirivu n’obwenkanya gwe musingi gw’entebe y’obwakabaka bwe.

3.verse: Omuliro gumukulembera ne gwokya abalabe be ku njuyi zonna.

4.verse: Okumyansa kwe kumulisa ensi; ensi n’ekulaba n’ekankana.

5.verse: Ensozi zisaanuuka ng’envumbo awali MUKAMA, mu maaso ga Mukama ow’ensi yonna.

6.verse: Eggulu lirangirira obutuukirivu bwe; n’abantu bonna ne balaba ekitiibwa kye.

7.verse: Abasinza ebifaananyi ebikole n’emikono bonna baswadde, abo abeenyumiririza mu bifaananyi ebyole. Mumusinze mwe mwenna bakatonda.

8.verse: Sayuuni akiwulira n’asanyuka, n’ebyalo bya Yuda bijaguza; kubanga ogoberera eby’ensonga, Ayi Katonda.

9.verse: Kubanga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, oli waggulu nnyo okusinga ensi; ogulumizibwa okusinga bakatonda bonna.

10.verse: Abo abaagala MUKAMA bakyawa ekibi, akuuma obulamu bw’abamwesiga, n’abawonya okuva mu mukono gw’omukozi w’ebibi.

11.verse: Omusana gwe gwakira abatuukirivu, n’abalina omutima ogw’amazima bajjula essanyu.

12.verse: Musanyukirenga mu MUKAMA mmwe abatuukirivu, era mwebazenga erinnya lye ettukuvu.

1.verse: Zabbuli. Muyimbire MUKAMA oluyimba oluggya, kubanga akoze eby’ekitalo. Omukono gwe ogwa ddyo, era omukono omutukuvu, gumuwadde obuwanguzi.

2.verse: MUKAMA ayolesezza obulokozi bwe, era abikkulidde amawanga obutuukirivu bwe.

3.verse: Ajjukidde okwagala kwe okutakoma n’obwesigwa bwe eri ennyumba ya Isirayiri. Enkomerero z’ensi yonna zirabye obulokozi bwa Katonda waffe.

4.verse: Muyimbire MUKAMA n’essanyu lingi mwe ensi yonna; muyimbe ennyimba mu maloboozi ag’essanyu.

5.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA n’ennanga ez’enkoba; n’ennanga ez’enkoba n’amaloboozi ag’okuyimba,

6.verse: n’amakondeere n’eddoboozi ly’eŋŋombe. Muyimbe n’essanyu mu maaso ga MUKAMA era Kabaka.

7.verse: Ennyanja eyire ne byonna ebigirimu, n’ensi ne byonna ebigirimu bijaguze.

8.verse: Emigga gikube mu ngalo n’ensozi zonna ziyimbire wamu olw’essanyu;

9.verse: byonna biyimbe mu maaso ga MUKAMA, kubanga ajja okulamula ensi. Aliramula ensi mu butuukirivu; aliramula amawanga mu bwenkanya.

1.verse: MUKAMA afuga, amawanga gakankane; atuula wakati wa bakerubi, ensi ekankane.

2.verse: MUKAMA mukulu mu Sayuuni; agulumizibwa mu mawanga gonna.

3.verse: Amawanga gonna gatendereze erinnya lyo ekkulu era ery’entiisa. MUKAMA mutukuvu.

4.verse: Ye Kabaka ow’amaanyi, ayagala obwenkanya. Onywezezza obwenkanya; era by’okoledde Yakobo bya bwenkanya era bituufu.

5.verse: Mumugulumize MUKAMA Katonda waffe; mumusinzize wansi w’entebe y’ebigere bye. MUKAMA mutukuvu.

6.verse: Musa ne Alooni baali bamu ku bakabona be; ne Samwiri yali mu abo abaakoowoolanga erinnya lye; baasabanga MUKAMA n’abaanukula.

7.verse: Yayogera nabo mu mpagi ey’ekire; baagondera amateeka ge n’ebiragiro bye, bye yabawa.

8.verse: Ayi MUKAMA Katonda waffe, wabaanukulanga; n’obeeranga Katonda asonyiwa eri Isirayiri, newaakubadde wababonerezanga olw’ebikolwa byabwe ebibi.

9.verse: Mugulumizenga MUKAMA Katonda waffe, mumusinzizenga ku lusozi lwe olutukuvu, kubanga MUKAMA Katonda waffe mutukuvu.

1.verse: Zabbuli ey’okwebaza. Muleetere MUKAMA eddoboozi ery’essanyu mmwe ensi zonna.

2.verse: Muweereze MUKAMA n’essanyu; mujje mu maaso ge n’ennyimba ez’essanyu.

3.verse: Mumanye nga MUKAMA ye Katonda; ye yatutonda, tuli babe, tuli bantu be era endiga ez’omu ddundiro lye.

4.verse: Muyingire mu miryango gye nga mwebaza, ne mu mpya ze n’okutendereza; mumwebaze mutendereze erinnya lye.

5.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA mulungi, n’okwagala kwe kwa lubeerera; n’obwesigwa bwe bwa mirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Nnaayimbanga ku kwagala kwo n’obutuukirivu bwo; nnaayimbiranga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA.

2.verse: Nneegenderezanga, mu bulamu bwange ne nkola eby’obutuukirivu, naye olijja ddi gye ndi? Nnaabeeranga mu nnyumba yange nga siriiko kya kunenyezebwa.

3.verse: Sijjanga kwereetereza kintu kyonna ekibi. Nkyayira ddala ebikolwa by’abo abava mu kkubo lyo; sijjanga kubyeteekako.

4.verse: Sijjanga kuba mukuusa; ekibi nnaakyewaliranga ddala.

5.verse: Oyo alyolyoma muliraanwa we mu kyama, nnaamuzikiririzanga ddala; amaaso ag’amalala n’omutima ogw’amalala sijja kubigumiikirizanga.

6.verse: Abeesigwa abali mu nsi yaffe nnaabasanyukiranga, balyoke babeerenga nange; akola eby’obutuukirivu y’anamperezanga.

7.verse: Atayogera mazima taabeerenga mu nnyumba yange. Omuntu alimba sirimuganya kwongera kubeera nange.

8.verse: Buli nkya nnaazikirizanga abakola ebibi bonna mu nsi, bwe ntyo abakozi b’ebibi ne mbamalirawo ddala mu kibuga kya MUKAMA.

1.verse: Okusaba kw’oyo ali mu buyinike ng’ayigganyizibwa nga yeeyongedde okunafuwa, n’afukumula byonna ebimuli ku mutima mu maaso ga MUKAMA. Wulira okusaba kwange, Ayi MUKAMA, okkirize okukoowoola kwange kutuuke gy’oli.

2.verse: Tonneekweka mu biseera eby’obuyinike bwange. Ntegera okutu kwo onnyanukule mangu bwe nkukoowoola!

3.verse: Kubanga ennaku zange zifuumuuka ng’omukka, n’amagumba gange gaaka ng’amanda.

4.verse: Omutima gwange gulinnyirirwa ng’omuddo, era guwotose; neerabira n’okulya emmere yange.

5.verse: Olw’okwaziirana kwange okunene, nzenna nfuuse ŋŋumbagumba.

6.verse: Ndi ng’ekiwuugulu eky’omu ddungu, era ng’ekiwuugulu eky’omu nsiko.

7.verse: Nsula ntunula, nga ndi ng’ekinyonyi ekitudde kyokka ku kasolya k’ennyumba.

8.verse: Abalabe bange banvuma olunaku lwonna; abo abanduulira bakozesa linnya lyange nga bakolima.

9.verse: Kubanga ndya evvu ng’alya emmere, n’amaziga gange ne geegattika mu kyokunywa kyange.

10.verse: Olw’obusungu n’okunyiiga kwo; onneegobyeko n’onsuula eyo.

11.verse: Ennaku zange ziri ng’ekisiikirize ky’olweggulo nga buziba; mpotoka ng’omuddo.

12.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, obeera mu ntebe yo ey’obwakabaka emirembe n’emirembe; erinnya lyo linajjukirwanga ab’omu mirembe gyonna.

13.verse: Olisituka n’osaasira Sayuuni, kino kye kiseera okulaga Sayuuni omukwano; ekiseera kye wateekateeka kituuse.

14.verse: Kubanga amayinja gaakyo abaweereza bo bagaagala nnyo, n’enfuufu y’omu kibuga ekyo ebakwasa ekisa.

15.verse: Amawanga gonna ganaatyanga erinnya lya MUKAMA; ne bakabaka bonna ab’ensi banaakankananga olw’ekitiibwa kyo.

16.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA alizimba Sayuuni buto, era n’alabika mu kitiibwa kye.

17.verse: Alyanukula okusaba kw’abanaku; talinyooma kwegayirira kwabwe.

18.verse: Bino leka biwandiikirwe ab’omu mirembe egirijja, abantu abatannatondebwa bwe balibisoma balyoke batendereze MUKAMA.

19.verse: Bategeere nti MUKAMA yatunula wansi ng’asinziira waggulu mu kifo kye ekitukuvu; MUKAMA yasinzira mu ggulu n’atunuulira ensi,

20.verse: okuwulira okusinda kw’abasibe, n’okusumulula abo abasaliddwa ogw’okufa.

21.verse: Erinnya lya MUKAMA, liryoke litenderezebwe mu Sayuuni, bamutenderezenga mu Yerusaalemi;

22.verse: abantu nga bakuŋŋaanye, awamu n’obwakabaka, okusinza MUKAMA.

23.verse: MUKAMA ammazeemu amaanyi nga nkyali muvubuka; akendeezezza ku nnaku z’obulamu bwange.

24.verse: Ne ndyoka mmukaabira nti, “Ayi Katonda wange, tontwala nga nkyali mu makkati g’emyaka gy’obulamu bwange, ggw’abeera omulamu emirembe gyonna.

25.verse: Ku ntandikwa wassaawo omusingi gw’ensi; n’eggulu gy’emirimu gy’emikono gyo.

26.verse: Byonna biriggwaawo, naye ggwe oli wa lubeerera. Byonna birikaddiwa ng’ebyambalo. Olibikyusa ng’ebyambalo, ne bisuulibwa.

27.verse: Naye ggwe tokyuka oli wa lubeerera n’emyaka gyo tegirikoma.

28.verse: Abaana b’abaweereza bo baliba mu ddembe; ne bazzukulu baabwe banaabeeranga w’oli nga tebalina kye batya.”

1.verse: Zabbuli Ya Dawudi. Weebaze MUKAMA, ggwe emmeeme yange; ne byonna ebiri mu nze byebaze erinnya lye ettukuvu.

2.verse: Weebaze MUKAMA, ggwe emmeeme yange, era teweerabiranga birungi bye byonna.

3.verse: Asonyiwa ebibi byo byonna, n’awonya n’endwadde zo zonna.

4.verse: Anunula obulamu bwo emagombe, n’akusaasira era n’akwagala n’okwagala okutaggwaawo.

5.verse: Awa emmeeme yo ebintu ebirungi byeyagala; obuvubuka bwo ne budda buggya ng’empungu.

6.verse: MUKAMA asala mu butuukirivu ne mu bwenkanya, ensonga z’abo bonna abajoogebwa.

7.verse: Yamanyisa Musa ebyo by’ayagala, n’alaga abaana ba Isirayiri ebikolwa bye.

8.verse: MUKAMA wa kisa era ajjudde okusaasira, tasunguwala mangu, era alina okwagala okutaggwaawo.

9.verse: Taasibenga busungu ku mwoyo, era tasunguwala kumala bbanga lyonna.

10.verse: Tatukola ng’okwonoona kwaffe bwe kuli, wadde okutusasula ng’ebikolwa byaffe ebitali bya butuukirivu bwe biri.

11.verse: Ng’eggulu bwe litumbidde ennyo waggulu w’ensi, n’okwagala kwe bwe kuli okunene bwe kutyo eri abo abamutya.

12.verse: Ebibi byaffe abituggyako n’abitwala wala ng’ebuvanjuba bw’eri ewala okuva ebugwanjuba.

13.verse: Kitaawe w’abaana nga bw’asaasira abaana be, ne MUKAMA bw’atyo bw’asaasira abo abamutya.

14.verse: Kubanga amanyi nga bwe twakolebwa era ng’ajjukira nti tuli nfuufu.

15.verse: Wabula omuntu, ennaku z’obulamu bwe ziri ng’omuddo; akula n’agimuka ng’ekimuli eky’omu nnimiro;

16.verse: empewo ekifuuwa, ne kifa; nga ne we kyali tewakyajjukirwa.

17.verse: Naye okwagala kwa Katonda eri abo abamutya tekuggwaawo emirembe gyonna, n’obulokozi bwe eri abaana b’abaana baabwe.

18.verse: Be bo abakuuma endagaano ye ne bajjukira okugondera amateeka ge.

19.verse: MUKAMA anywezezza entebe ye ey’obwakabaka mu ggulu, n’obwakabaka bwe bufuga ensi yonna.

20.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA mmwe bamalayika be, mmwe ab’amaanyi abakola ky’agamba, era abagondera ekigambo kye.

21.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA mmwe amaggye ge ag’omu ggulu, mmwe abaweereza be abakola by’ayagala.

22.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA, mmwe ebitonde bye byonna ebiri mu matwale ge gonna. Weebaze MUKAMA, ggwe emmeeme yange.

1.verse: Weebaze MUKAMA, ggwe emmeeme yange. Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange, oli mukulu nnyo; ojjudde obukulu n’ekitiibwa.

2.verse: Yeebika ekitangaala ng’ayeebikka ekyambalo n’abamba eggulu ng’eweema,

3.verse: n’ateeka akasolya k’ebisulo bye eby’oku ntikko kungulu ku mazzi; ebire abifuula amagaali ge, ne yeebagala ebiwaawaatiro by’empewo.

4.verse: Afuula empewo ababaka be, n’ennimi z’omuliro ogwaka abaweereza be.

5.verse: Yassaawo ensi ku misingi gyayo; teyinza kunyeenyezebwa.

6.verse: Wagibikkako obuziba ng’ekyambalo; amazzi ne gatumbiira okuyisa ensozi ennene.

7.verse: Bwe wagaboggolera ne gadduka; bwe gaawulira okubwatuka kwo ne gaddukira ddala;

8.verse: gaakulukutira ku nsozi ennene, ne gakkirira wansi mu biwonvu mu bifo bye wagategekera.

9.verse: Wagassizaawo ensalo ze gatasaana kusukka, na kuddayo kubuutikira nsi.

10.verse: Alagira ensulo ne zisindika amazzi mu biwonvu; ne gakulukutira wakati w’ensozi.

11.verse: Ne ganywesa ebisolo byonna eby’omu nsiko; n’endogoyi ne gazimalako ennyonta.

12.verse: Ebinyonyi eby’omu bbanga bizimba ebisu byabyo ku mabbali g’amazzi, ne biyimbira mu matabi.

13.verse: Afukirira ensozi ennene ng’osinziira waggulu gy’obeera; ensi n’ekkuta ebibala by’emirimu gyo.

14.verse: Olagira omuddo ne gukula okuliisa ente, n’ebirime abantu bye balima, balyoke bafune ebyokulya okuva mu ttaka.

15.verse: Ne wayini okusanyusa omutima gwe, n’ebizigo okwesiiga awoomye endabika ye, n’emmere okumuwa obulamu.

16.verse: Emiti gya MUKAMA gifuna amazzi mangi; gy’emivule gy’e Lebanooni gye yasimba.

17.verse: Omwo ebinyonyi mwe bizimba ebisu byabyo; ne ssekanyolya asula mu miti omwo.

18.verse: Ku nsozi empanvu eyo embulabuzi ez’omu nsiko gye zibeera; n’enjazi kye kiddukiro ky’obumyu.

19.verse: Wakola omwezi okutegeeza ebiro; n’enjuba bw’egwa n’eraga olunaku.

20.verse: Oleeta ekizikiza, ne buba ekiro; olwo ebisolo byonna eby’omu bibira ne biryoka bivaayo.

21.verse: Empologoma ento zikaabira emmere gye zinaalya; nga zinoonya ebyokulya okuva eri Katonda.

22.verse: Enjuba bw’evaayo ne zigenda, n’oluvannyuma ne zikomawo ne zigalamira mu mpuku zaazo.

23.verse: Abantu ne bagenda ku mirimu gyabwe, ne bakola okutuusa akawungeezi.

24.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, ebintu bye wakola nga bingi nnyo! Byonna wabikola n’amagezi ag’ekitalo; ensi ejjudde ebitonde byo.

25.verse: Waliwo ennyanja, nnene era ngazi, ejjudde ebitonde ebitabalika, ebintu ebirina obulamu ebinene era n’ebitono.

26.verse: Okwo amaato kwe gaseeyeeyera nga galaga eno n’eri; ne galukwata ge wakola mwe gabeera okuzannyiranga omwo.

27.verse: Ebyo byonna bitunuulira ggwe okubiwa emmere yaabyo ng’ekiseera kituuse.

28.verse: Bw’ogibiwa, nga bigikuŋŋaanya; bw’oyanjuluza engalo zo n’obigabira ebintu ebirungi ne bikkusibwa.

29.verse: Bw’okweka amaaso go ne byeraliikirira nnyo; bw’obiggyamu omukka nga bifa, nga biddayo mu nfuufu.

30.verse: Bw’oweereza Omwoyo wo, ne bifuna obulamu obuggya; olwo ensi n’ogizza buggya.

31.verse: Ekitiibwa kya Katonda kibeerengawo emirembe gyonna; era MUKAMA asanyukirenga ebyo bye yakola.

32.verse: Atunuulira ensi, n’ekankana; bw’akwata ku nsozi ennene, ne zinyooka omukka.

33.verse: Nnaayimbiranga MUKAMA obulamu bwange bwonna; nnaayimbanga nga ntendereza Katonda wange ennaku zonna ze ndimala nga nkyali mulamu.

34.verse: Ebirowoozo byange, nga nfumiitiriza, bimusanyusenga; kubanga mu MUKAMA mwe neeyagalira.

35.verse: Naye abakola ebibi baggweewo ku nsi; aboonoonyi baleme kulabikirako ddala. Weebaze MUKAMA, gwe emmeeme yange. Mumutenderezenga MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA, mukoowoole erinnya lye; amawanga gonna mugategeeze by’akoze.

2.verse: Mumuyimbire, mumutendereze; muyimbe ku byamagero bye.

3.verse: Mumusuute, ng’erinnya lye ettukuvu muligulumiza; emitima gy’abo abanoonya MUKAMA gijjule essanyu.

4.verse: Munoonye MUKAMA n’amaanyi ge; mumunoonyenga ennaku zonna.

5.verse: Mujjukirenga eby’ekitalo bye yakola, ebyamagero bye, n’emisango gye yasala;

6.verse: mmwe abazzukulu ba Ibulayimu, abaweereza be mmwe abaana ba Yakobo, abalonde be.

7.verse: Ye MUKAMA Katonda waffe; ye alamula mu nsi yonna.

8.verse: Ajjukira endagaano ye emirembe gyonna, kye kigambo kye yalagira, ekyakamala emirembe olukumi,

9.verse: ye ndagaano gye yakola ne Ibulayimu, era kye kisuubizo kye yalayirira Isaaka.

10.verse: Yakikakasa Yakobo ng’etteeka, n’akiwa Isirayiri ng’endagaano eteriggwaawo nti,

11.verse: “Ndikuwa ggwe ensi ya Kanani okuba omugabo gwo.”

12.verse: Bwe baali bakyali batono, nga si bangi n’akamu, era nga bagwira mu nsi omwo,

13.verse: baatambulatambulanga okuva mu ggwanga erimu okulaga mu ddala, ne bavanga mu bwakabaka obumu ne balaga mu bulala.

14.verse: Teyaganya muntu yenna kubayisa bubi; n’alabulanga bakabaka ku lwabwe nti,

15.verse: “Abalonde bange, ne bannabbi bange temubakolangako kabi.”

16.verse: Yaleeta enjala mu nsi, emmere yaabwe yonna n’agizikiriza.

17.verse: N’atuma omuntu okubeesooka mu maaso, ye Yusufu eyatundibwa ng’omuddu,

18.verse: ebigere bye ne binuubulwa enjegere ze baamusibya, obulago bwe ne buteekebwa mu byuma,

19.verse: okutuusa bye yategeeza lwe byatuukirira, okutuusa ekigambo kya MUKAMA lwe kyamukakasa nti bye yayogera bya mazima.

20.verse: Kabaka n’atuma ne bamusumulula; omufuzi w’ensi eyo yamuggya mu kkomera.

21.verse: Yamufuula omukulu w’eby’omu maka ge, n’akulira byonna omufuzi oyo bye yalina;

22.verse: okukangavvulanga abalangira be nga bwe yalabanga, n’okuyigiriza abakulu eby’amagezi.

23.verse: Oluvannyuma Isirayiri n’ajja mu Misiri; Yakobo bw’atyo n’atuula mu nsi ya Kaamu nga munnaggwanga.

24.verse: MUKAMA n’ayaza nnyo abantu be; ne baba bangi nnyo, n’abalabe baabwe ne beeraliikirira,

25.verse: n’akyusa emitima gyabwe ne bakyawa abantu be, ne basalira abaweereza be enkwe.

26.verse: Yatuma abaweereza be Musa ne Alooni, be yalonda.

27.verse: Ne bakola obubonero bwe obw’ekitalo mu bantu abo; ne bakolera ebyamagero bye mu nsi ya Kaamu.

28.verse: Yaleeta ekizikiza ensi yonna n’ekwata, kubanga baali bajeemedde ekigambo kye.

29.verse: Amazzi gaabwe yagafuula omusaayi, ne kireetera ebyennyanja byabwe okufa.

30.verse: Ensi yaabwe yajjula ebikere, ebyatuukira ddala ne mu bisenge by’abafuzi baabwe.

31.verse: Yalagira, ebiwuka ebya buli ngeri ne bijja, n’ensekere ne zeeyiwa mu bitundu byonna eby’ensi yaabwe.

32.verse: Yafuula enkuba okuba amayinja g’omuzira; eggulu ne libwatuka mu nsi yaabwe yonna.

33.verse: Yakuba emizeeyituuni n’emizabbibu, n’azikiriza emiti gy’omu nsi yaabwe.

34.verse: Yalagira, enzige ne zijja ne bulusejjera obutabalika muwendo.

35.verse: Ne birya buli kimera kyonna mu nsi yaabwe, na buli kisimbe kyonna mu ttaka lyabwe ne kiriibwa.

36.verse: N’azikiriza abaana ababereberye bonna mu nsi yaabwe, nga bye bibala ebisooka eby’obuvubuka bwabwe.

37.verse: Yaggya Abayisirayiri mu nsi eyo nga balina ffeeza nnyingi ne zaabu; era bonna baali ba maanyi.

38.verse: Abamisiri baasanyuka bwe baalaba Abayisirayiri nga bagenze, kubanga baali batandise okubatiira ddala.

39.verse: Yayanjuluzanga ekire ne kibabikka, n’omuliro ne gubamulisiza ekiro.

40.verse: Baamusaba, n’abaweereza enkwale era n’abaliisanga emmere eva mu ggulu ne bakkuta.

41.verse: Yayasa olwazi, amazzi ne gatiiriika, ne gakulukuta mu ddungu ng’omugga.

42.verse: Kubanga yajjukira ekisuubizo kye ekitukuvu kye yawa omuweereza we Ibulayimu.

43.verse: Abantu be yabaggyayo nga bajaguza, abalonde be nga bayimba olw’essanyu.

44.verse: Yabawa ensi eyali ey’amawanga amalala, ne basikira ebyo abalala bye baakolerera;

45.verse: balyoke bakwatenga amateeka ge, era bagonderenga ebiragiro bye. Mumutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mumutendereze MUKAMA! Mwebaze MUKAMA kubanga mulungi, kubanga okwagala kwe tekuggwaawo emirembe gyonna.

2.verse: Ani ayinza okwogera ku bikulu MUKAMA by’akola n’abimalayo, oba okumutendereza obulungi nga bw’asaanira?

3.verse: Balina omukisa abalina obwenkanya, era abakola ebituufu bulijjo.

4.verse: Onzijukiranga, Ayi MUKAMA, bw’obanga okolera abantu bo ebirungi; nange onnyambe bw’olibalokola,

5.verse: ndyoke neeyagalire wamu n’abalonde bo nga bafunye ebirungi, nsanyukire wamu n’eggwanga lyo, era ntendererezenga mu bantu bo.

6.verse: Twonoonye, nga bajjajjaffe bwe baakola; tukoze ebibi ne tusobya nnyo.

7.verse: Bakadde baffe tebaafaayo kujjukira ebyamagero bye wakola nga bali mu Misiri; n’ebyekisa ebingi bye wabakolera tebaabijjukira, bwe baatuuka ku Nnyanja Emyufu ne bakujeemera.

8.verse: Naye MUKAMA n’abalokola, olw’erinnya lye, alyoke amanyise amaanyi g’obuyinza bwe obungi.

9.verse: Yaboggolera Ennyanja Emyufu, n’ekalira; n’abakulembera okubayisa mu buziba ng’abayita ku lukalu mu ddungu.

10.verse: Yabawonya abalabe baabwe; n’abanunula mu mikono gy’abo ababakyawa.

11.verse: Amazzi ne gabuutikira abalabe baabwe; ne wataba n’omu awona.

12.verse: Olwo ne bakkiriza ebigambo bye, bye yabasuubiza; ne bayimba nga bamutendereza.

13.verse: Waayita akabanga katono ne beerabira ebyo byonna bye yakola; ne batawulirizanga kubuulirira kwe.

14.verse: Bwe baatuuka mu ddungu, okwegomba ne kubasukkirira; ne bagezesa Katonda nga bali mu lukoola olwo.

15.verse: Bw’atyo n’abawa kye baasaba, kyokka n’abaleetera n’olumbe olw’amaanyi.

16.verse: Nga bali mu lusiisira baakwatirwa obuggya eri Musa ne Alooni abalonde ba MUKAMA.

17.verse: Ettaka ne lyasama ne limira Dasani; Abiraamu ne banne ne libasaanyaawo.

18.verse: Omuliro ne gukoleera ne gukwata abagoberezi baabwe; ennimi z’omuliro ne zookya aboonoonyi.

19.verse: Bwe baali e Kolebu ne beekolera ennyana; ne basinza ekifaananyi ekyo kye baakola mu byuma bye baasaanuusa.

20.verse: Ekitiibwa kya Katonda ne bakiwaanyisaamu ekibumbe ekifaanana ente erya omuddo.

21.verse: Ne beerabira Katonda eyabanunula, eyabakolera ebintu ebikulu bwe bityo mu Misiri,

22.verse: ebyamagero bye yabakolera mu nsi ya Kaamu, n’ebikolwa eby’entiisa ku Nnyanja Emyufu.

23.verse: N’agamba nti, Ajja kubazikiriza. Naye Musa, omulonde we, n’ayimirira mu maaso ge n’amwegayirira, obusungu bwe ne bumuggwaako n’atabazikiriza.

24.verse: Baanyooma eby’ensi ennungi, kubanga ekisuubizo kye tebaakirinaamu bwesige.

25.verse: Beemulugunyiriza mu weema zaabwe, ne batagondera ddoboozi lya MUKAMA.

26.verse: Kyeyava yeerayirira nti alibazikiririza mu ddungu,

27.verse: era nga n’abaana baabwe balisaasaanira mu mawanga ne bafiira eyo.

28.verse: Baatandika okusinza Baali e Peoli; ne balya ebyaweebwangayo eri bakatonda abataliimu bulamu.

29.verse: Ne banyiiza Katonda olw’ebikolwa byabwe ebibi; kawumpuli kyeyava abagwamu.

30.verse: Naye Finekaasi n’ayimirira wakati waabwe ne Katonda, kawumpuli n’agenda.

31.verse: Ekyo ne kimubalirwa nga kya butuukirivu emirembe gyonna.

32.verse: Bwe baatuuka okumpi n’amazzi ag’e Meriba ne banyiiza MUKAMA, ne baleetera Musa emitawaana;

33.verse: kubanga baajeemera ebiragiro bye, ne kimwogeza n’ebigambo ebitaali bya magezi.

34.verse: Abantu be baalwanyisa tebaabazikiriza nga MUKAMA bwe yali abalagidde,

35.verse: naye beetabika n’abannaggwanga ago ne bayiga empisa zaabwe.

36.verse: Baasinza ebifaananyi ebikole n’emikono eby’amawanga ago ne bibafuukira omutego.

37.verse: Baawaayo batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe eri bakatonda abo.

38.verse: Ne bayiwa omusaayi gwa batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe abataliiko musango, be baawangayo eri ebifaananyi ebikole n’emikono Abakanani bye baakola, ensi n’eyonoonebwa n’omusaayi gwabwe.

39.verse: Beeyonoona olw’ebyo bye baakola, ebikolwa byabwe ne bibafuula abataliimu nsa nga bavudde ku Katonda waabwe.

40.verse: MUKAMA kyeyava asunguwalira abantu be, n’akyawa ezzadde lye.

41.verse: N’abawaayo eri amawanga amalala, abalabe ne babafuga.

42.verse: Abalabe baabwe ne babanyigiriza, ne babatuntuza nnyo ddala.

43.verse: Yabawonyanga abalabe baabwe emirundi mingi, naye obujeemu ne bubalemeramu, ebibi byabwe ne bigenda nga bibasaanyaawo.

44.verse: Naye bwe yawulira okukaaba kwabwe, n’abakwatirwa ekisa;

45.verse: ku lwabwe, n’ajjukira endagaano ye; okwagala kwe okungi ne kumuleetera okukyusa ekirowoozo kye.

47.verse: Ayi MUKAMA Katonda, otulokole, otukuŋŋaanye, otuggye mu mawanga, tulyoke twebazenga erinnya lyo ettukuvu, era tusanyukenga nga tukutendereza.

48.verse: MUKAMA atenderezebwenga, Katonda wa Isirayiri, emirembe n’emirembe. Abantu bonna ka boogere nti, “Amiina!” Mumutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: EKITABO V - Zabbuli 107–150 Mwebaze MUKAMA, kubanga mulungi; okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

2.verse: Kale abanunule ba MUKAMA boogere bwe batyo; abo be yanunula mu mikono gy’abalabe;

3.verse: abo be yakuŋŋaanya mu mawanga; okuva Ebugwanjuba n’Ebuvanjuba, n’okuva obukiikakkono ne mu bukiikaddyo.

4.verse: Abamu baataataaganira mu malungu nga babuliddwa ekkubo eribatwala ku kibuga gye banaabeeranga.

5.verse: Baalumwa ennyonta n’enjala, obulamu bwabwe ne butandika okusereba.

6.verse: Bwe batyo ne bakaabira MUKAMA nga bali mu kabi; n’abawonya mu kweraliikirira kwabwe.

7.verse: Yabakulembera butereevu n’abatuusa mu kibuga mwe baabeera.

8.verse: Kale singa beebazanga MUKAMA olw’okwagala kwe okutaggwaawo, n’olw’eby’ekitalo by’akolera abaana b’abantu!

9.verse: Kubanga abalina ennyonta abanywesa, n’abayala abakkusa ebirungi.

10.verse: Abamu baatuulanga mu kizikiza ne mu kisiikirize eky’okufa; abasibiddwa mu byuma era abali mu nnaku ennyingi;

11.verse: kubanga baajeemera ekigambo kya Katonda, ne banyoomoola amagezi g’oyo Ali Waggulu Ennyo.

12.verse: Baakozesebwa emirimu egy’amaanyi, emitima gyabwe ne gijjula obuyinike; baagwanga wansi, naye nga tebalina abasitulawo.

13.verse: Bwe batyo ne bakaabirira MUKAMA nga bali mu bizibu byabwe, era n’abawonya;

14.verse: n’abaggya mu kizikiza ne mu kisiikirize eky’okufa; n’enjegere ezaali zibasibye n’azikutula.

15.verse: Kale singa beebazanga MUKAMA olw’okwagala kwe okutaggwaawo, n’olwebikolwa bye eby’ekitalo by’akolera abaana b’abantu!

16.verse: Kubanga enzigi ez’ebikomo azaasaayasa, n’emitayimbwa egy’ekyuma agimenyamu.

17.verse: Abamu baafuuka basirusiru olw’obujeemu bwabwe; ne babonaabona olw’ebikolwa byabwe ebibi.

18.verse: Ne batamwa emmere yonna, ne babulako katono ddala okufa.

19.verse: Bwe batyo ne bakaabirira MUKAMA nga bali mu buzibu obwo, n’abawonya.

20.verse: Yabatumira ekigambo kye, n’awonya endwadde zaabwe; n’abalokola mu kuzikirira.

21.verse: Kale singa beebazanga MUKAMA olw’okwagala kwe okutaggwaawo, n’olw’ebikolwa bye eby’ekyewuunyo by’akolera abaana b’abantu!

22.verse: Bamuleeterenga ebiweebwayo eby’okwebaza, era batendenga ebikolwa bye n’ennyimba ez’essanyu.

23.verse: Abalala baasaabalira mu maato ku nnyanja; baali basuubuzi b’oku gayanja aganene.

24.verse: Baalaba MUKAMA bye yakola, ebikolwa bye eby’ekitalo mu buziba bw’ennyanja.

25.verse: Kubanga yalagira omuyaga ne gusitula amayengo waggulu.

26.verse: Ne gagulumira okutuuka ku ggulu, ate ne gakka wansi mu ddubi; akabenje ne kabayitirira, ne baggwaamu amaanyi.

27.verse: Ne beesunda, eruuyi n’eruuyi ne baba ng’omutamiivu atagala; n’amagezi ne gabaggwaako.

28.verse: Bwe batyo ne bakaabira MUKAMA nga bali mu buzibu; n’abawonya mu kweraliikirira kwabwe.

30.verse: Ne bajjula essanyu kubanga ennyanja yateeka; n’abakulembera n’abatuusa bulungi ku mwalo gwabwe.

31.verse: Kale singa abantu beebazanga MUKAMA olw’okwagala kwe okutaggwaawo, n’olw’ebikolwa bye eby’ekyewuunyo by’akolera abaana b’abantu!

32.verse: Bamugulumizenga ng’abantu bakuŋŋaanye, era bamutenderezenga mu lukiiko lw’abakulu.

33.verse: Afuula emigga amalungu, n’emikutu gy’amazzi ne giba ng’ettaka ekkalu,

34.verse: ensi engimu n’agifuula olukoola olw’olunnyo olw’obwonoonyi bw’abantu baamu.

35.verse: Eddungu yalijjuza ebidiba by’amazzi, n’ensi enkalu n’agikulukusizaamu amazzi,

36.verse: abalina enjala n’abateeka omwo, ne beezimbira ekibuga eky’okubeeramu,

37.verse: ennimiro zaabwe ne bazisigamu emmere, ne basimba emizabbibu, ne bakungula ebibala bingi.

38.verse: Yabawa omukisa gwe, ne beeyongera obungi; n’ebisibo byabwe n’atabiganya kukendeera.

39.verse: Ate ne bakendeera obungi, ne bakkakkanyizibwa olw’okujeezebwa, n’okujoogebwa n’okulaba ennaku;

40.verse: oyo anyooma n’abakungu, n’ababungeetanyiza mu lukoola omutali kantu.

41.verse: Naye abaali mu kwetaaga yabamalako ennaku n’okubonaabona, n’ayaza ezzadde lyabwe ng’ebisibo.

42.verse: Abagolokofu, bino babiraba ne basanyuka; naye abakola ebibi bo basirika busirisi.

43.verse: Abalina amagezi bonna, bagondere ebigambo bino era bategeere okwagala kwa MUKAMA okutaggwaawo.

1.verse: Oluyimba. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Omutima gwange munywevu, Ayi Katonda; nnaayimbanga ne nkutendereza n’omwoyo gwange gwonna.

2.verse: Muzuukuke, mmwe entongooli n’ennanga ey’enkoba, nzija kuyimba okukeesa obudde.

3.verse: Nnaakutenderezanga, Ayi MUKAMA, mu bantu bonna, nnaakuyimbiranga mu mawanga gonna.

4.verse: Okwagala kwo kunene, kutumbiira okutuuka ku ggulu; n’obwesigwa bwo butuuka ku bire.

5.verse: Ogulumizibwenga, Ayi Katonda, okuyisa eggulu; n’ekitiibwa kyo kibune ensi yonna.

6.verse: Tulokole otuyambe n’omukono gwo ogwa ddyo, abo booyagala banunulibwe.

7.verse: Katonda ayogedde ng’asinziira mu kifo kye ekitukuvu n’agamba nti, “Nga nzijudde essanyu, ndisala mu Sekemu, era n’Ekiwonvu kya Sukkosi ndikigabanyagabanyaamu.

8.verse: Ensi ya Gireyaadi yange, n’eya Manase nayo yange. Efulayimu mwe muli abalwanyi bange abazira; ate mu Yuda mwe munaavanga bakabaka.

9.verse: Mowaabu be baweereza bange abawulize; ate Edomu be baddu bange; Abafirisuuti ndibaleekaanira mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka ery’obuwanguzi.”

10.verse: Ani anantuusa ku kibuga ekigumu ekinywevu? Ani anankulembera okunnyingiza mu Edomu?

11.verse: Si ggwe, ayi Katonda, atusudde, atakyatabaala n’amaggye gaffe?

12.verse: Tudduukirire nga tulwanyisa abalabe baffe, kubanga obuyambi bw’abantu temuli nsa.

13.verse: Bwe tunaabeeranga ne Katonda tunaabanga bawanguzi; kubanga y’anaalinnyiriranga abalabe baffe wansi w’ebigere bye.

1.verse: Ya Makulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi Katonda wange gwe ntendereza, tonsiriikirira.

2.verse: Kubanga abantu abakola ebibi era abalimba, banjogeddeko eby’obulimba.

3.verse: Banfukumulidde ebigambo eby’obukyayi, ne bannumbagana awatali nsonga.

4.verse: Bwe mbalaga omukwano, bo bandaga bukyayi; kyokka nze mbasabira.

5.verse: Bwe mbakolera ebirungi bo bansasulamu bibi; bwe mbalaga okwagala bo bankyawa bukyayi.

6.verse: Mumulabire omuntu omukozi w’ebibi amwolekere; wabeewo amuwawaabira.

7.verse: Bwe banaawoza, omusango gumusinge; n’okusaba kwe kufuuke kwonoona.

8.verse: Aleme kuwangaala; omuntu omulala amusikire.

9.verse: Abaana be basigalire awo nga tebaliiko kitaabwe, ne mukyala we afuuke nnamwandu.

10.verse: Abaana be bataataaganenga nga bagenda basabiriza; bagobebwe ne mu bifulukwa mwe basula.

11.verse: Amubanja ajje awambe ebibye byonna; n’abagwira bamunyageko ebintu bye byonna bye yakolerera.

12.verse: Waleme kubaawo amusaasira, wadde akolera abaana be ebyekisa.

13.verse: Ezzadde lye lizikirizibwe, n’amannya g’abazzukulu be gasangulwe mu ago ag’omu mulembe oguliddirira.

14.verse: MUKAMA ajjukirenga ebyonoono bya bakadde be; n’ekibi kya nnyina kireme kwerabirwanga.

15.verse: MUKAMA ajjukirenga ebyonoono byabwe bulijjo, n’ensi ebeerabirire ddala.

16.verse: Kubanga talowoozangako kukolera muntu yenna kya kisa; naye yayigganyanga abaavu, n’abeetaaga, n’abanakuwavu n’abatuusa ne ku kufa.

17.verse: Yayagalanga nnyo okukolima; kale ebikolimo bimwefuulire. Teyayagalanga mikisa; kale gimwesambire ddala!

18.verse: Yeeteekako okukolima ng’ekyambalo, ne kumutobya ng’amazzi, ne kuyingira mu magumba ge ng’amafuta.

19.verse: Kubeerenga ng’ekyambalo ky’ayambadde, era ng’olukoba lwe yeesibye emirembe gyonna.

20.verse: Ebyo byonna y’eba ebeera empeera, MUKAMA gy’awa abo abandoopaloopa, era abanjogerako eby’akabi ebyereere.

21.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange, nnwanirira olw’erinnya lyo; era omponye olw’okwagala kwo okulungi okutaggwaawo.

22.verse: Kubanga ndi mwavu era ali mu kwetaaga, n’omutima gwange gunyolwa nnyo.

23.verse: Sikyaliwo, ndi ng’ekisiikirize eky’akawungeezi; mmansuddwa eri ng’enzige.

24.verse: Amaviivi gange ganafuye olw’okusiiba; omubiri gwange gukozze ne guggwaamu ensa.

25.verse: Abandoopaloopa bansekerera; bwe bandaba nga banyeenyeza omutwe.

26.verse: Mbeera, Ayi MUKAMA Katonda wange! Ondokole ng’okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo bwe kuli.

27.verse: Baleke bategeere nti ggwe okikoze, n’omukono gwo Ayi MUKAMA.

28.verse: Balikoma, naye ggwe olimpa omukisa! Leka abannumbagana baswale, naye nze omuddu wo nga nsanyuka!

29.verse: Abandoopa baswazibwe, n’ensonyi zaabwe zibabuzeeko obwekyusizo.

30.verse: Nneebazanga MUKAMA n’akamwa kange; nnaamutenderezanga wakati mu kibiina ekinene.

31.verse: Kubanga alwanirira omunaku ali mu kwetaaga, n’amuwonya abo abaagala afe.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. MUKAMA yagamba Mukama wange nti: “Tuula wano ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, okutuusa lwe ndimala okufufuggaza abalabe bo ne mbassa wansi w’ebigere byo.”

2.verse: MUKAMA aligaziya obufuzi bwo okuva mu Sayuuni; olifuga abalabe bo.

3.verse: Abantu bo balyewaayo bokka mu ggye lyo ng’ekiseera ky’olutalo kituuse. Abavubuka bo, nga bali mu by’ekitiibwa ekitukuvu, balikukuŋŋaanirako ng’omusulo bwe gulabika ng’obudde bwakakya.

4.verse: MUKAMA yalayira, era tagenda kukijjulula, yagamba nti, “Olibeera kabona emirembe gyonna ng’engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw’eri.”

5.verse: Mukama anaakulwaniriranga; bakabaka abakulwanyisa anaababetentanga mu busungu bwe obungi.

6.verse: Aliramula amawanga, abafuzi b’ensi yonna n’abazikiriza, n’entuumo z’emirambo ziriba nnyingi ku nsi yonna.

7.verse: Alinywa amazzi mu kagga ku kkubo, n’addamu amaanyi ag’obuwanguzi.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Nneebazanga MUKAMA n’omutima gwange gwonna, mu lukiiko lw’abalongoofu, era ne mu lukuŋŋaana.

2.verse: MUKAMA by’akola bikulu; bifumiitirizibwako abo bonna ababisanyukira.

3.verse: Emirimu gye mikulu nnyo era gya kitiibwa, n’obutuukirivu bwe tebuggwaawo emirembe gyonna.

4.verse: Ayamba abantu okujjukira ebyamagero bye, MUKAMA wa kisa era ajjudde okusaasira.

5.verse: Agabira abamutya emmere; era ajjukira endagaano ye buli kiseera.

6.verse: Abantu be abalaze ng’ebikolwa bye bwe biri eby’amaanyi; n’abagabira ensi eyali ey’abannaggwanga.

7.verse: By’akola byonna bya bwesigwa era bya bwenkanya; n’amateeka ge gonna ga bwesigwa,

8.verse: manywevu emirembe gyonna; era yagassaawo nga ga bwesigwa era nga ga mazima.

9.verse: Yanunula abantu be; n’alagira endagaano ye ebeerewo emirembe gyonna. Erinnya lye ttukuvu era lya ntiisa!

10.verse: Mu kutya MUKAMA amagezi mwe gasookera era abo abagondera ebigambo ebyo bajjudde obutegeevu. MUKAMA atenderezebwenga emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Alina omukisa omuntu atya Katonda, era asanyukira ennyo mu mateeka ge.

2.verse: Abaana be baliba ba kitiibwa mu nsi; omulembe gw’abalongoofu guliweebwa omukisa.

3.verse: Ennyumba ye enejjulanga ebintu n’obugagga obungi; era anaabanga mutuukirivu ennaku zonna.

4.verse: Ne mu kizikiza, ekitangaala kyakira omulongoofu, alina ekisa, n’oyo alina okusaasira, era omutuukirivu.

5.verse: Omuntu oyo agabira abeetaaga, era tawolera magoba, era akola emirimu gye gyonna n’obwenkanya, alifuna ebirungi.

6.verse: Omutuukirivu talinyeenyezebwa, era anajjukirwanga ennaku zonna.

7.verse: Amawulire amabi tegaamutiisenga, kubanga omutima gwe munywevu gwesiga MUKAMA.

8.verse: Omutima gwe guteredde, tewali ky’anaatyanga, era oluvannyuma alitunuulira abalabe be n’amaaso ag’obuwanguzi.

9.verse: Agabidde abaavu bye beetaaga; mutuukirivu ebbanga lyonna; era bonna banaamussangamu ekitiibwa.

10.verse: Omubi anaabirabanga ebyo, n’asunguwala, n’aluma abugigi, naye nga talina kya kukola. Okwegomba kw’ababi tekuubengako kye kubagasa.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Mumutendereze, mmwe abaweereza be, mutendereze erinnya lya MUKAMA.

2.verse: Erinnya lya MUKAMA litenderezebwe okuva leero n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna.

3.verse: Enjuba weeviirayo okutuusa bw’egwa, erinnya lya MUKAMA litenderezebwenga.

4.verse: MUKAMA agulumizibwa okusinga amawanga gonna, era n’ekitiibwa kye kisinga eggulu.

5.verse: Ani afaanana nga MUKAMA Katonda waffe, atuula ku ntebe ye ey’obwakabaka eri waggulu ennyo,

6.verse: ne yeetoowaza okutunuulira eggulu n’ensi?

7.verse: Abaavu abayimusa n’abaggya mu nfuufu; n’abali mu kwetaaga n’abasitula ng’abaggya mu vvu,

8.verse: n’abatuuza wamu n’abalangira, awamu n’abalangira abo abafuga abantu be.

9.verse: Omukazi omugumba amuwa abaana, n’abeera mu maka ge n’ezzadde lye ng’ajjudde essanyu. Mutendereze MUKAMA!

1.verse: Isirayiri bwe yava mu Misiri, abaana ba Yakobo abo, ne bava mu bantu abaayogeranga olulimi olutali lwabwe;

2.verse: Yuda n’afuuka omutukuvu wa Katonda, Isirayiri n’afuuka amatwale ge.

3.verse: Ennyanja bwe yabalaba n’edduka; Omugga Yoludaani ne gudda emabega.

4.verse: Ensozi ne zibuukabuuka ng’endiga zisseddume, n’obusozi obutono ng’obuliga obuto.

5.verse: Ggwe ennyanja, lwaki wadduka? Ggwe Yoludaani, lwaki wadda emabega?

6.verse: Mmwe ensozi, lwaki mwabuukabuuka ng’endiga zisseddume, nammwe obusozi obutono ng’obuliga obuto?

7.verse: Kankana, ggwe ensi, mu maaso ga Mukama, mu maaso ga Katonda wa Yakobo,

8.verse: eyafuula olwazi ekidiba eky’amazzi, n’olwazi olugumu n’aluggyamu ensulo ez’amazzi.

1.verse: Si ffe, Ayi MUKAMA, si ffe. Wabula erinnya lyo lye ligwana okuweebwanga ekitiibwa, olw’okwagala kwo n’olw’obwesigwa bwo.

2.verse: Lwaki amawanga gabuuza nti, “Katonda waabwe ali ludda wa?”

3.verse: Katonda waffe ali mu ggulu; akola buli ky’ayagala.

4.verse: Bakatonda baabwe bakole mu ffeeza ne zaabu, ebikolebwa n’emikono gy’abantu.

5.verse: Birina emimwa, naye tebyogera; birina amaaso, naye tebiraba.

6.verse: Birina amatu, naye tebiwulira; birina ennyindo, naye tebiwunyiriza.

7.verse: Birina engalo, naye tebikwata; birina ebigere, naye tebitambula; ne mu bulago bwabyo temuvaamu ddoboozi n’akamu,

8.verse: abakozi ababikola, n’abo bonna ababyesiga balibifaanana.

9.verse: Mmwe ennyumba ya Isirayiri mwesigenga MUKAMA, ye mubeezi wammwe era ye ngabo yammwe.

10.verse: Mmwe ennyumba ya Alooni mwesigenga MUKAMA, ye mubeezi wammwe era ye ngabo yammwe.

11.verse: Mmwe abamutya, mwesigenga MUKAMA, ye mubeezi wammwe, era ye ngabo yammwe.

12.verse: MUKAMA anaatujjukiranga, era anaatuwanga omukisa. Ab’ennyumba ya Isirayiri anaabawanga omukisa; ab’omu nnyumba ya Alooni anaabawanga omukisa;

13.verse: n’abo abamutya, ab’ekitiibwa n’abatali ba kitiibwa, MUKAMA anaabawanga omukisa.

14.verse: MUKAMA abaaze mweyongere nnyo obungi, mmwe n’abaana bammwe.

15.verse: MUKAMA, eyakola eggulu n’ensi, abawe omukisa.

16.verse: Eggulu ery’oku ntikko lya MUKAMA, naye ensi yagiwa abantu bonna.

17.verse: Abafu tebatendereza MUKAMA, wadde abo abaserengeta emagombe.

18.verse: Naye ffe tunaatenderezanga MUKAMA, okuva leero n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna. Mutendereze MUKAMA!

1.verse: MUKAMA mmwagala, kubanga awulidde eddoboozi lyange n’okwegayirira kwange.

2.verse: Kubanga ateze okutu kwe gye ndi, kyennaavanga mmukoowoola ebbanga lyonna lye ndimala nga nkyali mulamu.

3.verse: Emiguwa gy’okufa gyansiba, n’okulumwa okw’emagombe kwankwata; ne nzijula ennaku nnyingi n’okutya.

4.verse: Ne ndyoka nkoowoola erinnya lya MUKAMA nti, “Ayi MUKAMA, ndokola.”

5.verse: MUKAMA wa kisa, era mutuukirivu; Katonda waffe ajjudde okusaasira.

6.verse: MUKAMA alabirira abantu abaabulijjo; bwe nnali mu buzibu obunene, n’andokola.

7.verse: Wummula ggwe emmeeme yange, kubanga MUKAMA abadde mulungi gy’oli.

8.verse: Kubanga ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, owonyezza omwoyo gwange okufa, n’amaaso gange ogawonyezza okukaaba; n’ebigere byange n’obiwonya okwesittala,

9.verse: ndyoke ntambulirenga mu maaso ga MUKAMA mu nsi ey’abalamu.

10.verse: Nakkiriza kyennava njogera nti, “Numizibbwa nnyo.”

11.verse: Ne njogera nga nterebuse nti, “Abantu bonna baliraba.”

12.verse: MUKAMA ndimusasula ntya olw’ebirungi bye ebingi bwe bityo by’ankoledde?

13.verse: Nditoola ekikompe eky’obulokozi, ne nkoowoola erinnya lya MUKAMA.

14.verse: Ndituukiriza obweyamo bwange eri MUKAMA, mu maaso g’abantu be bonna.

15.verse: Okufa kw’abatukuvu ba MUKAMA kwa muwendo nnyo eri MUKAMA.

16.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, onsumuluddeko ebyansiba n’onfuula wa ddembe, nange nnaakuweerezanga ennaku zonna.

17.verse: Ndiwaayo ekiweebwayo eky’okwebaza, ne nkoowoola erinnya lya MUKAMA.

18.verse: Ndituukiriza obweyamo bwange eri MUKAMA, mu maaso g’abantu be bonna,

19.verse: mu mpya z’ennyumba ya MUKAMA; wakati wo, ggwe Yerusaalemi. Mutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA, mmwe ensi zonna; mumugulumize, mmwe amawanga gonna.

2.verse: Kubanga okwagala kwe okutaggwaawo kungi gye tuli; n’obwesigwa bwa MUKAMA bwa lubeerera. Mutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA, kubanga mulungi; okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

2.verse: Kale Isirayiri ayogere nti, “Okwagala kwa MUKAMA kubeerera emirembe gyonna.”

3.verse: N’ab’ennyumba ya Alooni boogere nti, “Okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.”

4.verse: Abo abatya MUKAMA boogere nti, “Okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.”

5.verse: Bwe nnali mu nnaku empitirivu, nakoowoola MUKAMA, n’annyanukula, n’agimponya.

6.verse: MUKAMA ali ku ludda lwange, siriiko kye ntya. Abantu bayinza kunkolako ki?

7.verse: MUKAMA ali nange, ye anyamba. Abalabe bange nnaabatunuuliranga n’amaaso ag’obuwanguzi.

8.verse: Kirungi okwesiga MUKAMA okusinga okwesiga omuntu.

9.verse: Kirungi okuddukira eri MUKAMA okusinga okwesiga abalangira.

10.verse: Ensi zonna zanzinda ne zinneebungulula, naye mu linnya lya MUKAMA naziwangula.

11.verse: Banneebungulula enjuuyi zonna; naye mu linnya lya MUKAMA nabawangula.

12.verse: Bankuŋŋaanirako ne banneebungulula ng’enjuki; naye ne basirikka ng’amaggwa agakutte omuliro; mu linnya lya MUKAMA nabawangula.

13.verse: Bannumba n’amaanyi mangi, ne mbulako katono okugwa; naye MUKAMA n’annyamba.

14.verse: MUKAMA ge maanyi gange, era lwe luyimba lwange, afuuse obulokozi bwange.

15.verse: Muwulire ennyimba ez’essanyu ez’obuwanguzi, nga ziyimbirwa mu weema z’abatuukirivu nti, “Omukono gwa MUKAMA ogwa ddyo gutukoledde ebikulu!

16.verse: Omukono gwa MUKAMA ogwa ddyo gugulumizibbwa; omukono gwa MUKAMA ogwa ddyo gutukoledde ebikulu!”

17.verse: Sijja kufa, wabula nzija kuba mulamu, ndyoke ntegeeze ebyo byonna MUKAMA by’akoze.

18.verse: MUKAMA ambonerezza nnyo, naye tandese kufa.

19.verse: Munzigulirewo emiryango egy’obutuukirivu, nnyingire, neebaze MUKAMA.

20.verse: Guno gwe mulyango omunene ogwa MUKAMA, abatuukirivu mmwe banaayingiriranga.

21.verse: Nkwebaza kubanga onnyanukudde n’ofuuka obulokozi bwange.

22.verse: Ejjinja abazimbi lye baagaana lye lifuuse ejjinja ekkulu ery’oku nsonda.

23.verse: Kino MUKAMA ye yakikola; era ffe tukiraba nga kya kitalo mu maaso gaffe.

24.verse: Luno lwe lunaku MUKAMA lw’akoze; tusanyuke tulujagulizeeko.

25.verse: Ayi MUKAMA tukwegayiridde, tulokole, Ayi MUKAMA tukwegayiridde otuwe obuwanguzi.

26.verse: Alina omukisa oyo ajja mu linnya lya MUKAMA. Tubasabidde omukisa nga tuli mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA.

27.verse: MUKAMA ye Katonda, y’atwakiza omusana. Mukumbire wamu nga mukutte amatabi mu ngalo zammwe n’ekiweebwayo kyammwe kituukire ddala ku mayembe g’ekyoto.

28.verse: Ggwe Katonda wange, nnaakwebazanga; ggwe Katonda wange, nange nnaakugulumizanga.

29.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA kubanga mulungi, n’okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: א Alefu Balina omukisa abo abatambulira mu butuukirivu; abatambulira mu mateeka ga MUKAMA.

2.verse: Balina omukisa abo abagondera ebiragiro bye, era abanoonya MUKAMA n’omutima gwabwe gwonna.

3.verse: Abo abatasobya, era abatambulira mu makubo ge.

4.verse: Ggwe wateekawo ebiragiro byo; n’olagira bigonderwenga n’obwegendereza bungi.

5.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, nsaba mbeerenga munywevu bulijjo; nga nkuuma bye walagira.

6.verse: Bwe ntyo siriswazibwa, amaaso gange nga ngasimbye ku ebyo bye walagira byonna.

7.verse: Nga njiga ebiragiro byo ebitukuvu, nnaakutenderezanga n’omutima omulungi.

8.verse: Nnaakwatanga amateeka go; Ayi MUKAMA, tonsuulira ddala.

9.verse: ב Bessi Omuvubuka anaakuumanga atya ekkubo lye nga ttereevu? Anaalikuumanga ng’agoberera ekigambo kyo nga bwe kiri.

10.verse: Nkunoonya n’omutima gwange gwonna; tonzikiriza kuva ku mateeka go.

11.verse: Ntadde ekigambo kyo mu mutima gwange; ndyoke nneme okwonoona.

12.verse: Ogulumizibwe, Ayi MUKAMA; onjigirize amateeka go.

13.verse: Njatula n’akamwa kange amateeka go gonna ge walagira.

14.verse: Nsanyukira okugondera ebiragiro byo, ng’asanyukira eby’obugagga.

15.verse: Nnaafumiitirizanga ku biragiro byo, ne nzisaayo omwoyo ku makubo go.

16.verse: Nnaasanyukiranga amateeka go, era siigeerabirenga.

17.verse: ג Gimero Omuddu wo omukolere ebirungi, mbe omulamu, ngobererenga ekigambo kyo.

18.verse: Ozibule amaaso gange, nsobole okulaba eby’ekitalo ebiri mu mateeka go.

19.verse: Nze ndi muyise ku nsi; tonkisa bye walagira.

20.verse: Bulijjo emmeeme yange eyaayaanira amateeka go.

21.verse: Onenya ab’amalala, abaakolimirwa, abaleka amateeka go.

22.verse: Mponya okuduula kwabwe n’okunyooma kwabwe; kubanga bye walagira mbigondera.

23.verse: Newaakubadde ng’abalangira bansalira enkwe; naye nze, omuweereza wo, nnaafumiitirizanga ku biragiro byo.

24.verse: Amateeka go lye ssanyu lyange, era ge gannuŋŋamya.

25.verse: ד Daleeti Nzigweddemu amaanyi, ndi wansi mu nfuufu; nkusaba onzizeemu endasi ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

26.verse: Nakutegeeza bye nteesezza okukola, n’onnyanukula; onjigirize amateeka go.

27.verse: Njigiriza amateeka go bye gagamba, nange nnaafumiitirizanga ku byamagero byo.

28.verse: Emmeeme empweddemu ensa olw’okunakuwala; onzizeemu amaanyi ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

29.verse: Nzigiraako ddala ebyo ebitali bya butuukirivu; olw’ekisa kyo njigiriza amateeka go.

30.verse: Nonzeewo okubeera omwesigwa; ntambulire mu ebyo bye walagira.

31.verse: Nnyweredde ku biragiro byo, Ayi MUKAMA, tondeka kuswazibwa.

32.verse: Bw’onoosumulula omutima gwange, nnaatambuliranga mu makubo go ng’ebiragiro byo bwe biri.

33.verse: ה Eh Njigiriza, Ayi MUKAMA, okugonderanga ebiragiro byo; ndyoke mbinywezenga ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwange.

34.verse: Mpa okutegeera ndyoke nkuume amateeka go era ngakwate n’omutima gwange gwonna.

35.verse: Ntambuliza mu mateeka go, kubanga mwe nsanyukira.

36.verse: Okyuse omutima gwange ogulaze eri ebyo bye walagira; so si eri eby’okufuna ebitaliimu.

37.verse: Kyusa amaaso gange galeme okunneegombesa ebitaliimu; obulamu bwange obufuule obuggya ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

38.verse: Tuukiriza kye wasuubiza omuddu wo, kubanga ekyo kye wasuubiza abo abakutya.

39.verse: Nziggyako okunyoomebwa kuno kwe ntya, kubanga ebiragiro byo birungi.

40.verse: Laba, njayaanira ebiragiro byo; onkomyewo mu butuukirivu bwo.

41.verse: ו Waawu Okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo kujje gye ndi, Ayi MUKAMA; ompe obulokozi bwo nga bwe wasuubiza;

42.verse: ndyoke mbeere n’eky’okwanukula abo abambonyaabonya; kubanga neesiga kigambo kyo.

43.verse: Toganya kigambo ekitali kya mazima okuva mu kamwa kange; kubanga essuubi lyange liri mu ebyo bye walagira.

44.verse: Nnaagonderanga amateeka go ennaku zonna, emirembe n’emirembe.

45.verse: Era nnaatambulanga n’emirembe, kubanga ngoberedde ebyo bye walagira.

46.verse: Era nnaayogeranga ku biragiro by’omu maaso ga bakabaka, nga sikwatibwa nsonyi.

47.verse: Kubanga nsanyukira amateeka go, era ngaagala.

48.verse: Nzisaamu nnyo ekitiibwa ebiragiro byo era mbyagala. Nnaafumiitirizanga ku mateeka go.

49.verse: ז Zayini Jjukira ekigambo kye wansuubiza, nze omuddu wo, kubanga gwe wampa essuubi.

50.verse: Ekiwummuza omutima gwange nga ndi mu bulumi kye kisuubizo kyo ekimpa obulamu.

51.verse: Ab’amalala banduulira obutamala, naye nze siva ku mateeka go.

52.verse: Bwe ndowooza ku biragiro byo eby’edda, Ayi MUKAMA, biwummuza omutima gwange.

53.verse: Nkyawa nnyo abakola ebibi, abaleka amateeka go.

54.verse: Ebiragiro byo binfuukidde ennyimba buli we nsula nga ndi mu lugendo lwange.

55.verse: Mu kiro nzijukira erinnya lyo, Ayi MUKAMA, ne neekuuma amateeka go.

57.verse: ח Esi Ggwe mugabo gwange, Ayi MUKAMA; nasuubiza okukugonderanga.

58.verse: Nkwegayirira n’omutima gwange gwonna, ondage ekisa kyo nga bwe wasuubiza.

59.verse: Bwe ndabye amakubo amakyamu ge nkutte, ne nkyuka okugoberera ebiragiro byo.

60.verse: Nyanguwa nnyo okugondera amateeka go, so seekunya.

61.verse: Newaakubadde ng’emiguwa gy’ababi ginsibye, naye seerabirenga mateeka go.

62.verse: Nzuukuka mu ttumbi okukwebaza, olw’ebiragiro byo ebituukirivu.

63.verse: Ntambula n’abo abakutya, abo bonna abakwata amateeka go.

64.verse: Ensi, Ayi MUKAMA, ejjudde okwagala kwo; onjigirize amateeka go.

65.verse: ט Teesi Okoze bulungi omuddu wo, Ayi MUKAMA, ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

66.verse: Njigiriza okumanya n’okwawula ekirungi n’ekibi, era ompe okumanya; kubanga nzikiririza mu mateeka go.

67.verse: Bwe wali tonnambonereza nakyama nnyo, naye kaakano ŋŋondera ekigambo kyo.

68.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, oli mulungi era okola ebirungi; onjigirize amateeka go.

69.verse: Ab’amalala banjogeddeko nnyo eby’obulimba, naye nze nkwata ebyo bye walagira, n’omutima gwange gwonna.

70.verse: Omutima gwabwe gugezze ne gusavuwala; naye nze nsanyukira amateeka go.

71.verse: Okubonerezebwa kwangasa, ndyoke njige amateeka go.

72.verse: Amateeka go ge walagira ga mugaso nnyo gye ndi okusinga enkumi n’enkumi eza ffeeza ne zaabu.

73.verse: י Yoodi Emikono gyo gye gyankola ne gimmumba, mpa okutegeera ndyoke njige amateeka go.

74.verse: Abo abakutya banandabanga ne basanyuka, kubanga essuubi lyange liri mu kigambo kyo.

75.verse: Mmanyi, Ayi MUKAMA, ng’amateeka go matukuvu, era wali mutuufu okumbonereza.

76.verse: Kale okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo kumbeere kumpi kunsanyuse, nga bwe wansuubiza, nze omuddu wo.

77.verse: Kkiriza okusaasira kwo kuntuukeko ndyoke mbeere mulamu; kubanga mu mateeka go mwe nsanyukira.

78.verse: Ab’amalala baswazibwe, kubanga bampisizza bubi nga siriiko kye nkoze. Naye nze nnaafumiitirizanga ku biragiro byo.

79.verse: Abo abakutya bajje gye ndi, abategeera amateeka go.

80.verse: Mbeera, omutima gwange guleme kubaako kya kunenyezebwa mu mateeka go, nneme kuswazibwa!

81.verse: כ Kaafu Emmeeme yange erumwa nnyo ennyonta ng’eyaayaanira obulokozi bwo, essuubi lyange liri mu kigambo kyo.

82.verse: Ntunuulidde ebbanga ddene n’amaaso gange ne ganfuuyirira nga nninda okutuukirira kw’ekisuubizo kyo; ne neebuuza nti, “Olinsanyusa ddi?”

83.verse: Newaakubadde nga nfuuse ng’ensawo ey’eddiba, eya wayini eri mu mukka, naye seerabira bye walagira.

84.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, nze omuddu wo nnaalindirira kutuusa ddi nga tonnabonereza abo abanjigganya?

85.verse: Abantu ab’amalala abatatya Katonda bansimidde ebinnya mu kkubo; be bo abatagondera mateeka go.

86.verse: Amateeka go gonna geesigibwa; abo abatakwagala banjigganyiza bwereere; nkusaba onnyambe!

87.verse: Baali kumpi okunzikiririza ddala ku nsi kuno; naye nze sivudde ku ebyo bye walagira.

88.verse: Olw’okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo ndekera obulamu bwange, ndyoke nkuume ebyo bye walagira ebiva mu kamwa ko.

89.verse: ל Lamedi Ayi MUKAMA, Ekigambo kyo kinywevu mu ggulu, kya mirembe gyonna.

90.verse: Obwesigwa bwo tebuggwaawo emirembe gyonna; watonda ensi era enyweredde ddala.

91.verse: Amateeka go na buli kati manywevu; kubanga ebintu byonna bikuweereza.

92.verse: Singa nnali sisanyukira mu mateeka go, nandizikiridde olw’obulumi bwe nalimu.

93.verse: Siyinza kwerabira biragiro byo; kubanga mu ebyo obulamu bwange mw’obufuulidde obuggya.

94.verse: Ndi wuwo, ndokola, kubanga neekuumye bye walagira.

95.verse: Newaakubadde ng’abakola ebibi beekukumye nga banteeze okunzikiriza; naye nze nyweredde ku ebyo bye walagira.

96.verse: Ebintu byonna biriko we bikoma naye amateeka go tegakugirwa.

97.verse: מ Meemu Amateeka go nga ngagala nnyo! Ngafumiitirizaako olunaku lwonna.

98.verse: Amateeka go ganfuula mugezi okusinga abalabe bange, kubanga ge gannuŋŋamya bulijjo.

99.verse: Ntegeera okusinga abasomesa bange bonna, kubanga nfumiitiriza nnyo ebyo bye walagira.

100.verse: Ntegeera okusinga abakadde; kubanga ŋŋondera ebyo bye walagira.

101.verse: Neekuumye obutatambulira mu kkubo lyonna ekyamu, nsobole okugondera ekigambo kyo.

102.verse: Sivudde ku mateeka go, kubanga ggwe waganjigiriza.

103.verse: Ebisuubizo byo nga bimpoomera nnyo! Biwoomera akamwa kange okusinga omubisi gw’enjuki.

104.verse: Mu biragiro byo mwe nfunira okutegeera; kyenva nkyawa ekkubo lyonna ekyamu.

105.verse: נ Nuuni Ekigambo kyo ye ttaala eri ebigere byange, era kye kimulisa ekkubo lyange.

106.verse: Ndayidde ekirayiro era nkikakasizza nga nnaakwatanga amateeka ag’obutuukirivu bwo.

107.verse: Nnumizibwa nnyo; nzizaamu obulamu, Ayi MUKAMA, ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

108.verse: Okkirize Ayi MUKAMA ettendo akamwa kange lye kakuwa; era onjigirize amateeka go.

109.verse: Newaakubadde ng’obulamu bwange ntera okubutambuza nga bwe njagala, naye seerabira mateeka go.

110.verse: Abakola ebibi banteze omutego, naye sikyamye kuva ku ebyo bye walagira.

111.verse: Ebiragiro byo gwe mugabo gwange emirembe gyonna; weewaawo, ebyo bye bisanyusa omutima gwange.

112.verse: Omutima gwange gweteeseteese okukwatanga ebiragiro byo ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwange.

113.verse: ס Sameki Nkyawa abalina emitima egisagaasagana, naye nze njagala amateeka go.

114.verse: Ggwe kiddukiro kyange era ggwe ngabo yange; essuubi lyange liri mu kigambo kyo.

115.verse: Muve we ndi mmwe abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu, mundeke nkwate ebiragiro bya Katonda wange.

116.verse: Onnyweze nga bwe wasuubiza, ndyoke mbeere omulamu; nneme kuswazibwa ne nzigwamu essuubi.

117.verse: Onnyweze ndyoke nfuuke ow’eddembe, era nkwatenga ebiragiro byo bulijjo.

118.verse: Onyooma abo bonna abaleka ebiragiro byo; weewaawo obugezigezi bwabwe tebuliimu kantu.

119.verse: Abakola ebibi bonna mu nsi obalaba ng’ebisasiro; nze kyenva njagala ebyo bye walagira.

120.verse: Nkankana nzenna nga nkutya, era ntya amateeka go.

121.verse: ע Ayini Nkoze eby’obwenkanya era eby’obutuukirivu; tondeka mu mikono gy’abo abanjooga.

122.verse: Okakase okundaganga ekisa kyo bulijjo, oleme kukkiriza ababi okunjooganga.

123.verse: Amaaso gange ganfuuyiririra, nga nnindirira obulokozi bwo n’ebyo bye wasuubiza mu butuukirivu bwo.

124.verse: Nze omuddu wo nkolaako ng’okwagala kwo bwe kuli; era onjigirize amateeka go.

125.verse: Ndi muddu wo, mpa okwawula ekirungi n’ekibi; ndyoke ntegeere ebiragiro byo.

126.verse: Ekiseera kituuse, Ayi MUKAMA, okubaako ky’okola, kubanga amateeka go gamenyeddwa.

127.verse: Naye nze njagala amateeka go okusinga zaabu, wadde zaabu omulongoose.

128.verse: Kubanga mmanyi ng’ebiragiro byo byonna bituufu; nkyawa buli kkubo lyonna ekyamu.

129.verse: פ Pe Ebiragiro byo bya kitalo; kyenva mbigondera.

130.verse: Ebigambo byo bwe binnyonnyolwa bireeta omusana; n’atategeera bulungi bimugeziwaza.

131.verse: Njasamya akamwa kange ne mpejjawejja nga njaayaanira amateeka go.

132.verse: Nkyukira, onkwatirwe ekisa, nga bw’okolera bulijjo abo abaagala erinnya lyo.

133.verse: Oluŋŋamye ebigere byange ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri, era tokkiriza kibi kyonna kunfuga.

134.verse: Mponya okujooga kw’abantu, bwe ntyo nkwatenga ebiragiro byo.

135.verse: Ontunuulire, nze omuddu wo, n’amaaso ag’ekisa, era onjigirizenga amateeka go.

136.verse: Amaziga gakulukuta mu maaso gange ng’omugga, olw’abo abatakwata mateeka go.

137.verse: צ Tisade Oli mutuukirivu, Ayi Katonda, era amateeka go matuufu.

138.verse: Ebiragiro byo bye wateekawo bituukirivu, era byesigibwa.

139.verse: Nnyiikadde nnyo munda yange, olw’abalabe bange abatassaayo mwoyo eri ebiragiro byo.

140.verse: Ebisuubizo byo byetegerezebwa nnyo, kyenva mbyagala.

141.verse: Newaakubadde ndi muntu wa bulijjo era anyoomebwa, naye seerabira biragiro byo.

142.verse: Obutuukirivu bwo bwa lubeerera, n’amateeka go ga mazima.

143.verse: Newaakubadde nga ndi mu kulumwa n’okutegana okungi, amateeka go ge gansanyusa.

144.verse: Ebiragiro byo bituufu emirembe gyonna; onjigirize okubitegeera ndyoke mbeere omulamu.

145.verse: ק Koofu Nkoowoola n’omutima gwange gwonna, Ayi MUKAMA, onnyanukule! Nnaagonderanga amateeka go.

147.verse: Ngolokoka bunatera okukya ne nkukaabirira onnyambe; essuubi lyange liri mu kigambo kyo.

148.verse: Seebaka ekiro kyonna nga nfumiitiriza ku ebyo bye wasuubiza.

149.verse: Olw’okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo wulira eddoboozi lyange, Ayi MUKAMA, ompe obulamu obuggya ng’amateeka go bwe gali.

150.verse: Abo ab’enkwe era abatakwata mateeka go bansemberedde, kyokka bali wala n’amateeka go.

151.verse: Naye ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, oli kumpi nange, era n’amateeka go gonna ga mazima.

152.verse: Okuva edda n’edda nayiga mu biragiro byo, nga wabissaawo bibeerewo emirembe gyonna.

153.verse: ר Leesi Tunuulira okubonaabona kwange omponye, kubanga seerabira mateeka go.

154.verse: Ompolereze, onnunule, onzizeemu obulamu nga bwe wasuubiza.

155.verse: Abakola ebibi obulokozi bubabeera wala, kubanga tebanoonya mateeka go.

156.verse: Ekisa kyo kinene, Ayi MUKAMA, onzizeemu obulamu nga bwe wasuubiza.

157.verse: Abalabe abanjigganya bangi, naye nze siivenga ku biragiro byo.

158.verse: Nnakuwalira abo abatakwesiga, kubanga tebakwata biragiro byo.

159.verse: Laba, Ayi MUKAMA, bwe njagala ebiragiro byo! Onkuumenga ng’okwagala kwo bwe kuli.

160.verse: Ebigambo byo byonna bya mazima meereere; n’amateeka go ga lubeerera.

161.verse: ש Sini ne Sikini Abafuzi banjigganyiza bwereere, naye ekigambo kyo nkissaamu ekitiibwa.

162.verse: Nsanyukira ekisuubizo kyo okufaanana ng’oyo afunye obugagga obungi.

163.verse: Nkyawa era ntamwa obulimba, naye amateeka go ngagala.

164.verse: Mu lunaku nkutendereza emirundi musanvu olw’amateeka go amatuukirivu.

165.verse: Abo abaagala amateeka go bali mu ddembe lingi; tewali kisobola kubeesittaza.

166.verse: Nnindirira obulokozi bwo, Ayi MUKAMA, era mu biragiro byo mwe ntambulira.

167.verse: Ŋŋondera ebiragiro byo, mbyagala nnyo nnyini.

168.verse: Buli kye nkola okimanyi, era olaba nga bwe nkwata ebiragiro byo.

169.verse: ת Taawu Okukaaba kwange kutuuke gy’oli, Ayi MUKAMA, ompe okutegeera ng’ekigambo kyo bwe kiri.

170.verse: Okwegayirira kwange kutuuke gy’oli, onnunule nga bwe wasuubiza.

171.verse: Akamwa kange kanaakutenderezanga, kubanga gw’onjigiriza amateeka go.

172.verse: Olulimi lwange lunaayimbanga ekigambo kyo, kubanga bye walagira byonna bya butuukirivu.

173.verse: Omukono gwo gumbeerenga, kubanga nnonzeewo okukwatanga ebiragiro byo.

174.verse: Neegomba nnyo obulokozi bwo, Ayi MUKAMA, era amateeka go lye ssanyu lyange.

175.verse: Ompe obulamu nkutenderezenga, era amateeka go gampanirirenga.

176.verse: Ndi ng’endiga ebuze. Onoonye omuddu wo, kubanga seerabidde mateeka go.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Nkoowoola MUKAMA nga ndi mu nnaku, era n’annyanukula.

2.verse: Omponye, Ayi MUKAMA, emimwa egy’obulimba, n’olulimi olw’obukuusa.

3.verse: Onooweebwa ki, era onookolebwa otya, ggwe olulimi olukuusa?

4.verse: Onoofumitibwa n’obusaale obwogi obw’omulwanyi omuzira, n’oyokerwa ku manda ag’omuti entaseesa.

5.verse: Ndabye ennaku, kubanga mbeera mu Meseki; nsula mu weema za Kedali!

6.verse: Ndudde nnyo mu bantu abakyawa eddembe.

7.verse: Nze njagala mirembe, naye bwe njogera bo baagala ntalo.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Nnyimusa amaaso gange eri ensozi, okubeerwa kwange kuva wa?

2.verse: Okubeerwa kwange kuva eri MUKAMA, eyakola eggulu n’ensi.

3.verse: Taliganya kigere kyo kusagaasagana; oyo akukuuma taabongootenga.

4.verse: Laba, oyo akuuma Isirayiri taabongootenga so teyeebakenga.

5.verse: MUKAMA ye mukuumi wo; MUKAMA y’akusiikiriza ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo;

6.verse: emisana enjuba teekwokyenga, wadde omwezi ekiro.

7.verse: MUKAMA anaakukuumanga mu buli kabi; anaalabiriranga obulamu bwo.

8.verse: MUKAMA anaakukumanga amagenda go n’amadda, okuva leero n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Lwa Dawudi. Nasanyuka bwe baŋŋamba nti, “Tugende mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA!”

2.verse: Ebigere byaffe biyimiridde mu miryango gyo, Ayi Yerusaalemi.

3.verse: Yerusaalemi yazimbibwa okuba ekibuga ekinywevu ekiyimiridde awamu.

4.verse: Eyo ebika byonna gye biraga, ebika bya MUKAMA, okutendereza erinnya lya MUKAMA ng’ebiragiro ebyaweebwa Isirayiri bwe biri.

5.verse: Eyo entebe ez’okusalirako emisango gye zaateekebwa; z’entebe ez’obwakabaka ez’ennyumba ya Dawudi.

6.verse: Musabirenga Yerusaalemi emirembe: “Abo abakwagala bafune ebirungi.

7.verse: Emirembe gibeerenga munda w’ebisenge byo; n’amayumba go amanene gabeerenga n’omukisa era nga manywevu.”

8.verse: Olwa baganda bange ne mikwano gyange nnaayogeranga nti, “Emirembe gibeerenga mu ggwe.”

9.verse: Olw’obulungi bw’ennyumba ya MUKAMA Katonda waffe, nnaanoonyanga okukulaakulana kwa Yerusaalemi.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Nnyimusa amaaso gange gy’oli, Ayi ggwe atuula ku ntebe ey’obwakabaka mu ggulu.

2.verse: Amaaso g’abaddu nga bwe gatunuulira omukono gwa mukama waabwe; n’amaaso g’omuweereza omukazi nga bwe gatunuulira omukono gwa mugole we, n’amaaso gaffe bwe gatyo bwe gatunuulira MUKAMA Katonda waffe, okutuusa lw’alitusaasira.

3.verse: Tusaasire, Ayi MUKAMA, tusaasire, kubanga tunyoomeddwa nnyo ddala.

4.verse: Emitima gyaffe gijjudde ennaku olw’okuduulirwa abo abeeyagala, n’okunyoomebwa ab’amalala.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Lwa Dawudi. Isirayiri agamba nti, singa Katonda teyali ku ludda lwaffe,

2.verse: singa Katonda teyali ku ludda lwaffe abalabe baffe bwe baatulumba,

3.verse: banditusaanyizzaawo mu kaseera buseera, obusungu bwabwe bwe bwatubuubuukirako.

4.verse: Amataba g’obusungu bwabwe ganditusaanyizzaawo, ne mukoka n’atukulukutirako;

5.verse: amazzi ag’obusungu bwabwe agayira ganditukuluggusizza.

6.verse: MUKAMA atenderezebwe atatugabuddeeyo ne tutaagulwataagulwa amannyo gaabwe.

7.verse: Tuwonye ng’ekinyonyi bwe kiva ku mutego gw’abatezi; omutego gukutuse, naffe tuwonye!

8.verse: Okubeerwa kwaffe kuli mu linnya lya MUKAMA, eyakola eggulu n’ensi.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Abeesiga MUKAMA bali ng’olusozi Sayuuni olutayinza kusiguukululwa, naye olubeerawo emirembe gyonna.

2.verse: Ensozi nga bwe zeetooloola Yerusaalemi, ne MUKAMA bw’atyo bwe yeetooloola abantu be, okuva kaakano n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna.

3.verse: Kubanga abafuzi abakola ebibi tebalifugira mu nsi y’abatuukirivu, baleme okuwaliriza abatuukirivu okukola ebibi.

4.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, abalungi n’abo abalina omutima omulongoofu bakolere ebirungi.

5.verse: Naye abo abalaga mu makubo gaabwe amakyamu, MUKAMA alibawaŋŋangusa wamu n’abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. Emirembe gibe ku Isirayiri.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. MUKAMA bwe yakomyawo abawaŋŋanguse ba Sayuuni, twafaanana ng’abaloota.

2.verse: Olwo akamwa kaffe ne kajjula enseko, ne nnimi zaffe ne ziyimba ennyimba ez’essanyu. Amawanga ne gagamba nti, “MUKAMA abakoledde ebikulu.”

3.verse: MUKAMA atukoledde ebikulu, kyetuvudde tusanyuka.

4.verse: Otuzze obuggya, Ayi MUKAMA, tufaanane ng’emigga egikulukutira mu lusenyi.

5.verse: Abo abasiga nga bakaaba amaziga, baliyimba ennyimba ez’essanyu nga bakungula.

6.verse: Oyo agenda ng’akaaba ng’atwala ensigo okusiga; alikomawo ng’ayimba ennyimba ez’essanyu ng’aleeta ebinywa bye.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Lwa Sulemaani. MUKAMA bw’atazimba nnyumba, abo abagizimba bazimbira bwereere. MUKAMA bw’atakuuma kibuga, abakuumi bateganira bwereere.

2.verse: Oteganira bwereere bw’okeera mu makya n’okola, ate n’olwawo n’okwebaka ng’okolerera ekyokulya; kubanga MUKAMA abaagalwa be abawa otulo.

3.verse: Abaana aboobulenzi kya bugagga okuva eri MUKAMA; era abaana mpeera gy’agaba okuva gy’ali.

4.verse: Ng’obusaale bwe bubeera mu mukono gw’omulwanyi, n’abaana abazaalibwa mu buvubuka bw’omuntu bwe bali bwe batyo.

5.verse: Alina omukisa omuntu oyo ajjuzza ensawo ye n’obusaale, kubanga tebaliswazibwa; balyolekera abalabe baabwe mu mulyango omunene.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Balina omukisa abatya Katonda; era abatambulira mu makubo ge.

2.verse: Olirya ebibala ebiriva mu kutegana kwo; oliweebwa emikisa era olifuna ebirungi.

3.verse: Mu nnyumba yo, mukyala wo aliba ng’omuzabbibu ogubala ennyo; abaana bo aboobulenzi baliba ng’amatabi g’emizeeyituuni nga beetoolodde emmeeza yo.

4.verse: Bw’atyo bw’aweebwa emikisa omuntu atya MUKAMA.

5.verse: MUKAMA akuwenga omukisa ng’asinziira mu Sayuuni, era olabe Yerusaalemi nga kijjudde ebirungi ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwo.

6.verse: Owangaale olabe abaana b’abaana bo! Emirembe gibeere mu Isirayiri.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Isirayiri ayogere nti, “Bambonyaabonyezza nnyo okuva mu buvubuka bwange.”

2.verse: Ddala bambonyaabonyezza nnyo okuva mu buvubuka bwange; naye tebampangudde.

3.verse: Newaakubadde ng’omugongo gwange gujjudde enkovu olw’embooko ze bankubye era ne gulabika nga kwe bayisizza ekyuma ekirima,

4.verse: kyokka MUKAMA mutuukirivu; amenyeemenye enjegere z’abakola ebibi.

5.verse: Abo bonna abakyawa Sayuuni bagobebwe era bazzibweyo emabega nga baswadde.

6.verse: Babeere ng’omuddo ogumera waggulu ku nnyumba, oguwotoka nga tegunnakula.

7.verse: Omukunguzi tagufaako, n’oyo asiba ebinywa agunyooma.

8.verse: Wadde abayitawo baleme kwogera nti, “Omukisa gwa MUKAMA gube ku mmwe. Tubasabidde omukisa mu linnya lya MUKAMA.”

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Ayi MUKAMA, nkukaabira nga nsobeddwa nnyo.

2.verse: Ayi Mukama, wulira eddoboozi lyange; otege amatu go eri eddoboozi ly’okwegayirira kwange.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, singa otubalira obutali butuukirivu bwaffe, ani eyandiyimiridde mu maaso go?

4.verse: Naye osonyiwa; noolwekyo ossibwamu ekitiibwa.

5.verse: Nnindirira MUKAMA, emmeeme yange erindirira era essuubi lyange liri mu kigambo kye.

6.verse: Emmeeme yange erindirira Mukama; mmulindirira okusinga ng’abakuumi bwe balindirira obudde okukya; okusingira ddala ng’abakuumi bwe balindirira obudde okukya.

7.verse: Ayi Isirayiri, weesigenga MUKAMA, kubanga MUKAMA y’alina okwagala okutaggwaawo; era y’alina okununula okutuukiridde.

8.verse: MUKAMA y’alinunula Isirayiri n’amuggya mu byonoono bye byonna.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Lwa Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA siri wa malala, so n’amaaso gange tegeegulumiza. Siruubirira bintu binsukiridde newaakubadde ebintu eby’ekitalo ebinsinga.

2.verse: Naye ŋŋonzezza emmeeme yange era ngisiriikirizza ng’omwana bw’asiriikirira nga nnyina amuggye ku mabeere. Omwana avudde ku mabeere nga bw’asiriikirira, n’emmeeme yange bw’eri bw’etyo.

3.verse: Ayi Isirayiri, weesigenga MUKAMA okuva leero n’okutuusa emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Ayi MUKAMA jjukira Dawudi n’okubonaabona kwe yagumiikiriza kwonna.

2.verse: Nga bwe yalayirira MUKAMA, ne yeeyama eri Katonda Ayinzabyonna, Katonda wa Yakobo,

3.verse: ng’agamba nti, “Siriyingira mu nnyumba yange, wadde okulinnya ku kitanda kyange.

4.verse: Sirikkiriza tulo kunkwata newaakubadde okuzibiriza amaaso gange,

5.verse: okutuusa lwe ndimala okufunira MUKAMA ekifo; ekifo eky’okubeeramu ekya Katonda Ayinzabyonna, Katonda wa Yakobo.”

6.verse: Laba, twakiwulirako mu Efulasa, ne tukizuula mu nnimiro ya Jaali.

7.verse: Kale tugende mu kifo kye mw’abeera, tumusinzirize awali entebe y’ebigere bye.

8.verse: Golokoka, Ayi MUKAMA, ogende mu kifo kyo mw’owummulira; ggwe n’Essanduuko yo ey’Endagaano, eraga obuyinza bwo.

9.verse: Bakabona bo bambazibwe obutuukirivu, n’abatukuvu bo bayimbe n’essanyu.

10.verse: Ku lulwe Dawudi omuddu wo, tomugaana oyo gwe wafukako amafuta.

11.verse: MUKAMA Katonda yalayirira Dawudi ekirayiro ekitaliggwaawo, era talikivaako. Kubanga yamugamba nti, “Omu ku batabani bo gwe ndituuza ku ntebe yo ey’obwakabaka.

12.verse: Batabani bo bwe banaakuumanga Endagaano yange n’ebiragiro byange bye nnaabayigirizanga, ne batabani baabwe nabo banaatuulanga ku ntebe yo ey’obwakabaka emirembe gyonna.”

13.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA yalonda Sayuuni, nga kye yasiima okutuulangamu, n’agamba nti:

14.verse: “Kino kye kifo mwe nnaawummuliranga emirembe gyonna; omwo mwe nnaatuulanga nga ndi ku ntebe ey’obwakabaka kubanga nkisiimye.

15.verse: Nnaakiwanga omukisa ne nkiwa n’ebirungi, era n’abaavu baamu nnaabakkusanga ebyokulya.

16.verse: Bakabona baakyo, obulokozi bunaabanga kyambalo kyabwe; n’abatukuvu baakyo banaayimbanga ennyimba ez’essanyu n’essanyu.

17.verse: “Eyo gye ndyaliza batabani ba Dawudi obuyinza; ne muteekerawo ettabaaza olw’oyo gwe nayiwako amafuta.

18.verse: Abalabe be ndibajjuza ensonyi, naye ye ndimwambaza engule ey’ekitiibwa ekingi.”

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Lwa Dawudi. Laba bwe kiri ekirungi era nga kisanyusa, abooluganda okubeera awamu nga batabaganye.

2.verse: Kiri ng’amafuta ag’omuwendo omungi agafukibwa ku mutwe gwa Alooni ne gakulukutira mu kirevu; gakulukutira mu kirevu kya Alooni, ne gakka ku kitogi ky’ebyambalo bye.

3.verse: Kiri ng’omusulo gw’oku lusozi Kerumooni, ogugwa ne ku nsozi za Sayuuni; kubanga eyo MUKAMA gy’agabira omukisa n’obulamu emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Oluyimba nga balinnya amadaala. Mulabe, mutendereze MUKAMA, mmwe mwenna abaddu ba MUKAMA, abaweereza ekiro mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA.

2.verse: Mugolole emikono gyammwe mu kifo ekitukuvu, mutendereze MUKAMA.

3.verse: MUKAMA eyakola eggulu n’ensi akuwe omukisa ng’asinziira mu Sayuuni.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA. Mutendereze erinnya lya MUKAMA. Mumutendereze mmwe abaddu ba MUKAMA;

2.verse: mmwe abaweereza mu nnyumba ya MUKAMA, mu mpya z’ennyumba ya Katonda waffe.

3.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA, kubanga MUKAMA mulungi; mutendereze erinnya lye kubanga ekyo kisanyusa.

4.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA yeerondera Yakobo okuba owuwe; ye Isirayiri gwe yeeroboza okuba eky’omuwendo.

5.verse: Mmanyi nga MUKAMA mukulu wa kitiibwa, era nga Mukama oyo y’asinga bakatonda bonna.

6.verse: MUKAMA kyonna ky’asiima ky’akola, mu ggulu ne ku nsi; mu nnyanja ne mu buziba bwayo.

7.verse: Alagira ebire ne byekuluumulula okuva ku nkomerero y’ensi; atonnyesa enkuba erimu okumyansa, n’asumulula empewo okuva mu mawanika ge.

8.verse: Ye yakuba ababereberye ab’e Misiri; ababereberye b’abantu n’ebibereberye by’ebisolo.

9.verse: Ye yaweereza obubonero n’ebyewuunyo wakati wo, ggwe Misiri, eri Falaawo n’abaweereza be bonna.

10.verse: Ye yakuba amawanga amangi, n’atta bakabaka ab’amaanyi era be bano,

11.verse: Sikoni kabaka w’Abamoli, ne Ogi kabaka w’e Basani ne bakabaka bonna ab’e Kanani.

12.verse: Ensi yaabwe n’agiwaayo ng’obusika, okuba obusika bw’abantu be Isirayiri.

13.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, erinnya lyo lya lubeerera, era n’obukulu bwo bumanyibwa emirembe gyonna.

14.verse: Kubanga Katonda aliggyako abantu be omusango, era alisaasira abaweereza be.

15.verse: Abamawanga ebifaananyi byonna ebyole bye basinza, ebyakolebwa n’emikono gy’abantu mu ffeeza ne zaabu,

16.verse: birina emimwa, naye tebyogera; birina amaaso, naye tebiraba;

17.verse: birina amatu naye tebiwulira; so ne mu kamwa kaabyo temuyitamu mukka.

18.verse: Ababikola balibifaanana; na buli abyesiga alibifaanana.

19.verse: Ayi ennyumba ya Isirayiri mutendereze MUKAMA; mmwe ennyumba ya Alooni mutendereze MUKAMA.

20.verse: Mmwe ennyumba ya Leevi mutendereze MUKAMA; mmwe abatya MUKAMA mutendereze MUKAMA.

21.verse: MUKAMA ali mu Sayuuni yeebazibwe; yeebazibwe oyo abeera mu Yerusaalemi. Mutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mwebaze MUKAMA kubanga mulungi, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

2.verse: Mwebaze Katonda wa bakatonda bonna, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

3.verse: Mwebaze Mukama w’abafuzi, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

4.verse: Oyo yekka akola ebyamagero ebikulu, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

5.verse: Oyo eyakola eggulu mu kutegeera kwe, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

6.verse: Oyo eyabamba ensi ku mazzi, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

7.verse: Oyo eyakola ebyaka ebinene, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

8.verse: Enjuba yagikola okufuganga emisana, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

9.verse: Omwezi n’emmunyeenye yabikola okufuganga ekiro, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

10.verse: Oyo eyatta ababereberye b’Abamisiri, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

11.verse: N’aggya Isirayiri mu Misiri, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

12.verse: Yabaggyamu n’omukono gwe ogw’amaanyi gwe yagolola; kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

13.verse: Oyo eyayawulamu amazzi g’Ennyanja Emyufu, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

14.verse: N’ayisa abaana ba Isirayiri wakati waayo, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

15.verse: Naye n’asaanyaawo Falaawo n’eggye lye mu Nnyanja Emyufu; kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

16.verse: Oyo eyakulembera abantu be mu ddungu, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

17.verse: Ye yafufuggaza bakabaka abaatiikirivu, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

18.verse: N’atta bakabaka ab’amaanyi, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

19.verse: Ye yatta ne Sikoni, kabaka w’Abamoli, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

20.verse: Era ye yatta ne Ogi kabaka wa Basani, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

21.verse: N’awaayo ensi yaabwe okuba obutaka, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

22.verse: Okuba obutaka bwa Isirayiri omuddu we, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

23.verse: Oyo eyatujjukira nga tuweddemu ensa, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

24.verse: N’atuwonya abalabe baffe, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

25.verse: Oyo awa abantu n’ebiramu byonna ekyokulya, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

26.verse: Kale mwebaze Katonda w’eggulu, kubanga okwagala kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna.

1.verse: Twatuula ku mabbali g’emigga gy’e Babulooni, ne tukaaba amaziga bwe twajjukira Sayuuni.

2.verse: Ne tuwanika ennanga zaffe ku miti egyali awo.

3.verse: Abaatunyaga ne batulagira okuyimba, abaatubonyaabonya ne batulagira okusanyuka; nga bagamba nti, “Mutuyimbireyo lumu ku nnyimba za Sayuuni.”

4.verse: Tunaayimba tutya oluyimba lwa MUKAMA mu nsi eteri yaffe?

5.verse: Bwe nnaakwerabiranga, ggwe Yerusaalemi, omukono gwange ogwa ddyo gukale!

6.verse: Olulimi lwange lwesibire waggulu w’ekibuno kyange singa nkwerabira, ggwe Yerusaalemi, ne sikulowoozaako okusinga ebintu ebirala byonna.

7.verse: Jjukira, Ayi MUKAMA, batabani ba Edomu kye baakola, ku lunaku Yerusaalemi lwe kyawambibwa; ne baleekaana nti, “Kisuule, kimalirewo ddala n’emisingi gyakyo.”

8.verse: Ggwe omuwala wa Babulooni, agenda okuzikirizibwa, yeesiimye oyo alikusasula ebyo nga naawe bye watukola.

9.verse: Yeesiimye oyo aliddira abaana bo n’ababetentera ku lwazi.

1.verse: Zabbuli Ya Dawudi. Nnaakutenderezanga Ayi MUKAMA, n’omutima gwange gwonna; ne mu maaso ga bakatonda abalala nnaayimbanga okukutendereza.

2.verse: Nvuunama nga njolekedde Yeekaalu yo Entukuvu, ne ntendereza erinnya lyo olw’okwagala kwo n’olw’obwesigwa bwo; kubanga wagulumiza ekigambo kyo n’erinnya lyo okusinga ebintu byonna.

3.verse: Olunaku lwe nakukoowoolerako wannyanukula; n’onnyongeramu amaanyi mu mwoyo gwange.

4.verse: Bakabaka bonna ab’omu nsi banaakutenderezanga, Ayi MUKAMA, nga bawulidde ebigambo ebiva mu kamwa ko.

5.verse: Banaatenderezanga ebikolwa byo Ayi MUKAMA; kubanga ekitiibwa kya MUKAMA kinene.

6.verse: Newaakubadde nga MUKAMA asukkulumye, naye afaayo eri abo abeetoowaza; naye abeegulumiza ababeera wala.

7.verse: Newaakubadde nga neetooloddwa ebizibu, naye ggwe okuuma obulamu bwange; ogolola omukono gwo eri abalabe bange abakambwe, era omukono gwo ogwa ddyo ne gumponya.

8.verse: MUKAMA alituukiriza ebyo by’anteekeddeteekedde; kubanga okwagala kwo, Ayi MUKAMA, kubeerera emirembe gyonna. Tolekulira ebyo bye watonda.

1.verse: Ya Mukulu wa Bayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA, okebedde omutima gwange, n’otegeera byonna ebiri munda yange.

2.verse: Bwe ntuula omanya, ne bwe ngolokoka omanya; era otegeera byonna bye ndowooza, ne bwe mbeera ewala ennyo.

3.verse: Otegeera okutambula kwange kwonna n’okuwummula kwange. Omanyi amakubo gange gonna.

4.verse: Ekigambo kye nnaayogera, Ayi MUKAMA, okimanya nga sinnaba na kukyogera.

5.verse: Ondi mu maaso n’emabega, era ontaddeko omukono gwo.

6.verse: Okumanya okw’engeri eyo kunsukkiridde, era nkwewuunya nnyo, kunnema okutegeera.

7.verse: Nnaagenda wa Omwoyo wo gy’atali? Oba nnaagenda wa ggwe gy’otoli?

8.verse: Bwe nnaalinya mu ggulu, nga gy’oli; bwe nnakka emagombe, nayo nga gy’oli.

9.verse: Bwe nneebagala empewo ez’oku makya ne zintwala ne mbeera mu bitundu by’ennyanja ebisinga okuba ewala;

10.verse: era n’eyo omukono gwo gunannuŋŋamya, omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gunannywezanga.

11.verse: Bwe nnaagamba nti, “Ekizikiza kimbuutikire, n’obudde obw’emisana bwe ndimu bufuuke ekiro.”

12.verse: Naye era ekizikiza gy’oli tekiba kizikiza, ekiro kyakaayakana ng’emisana; kubanga gy’oli ekizikiza n’omusana bifaanana.

13.verse: Ggwe watonda byonna ebiri munda mu nze; ggwe wammumbira mu lubuto lwa mmange.

14.verse: Nkutendereza, kubanga wankola mu ngeri ey’entiisa era ey’ekitalo; emirimu gyo gya kyewuunyo; era ekyo nkimanyidde ddala bulungi.

15.verse: Wammanya nga ntondebwa, bwe nakolerwa mu kyama; bwe natondebwa mu buziba bw’ensi n’amagezi go amangi.

16.verse: Wandaba nga si natondebwa. Ennaku zange zonna ze wanteekerateekera zawandiikibwa mu kitabo kyo.

17.verse: By’ondowooleza nga bya muwendo munene, Ayi Katonda! Omuwendo gwabyo munene!

18.verse: Singa ngezaako okubibala bisinga omusenyu obungi. Ne bwe ngolokoka mu makya oba okyandowoozaako.

19.verse: Abakola ebibi batte, Ayi Katonda; abasajja abassi b’abantu banveeko.

20.verse: Abantu abo bakwogerako bibi; bakwegulumiririzaako mu butategeera bwabwe.

21.verse: Abakukyawa, Ayi MUKAMA, nange mbakyawa; abo abakwegulumiririzaako bansunguwaza.

22.verse: Mbakyayira ddala nnyo, era mbayita balabe bange.

23.verse: Nkebera, Ayi Katonda, otegeere omutima gwange. Ngezesa omanye ebirowoozo byange.

24.verse: Olabe obanga mu nze mulimu engeri yonna enkyamu; era onkulembere mu kkubo erintuusa mu bulamu obutaggwaawo.
