1.verse: Ya mukulu w’okuyimba. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Omponye abakola ebibi, Ayi MUKAMA, omponye abantu abakambwe;

2.verse: abateesa mu mitima gyabwe okukola ebibi; abanoonya entalo buli kiseera.

3.verse: Ebigambo byabwe byogi ng’ennimi z’emisota; ebiva mu kamwa kaabwe busagwa ng’obw’essalambwa.

4.verse: Onkuume abakola ebibi baleme okunkwatako, Ayi MUKAMA; omponye abantu abakambwe abateesa okunkyamya.

5.verse: Abantu ab’amalala banteze omutego; banjuluzza ekitimba kyabwe; ne batega emitego mu kkubo lyange.

6.verse: Nagamba MUKAMA nti, “Ggwe oli Katonda wange.” Wulira okwegayirira kwange, onsaasire, Ayi MUKAMA!

7.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, MUKAMA wange, ggw’omponya n’amaanyi go, ggwe engabo yange mu lutalo.

8.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, abakola ebibi tobawa bye beetaaga, era tokkiriza ntekateeka zaabwe kutuukirira; baleme kuba na malala wadde okwenyumiriza.

9.verse: Abanneetoolodde baleke enkwe zaabwe zibeekyusizeeko baboneebone.

10.verse: Amanda agaaka omuliro gabagwire; basuulibwe mu muliro, bakasukibwe mu bunnya obutakoma mwe bataliva emirembe gyonna.

11.verse: Tokkiriza balimba kweyongera bungi; abakambwe bayigganyizibwe bazikirire.

12.verse: Mmanyi nga MUKAMA ayamba abo ababonaabona, y’ayamba abanaku okuyisibwa mu bwenkanya.

13.verse: Abatuukirivu banaakutenderezanga, era w’oli we banaabeeranga.

1.verse: Zabbuli Ya Dawudi. Ayi MUKAMA nkukaabira; oyanguwe okujja gye ndi! Owulire eddoboozi lyange, nga nkukoowoola.

2.verse: Okusaba kwange kubeere ng’ebyakaloosa mu maaso go, n’okugolola emikono gyange gy’oli kubeere nga ssaddaaka ey’akawungeezi.

3.verse: Onkuume, Ayi MUKAMA, nneme okwasamya akamwa kange, era bwe njogera onkomeko.

4.verse: Okyuse omutima gwange guleme kugoberera kibi, n’okwemalira mu bikolwa ebibi; nneme okwetaba n’abantu abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu, wadde okulya ku mmere yaabwe.

5.verse: Leka omuntu omutuukirivu ankube, kubanga anaaba ankwatiddwa ekisa; muleke annenye, ekyo kinaaba ng’amafuta amalungi agafukiddwa ku mutwe gwange; sijja kugagaana. Naye nnaasabanga bulijjo nga sikkiriziganya na babi wadde n’ebikolwa byabwe.

6.verse: Abakola ebibi bwe baliweebwayo eri ab’okubasalira omusango, olwo ne balyoka bayiga nti ebigambo byange bya mazima.

7.verse: Balyogera nti, “Ng’omuntu bw’akabala n’akuba amavuunike, n’amagumba gaffe bwe galisaasaanyizibwa bwe gatyo mu kamwa k’emagombe.”

8.verse: Naye nze amaaso ngatadde ku ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA Katonda; mu ggwe mwe neekwese, tondeka nga sirina anambeera!

9.verse: Nkuuma omponye omutego gwe banteze, n’ebitimba by’abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu.

10.verse: Ebitimba bye banteze abakola ebibi abo bonna, baleke babigwemu, kyokka nze mpone.

1.verse: Okusaba kwa Dawudi bwe yali mu mpuku. Nkaabirira MUKAMA n’eddoboozi ery’omwanguka; neegayirira MUKAMA ansaasire.

2.verse: Mmutegeeza byonna ebinneemulugunyisa, ne mmwanjulira ebinteganya byonna.

3.verse: Omwoyo gwange bwe gunnennyika, gw’omanyi eky’okunkolera. Banteze omutego mu kkubo lyange mwe mpita.

4.verse: Bwe ntunula ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, sirabayo anambeera; sirina wa kwekweka, era tewali n’omu anfaako.

5.verse: Nkaabirira ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, nga ŋŋamba nti, “Ggwe kiddukiro kyange, ggwe mugabo gwange mu nsi muno.”

6.verse: Owulire okukaaba kwange, kubanga njeezebwa nnyo! Mponya abanjigganya, kubanga bansinza nnyo amaanyi.

7.verse: Nziggya mu kkomera, ndyoke nkwebaze nga ntendereza erinnya lyo. Abatuukirivu balinneetooloola, ng’onkoledde ebyekisa ekingi ebingi.

1.verse: Zabbuli Ya Dawudi. Wulira okusaba kwange, Ayi MUKAMA, wulira okwegayirira kwange! Ggwe omwesigwa era omutuukirivu jjangu ombeere.

2.verse: Tonsalira musango, kubanga mu maaso go tewali n’omu atuukiridde.

3.verse: Omulabe wange angoba n’ankwata n’ansuula wansi; anteeka mu kizikiza ne nfaanana ng’abaafa edda.

4.verse: Noolwekyo omwoyo gwange guweddemu endasi, n’omutima gwange gwennyise.

5.verse: Nzijukira ennaku ez’edda, ne nfumiitiriza ku ebyo bye wakola byonna, ne ndowooza ku mirimu gy’emikono gyo.

6.verse: Ngolola emikono gyange gy’oli, ne nkuyaayaanira ng’ettaka ekkalu bwe liyaayaanira enkuba.

7.verse: Yanguwa okunziramu, Ayi MUKAMA, kubanga omwoyo gwange guggwaamu amaanyi. Tonkisa maaso go, nneme okufaanana ng’abafu.

8.verse: Obudde nga bukedde, nsaba ondage okwagala kwo okutaggwaawo; kubanga ggwe gwe neesiga. Njigiriza ekkubo lye nsaana okutambuliramu, kubanga omwoyo gwange gwonna guli gy’oli.

9.verse: Mponya, Ayi MUKAMA, abalabe bange, kubanga ggwe kiddukiro kyange.

10.verse: Njigiriza okukola by’oyagala, kubanga ggwe Katonda wange! Omwoyo wo omulungi ankulembere, antambulize mu kkubo eddungi ery’omuseetwe.

11.verse: Olw’erinnya lyo, Ayi MUKAMA, onkuume, mu butuukirivu bwo onzigye mu kabi.

12.verse: Omalewo abalabe bange olw’okwagala kwo, ozikirize n’abanjigganya bonna, kubanga nze ndi muddu wo.

1.verse: Zabbuli ya Dawudi. Atenderezebwe MUKAMA, olwazi lwange, atendeka emikono gyange okulwana, era ateekerateekera engalo zange olutalo.

2.verse: MUKAMA anjagala ye Katonda wange era kye kiddukiro kyange, ge maanyi gange amangi era ye mulokozi wange. Ye ngabo yange mwe neekweka. Awangula amawanga n’agassa wansi w’ebigere byange.

3.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, omuntu kye ki ggwe okumufaako, oba omwana w’omuntu, ggwe okumulowoozaako?

4.verse: Omuntu ali nga mukka. Ennaku ze ziri ng’ekisiikirize ekiyita obuyisi.

5.verse: Yawula mu ggulu lyo, Ayi MUKAMA, okke! Kwata ku nsozi zinyooke omukka!

6.verse: Myansa abalabe basaasaane, era lasa obusaale bwo obazikirize.

7.verse: Ogolole omukono gwo ng’osinziira waggulu ennyo, omponye, onzigye mu mazzi amangi, era onzigye mu mikono gya bannamawanga;

8.verse: ab’emimwa egyogera eby’obulimba, abalayira nti kya mazima, so nga bulimba bwereere.

9.verse: Ayi MUKAMA, nnaakuyimbiranga oluyimba oluggya; nnaakukubiranga ennanga ey’enkoba ekkumi,

10.verse: ggwe awa bakabaka obuwanguzi; amponya, nze omuddu wo Dawudi, ekitala ekyogi.

11.verse: Ndokola, omponye onzigye mu mukono gwa bannamawanga bano ab’emimwa egyogera eby’obulimba, era omukono gwabwe ogwa ddyo gwa bulimba.

12.verse: Batabani baffe mu buvubuka bwabwe, Ayi MUKAMA, babeere ng’ebisimbe ebikulidde ddala obulungi, ne bawala baffe babe ng’empagi ennungi ez’oku nsonda okuzimbirwa ennyumba ya kabaka mu lubiri.

13.verse: Amawanika gaffe gajjule ebibala ebya buli ngeri. Endiga zaffe zizaale enkumi n’obukumi zijjule amalundiro gaffe.

14.verse: Ente zaffe ziwalule ebizito. Ebisenge by’ekibuga bireme kumenyebwa. Waleme kubaawo kukaaba n’okwaziirana kwonna mu nguudo ez’omu bibuga byaffe.

15.verse: Abantu abaweereddwa emikisa egyo beesiimye! Balina omukisa abantu abo abalina Katonda waabwe nga ye MUKAMA.

1.verse: Oluyimba lwa Dawudi olw’okutendereza. Nnaakugulumizanga ggwe Katonda wange, era Kabaka wange; era nnaatenderezanga erinnya lyo buli lunaku emirembe n’emirembe.

2.verse: Nnaakutenderezanga buli lunaku; era nnaasuutanga erinnya lyo emirembe n’emirembe.

3.verse: MUKAMA mukulu, wa kitiibwa, era asaanira okutenderezebwanga ennyo, n’obukulu bwe tebwogerekeka.

4.verse: Buli mulembe gunaatenderanga gunnaagwo ebikolwa byo, era gunaatendanga emirimu gyo egy’amaanyi.

5.verse: Nnaatendanga obukulu n’obulungi bw’ekitiibwa kyo, era nnaafumiitirizanga ku bikolwa byo ebyewuunyisa.

6.verse: Abantu banaatendanga amaanyi g’ebikolwa byo eby’ekitalo, nange nnaatendanga obukulu bwo obw’ekitiibwa.

7.verse: Banaayogeranga ku bulungi bwo obw’ekitalo nga bajaguza; era banaayimbanga olw’obutuukirivu bwo.

8.verse: MUKAMA wa kisa, ajudde okusaasira, alwawo okusunguwala era ajudde okwagala okutaggwaawo.

9.verse: MUKAMA mulungi eri buli muntu, era okusaasira kwe kubuna byonna bye yatonda.

10.verse: Byonna bye watonda binaakutenderezanga, Ayi MUKAMA; n’abatukuvu bo banaakugulumizanga.

11.verse: Banaayogeranga ku kitiibwa ky’obwakabaka bwo, era banaatendanga amaanyi go.

12.verse: Balyoke bategeeze abantu bonna ebikolwa byo eby’amaanyi, n’ekitiibwa ky’obukulu obw’obwakabaka bwo.

13.verse: Obwakabaka bwo, bwakabaka bwa lubeerera, n’obufuzi bwo bwa mirembe na mirembe. MUKAMA by’ayogera byonna bya bwesigwa, n’ebikolwa bye bijjudde okusaasira.

14.verse: MUKAMA awanirira abo bonna abazitoowereddwa, era ayimusa bonna abagwa.

15.verse: Amaaso g’abantu bonna gatunuulira ggwe, Ayi MUKAMA, era bonna gw’obawa ebyokulya mu biseera byabyo.

16.verse: Oyanjuluza engalo zo, ebiramu byonna n’obigabira bye byetaaga ne bikkuta.

17.verse: MUKAMA mutuukirivu mu bikolwa bye byonna era ayagala byonna bye yatonda.

18.verse: MUKAMA abeera kumpi n’abo bonna abamukoowoola; abo bonna abamukoowoola mu mazima.

19.verse: Abo bonna abamussaamu ekitiibwa abawa bye baagala, era awulira okukaaba kwabwe n’abawonya.

20.verse: MUKAMA akuuma bonna abamwagala, naye abakola ebibi alibazikiriza.

21.verse: Akamwa kange kanaatenderezanga MUKAMA, era na buli kitonde kinaatenderezanga erinnya lye ettukuvu emirembe n’emirembe.

1.verse: Tendereza MUKAMA! Tendereza MUKAMA ggwe emmeeme yange!

2.verse: Nnaatenderezanga MUKAMA ennaku zonna ez’obulamu bwange; nnaayimbanga okutendereza Katonda wange nga nkyali mulamu.

3.verse: Teweesiganga bafuzi, wadde abantu obuntu omutali buyambi.

4.verse: Kubanga bafa ne bakka emagombe; ne ku lunaku olwo lwennyini, byonna bye baba bateeseteese ne bifa.

5.verse: Yeesiimye oyo ayambibwa Katonda wa Yakobo; ng’essuubi lye liri mu MUKAMA Katonda we,

6.verse: eyakola eggulu n’ensi n’ennyanja ne byonna ebirimu, era omwesigwa emirembe gyonna.

7.verse: Atereeza ensonga z’abajoogebwa mu bwenkanya, n’abalumwa enjala abawa ebyokulya. MUKAMA asumulula abasibe.

8.verse: MUKAMA azibula amaaso ga bamuzibe, era awanirira abazitoowereddwa. MUKAMA ayagala abatuukirivu.

9.verse: MUKAMA alabirira bannamawanga, era ayamba bamulekwa ne bannamwandu; naye ekkubo ly’abakola ebibi alifaafaaganya.

10.verse: MUKAMA anaafuganga emirembe gyonna, Katonda wo, Ayi Sayuuni, anaabanga Katonda wa buli mulembe. Mutendereze MUKAMA!

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Kubanga kirungi okutenderezanga Katonda waffe; kubanga ajjudde ekisa, n’oluyimba olw’okumutenderezanga lumusaanira.

2.verse: MUKAMA azimba Yerusaalemi; era akuŋŋaanya Abayisirayiri abaali mu buwaŋŋanguse.

3.verse: Azzaamu amaanyi abo abalina emitima egimenyese, era ajjanjaba ebiwundu byabwe.

4.verse: MUKAMA ategeka omuwendo gw’emmunyeenye; era buli emu n’agituuma erinnya.

5.verse: Mukama waffe mukulu era wa kitiibwa; amaanyi g’obuyinza bwe tegatendeka, n’okutegeera kwe tekuliiko kkomo.

6.verse: MUKAMA awanirira abawombeefu, naye abakola ebibi abasuulira ddala wansi.

7.verse: Muyimbire MUKAMA ennyimba ez’okumwebaza; mumukubire entongooli ezivuga obulungi.

8.verse: MUKAMA abikka eggulu n’ebire, ensi agitonnyeseza enkuba, n’ameza omuddo ne gukula ku nsozi.

9.verse: Ente aziwa emmere, ne bannamuŋŋoona abato abakaaba abaliisa.

10.verse: Essanyu lya MUKAMA teriri mu maanyi ga mbalaasi, wadde mu magulu g’omuntu,

11.verse: wabula MUKAMA asanyukira abo abamussaamu ekitiibwa, era abalina essuubi mu kwagala kwe okutaggwaawo.

12.verse: Tendereza MUKAMA ggwe Yerusaalemi, tendereza Katonda wo ggwe Sayuuni,

13.verse: kubanga ebisiba enzigi zo, ye abinyweza, n’abantu bo abasulamu n’abawa omukisa.

14.verse: Aleeta emirembe ku nsalo zo; n’akukkusa eŋŋaano esinga obulungi.

15.verse: Aweereza ekiragiro kye ku nsi; ekigambo kye ne kibuna mangu.

16.verse: Ayaliira omuzira ku ttaka ne gutukula ng’ebyoya by’endiga enjeru, n’omusulo ogukutte n’agusaasaanya ng’evvu.

17.verse: Omuzira agukanyuga ng’obuyinjayinja; bw’aleeta obutiti ani ayinza okubusobola?

18.verse: MUKAMA aweereza ekigambo kye, omuzira ne gusaanuuka; n’akunsa empewo, amazzi ne gakulukuta.

19.verse: Yategeeza Yakobo ekigambo kye; Isirayiri n’amanya amateeka ga MUKAMA n’ebiragiro bye.

20.verse: Tewali ggwanga na limu lye yali akolaganye nalyo bw’atyo; amawanga amalala tegamanyi mateeka ge. Mutendereze MUKAMA!

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Mumutendereze nga musinziira mu ggulu, mumutenderereze mu bifo ebiri waggulu.

2.verse: Mumutendereze mmwe mwenna bamalayika be, mumutendereze mmwe mwenna eggye lye ery’omu ggulu.

3.verse: Mmwe enjuba n’omwezi mutendereze MUKAMA, nammwe mwenna emmunyeenye ezaaka mumutendereze.

4.verse: Tendereza MUKAMA ggwe eggulu eriri waggulu ennyo, naawe amazzi agali waggulu w’eggulu.

5.verse: Leka byonna bitendereze erinnya lya MUKAMA! Kubanga ye yalagira, ne bitondebwa.

6.verse: Yabinywereza ddala mu bifo byabyo ennaku zonna, n’ateekawo etteeka eritaliggwaawo.

7.verse: Mumutendereze nga musinziira ku nsi, mmwe balukwata n’ebifo byonna eby’omu buziba bw’ennyanja,

8.verse: mmwe okumyansa, n’omuzira ogw’amakerenda, n’omuzira ogukutte era n’olufu, naawe kikuŋŋunta, mugondere ekiragiro kye,

9.verse: mmwe agasozi n’obusozi, emiti egy’ebibala n’emivule;

10.verse: ensolo ez’omu nsiko era n’ente zonna, ebyewalula n’ebinyonyi ebibuuka,

11.verse: bakabaka b’ensi n’amawanga gonna, abalangira n’abafuzi bonna ab’ensi,

12.verse: abavubuka abalenzi n’abawala; abantu abakulu n’abaana abato.

13.verse: Bitendereze erinnya lya MUKAMA, kubanga erinnya lye lyokka lye ligulumizibwa; ekitiibwa kye kisinga byonna eby’omu nsi n’eby’omu ggulu.

14.verse: Abantu be abawadde amaanyi, era agulumizizza abatukuvu be, be bantu be Isirayiri abakolagana naye. Mutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Muyimbire MUKAMA oluyimba oluggya, mumutenderereze wamu n’ekibiina ky’abatukuvu.

2.verse: Isirayiri asanyukirenga eyamutonda; n’abantu ba Sayuuni bajagulize Kabaka waabwe!

3.verse: Batenderezenga erinnya lye nga bwe bazina, bamutenderezenga nga bwe bakuba ennanga n’ebitaasa.

4.verse: Kubanga MUKAMA asanyukira abantu be, n’abawombeefu abawa engule ey’obulokozi.

5.verse: Abatuukirivu bajagulizenga mu kitiibwa kino; bayimbire ku bitanda byabwe olw’essanyu.

6.verse: Batenderezenga Katonda waabwe, bakwate ekitala eky’obwogi obubiri,

7.verse: bawoolere eggwanga, babonereze n’amawanga,

8.verse: bateeke bakabaka baago mu njegere, n’abakungu baago babasibe amagulu n’ebyuma,

9.verse: babasalire omusango ogwabawandiikirwa. Kino kye kitiibwa ky’abatukuvu be bonna. Mutendereze MUKAMA.

1.verse: Mutendereze MUKAMA! Mutendereze Katonda mu kifo kye ekitukuvu; mumutenderereze ne mu ggulu lye ery’amaanyi.

2.verse: Mumutendereze olw’ebikolwa bye ebiraga amaanyi ge; mumutendereze olw’obukulu bwe obusukkiridde.

3.verse: Mumutendereze n’eddoboozi ery’ekkondeere, mumutendereze n’ennanga ey’enkoba n’endere.

4.verse: Mumutendereze n’ebitaasa n’amazina; mumutendereze n’ebivuga eby’enkoba n’endere!

5.verse: Mumutendereze nga mukuba ebitaasa; mumutendereze n’ebitaasa ebivuga ennyo!

6.verse: Buli ekissa omukka kitenderezenga MUKAMA! Mutendereze MUKAMA.
